Nanso, ɛberɛ a asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin bi hunuu anwanwadeɛ yi na wɔtee nso sɛ mmɔfra nkumaa a wɔwɔ asɔrefie hɔ reteateam sɛ, “Nhyira nka Dawid Ba no” no, anyɛ wɔn dɛ. Enti, wɔbisaa Yesu sɛ, “Wote nsɛm a mmɔfra no reka no anaa?”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Aane. Na monkenkanee saa Atwerɛsɛm a ɛka sɛ, ‘Mmotafowa mpo bɛkamfo no’ no da, anaa?”
Afei, ɔfirii hɔ san kɔɔ Betania kɔdaa hɔ.
Yesu Dome Ankaa Dua Bi
Adeɛ kyee anɔpa a ɔresan akɔ Yerusalem no, ɔkɔm dee no. Ɔhunuu sɛ ankaa dua bi si ɛkwan ho baabi. Ɔkɔɔ hɔ kɔhwɛɛ sɛ ankaa no bi wɔ so, nanso ɔduruu hɔ no, ɔhunuu sɛ nhaban nko ara na ɛwɔ so. Ɔdomee ankaa dua no sɛ, “Ɛfiri nnɛ, worenso aba bio!” Ɛhɔ ara ankaa dua no wuiɛ.
Asɛm yi yɛɛ Yesu asuafoɔ no nwanwa maa wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Na ɛyɛɛ deɛn nti na ankaa dua no so nhaban poo ntɛm saa?”
Yesu nso buaa wɔn sɛ, “Nokorɛm, sɛ mowɔ gyidie a ɛnhinhim a, mobɛtumi ayɔ ade korɔ yi ara bi, anaa deɛ ɛkyɛn saa mpo. Anka mobɛtumi aka akyerɛ Ngo Bepɔ yi sɛ, ‘Tutu kɔgu ɛpo mu’, na ɛbɛtutu akɔgu mu nso. Biribiara a mode gyidie bɛbisa wɔ mpaebɔ mu no, mo nsa bɛka.”
Yesu Tumi Ho Asɛmmisa
Yesu san kɔɔ asɔrefie hɔ a ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin baa ne kyɛn bɛbisaa no tumi ko a ɔgyina so pamoo adwadifoɔ ne sikasesafoɔ no firii asɔrefie hɔ no.
Yesu kaa sɛ, “Merebɛbisa mo asɛm baako bi, na mommua me ansa. Onyankopɔn na ɔsomaa Yohane Osubɔni anaa ɛnyɛ ɔno?”
Wɔdwennwenee ho kaa sɛ, “Sɛ yɛka sɛ ‘Ɛfiri Onyankopɔn’ a, wɔbɛbisa yɛn deɛ enti a yɛannye deɛ Yohane kaeɛ no annie? Na sɛ yɛka sɛ, ‘Ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔsomaa no’ nso a, ɛdɔm no bɛha yɛn ɛfiri sɛ, wɔn nyinaa nim sɛ Yohane yɛ odiyifoɔ.” Enti, wɔn mmuaeɛ a wɔmaeɛ ara ne sɛ, “Yɛnnim!” Ɛhɔ ara na Yesu nso kaa sɛ, “Sɛ monnim deɛ a, me nso meremmua mo.”
Mmmammarima Baanu Ho Bɛ
Yesu kaa sɛ, “Saa asɛm a merebɛka yi modwene ho sɛn? Ɔbarima bi wɔ mmammarima baanu. Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn mu panin no sɛ, ‘Me ba, ɛnnɛ kɔ mʼafuom na kɔyɔ adwuma wɔ hɔ.’ Ne ba no kaa sɛ, ‘Merenkɔ;’ nanso akyire yi, ɔsesaa nʼadwene na ɔkɔeɛ. Afei agya no ka kyerɛɛ akumaa no sɛ, ‘Wo nso kɔ.’ Ɔno nso kaa sɛ, ‘Agya, mate, mɛkɔ.’ Nanso wankɔ. Saa mmɔfra baanu yi mu hwan na ɔtie nʼagya asɛm?” Wɔbuaa sɛ, “Ne ba panin no a.”
Afei, Yesu kyerɛɛ asɛm no ase sɛ, “Akyinnyeɛ biara nni ho sɛ abɔnefoɔ ne nnwamanfoɔ bɛkɔ Ɔsoro Ahennie mu ansa na moakɔ. Ɛfiri sɛ, Yohane Osubɔni ka kyerɛɛ mo sɛ, monsakra mo adwene na monkɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn, nanso moasakra, maa abɔnefoɔ ne nnwamanfoɔ sakraa wɔn adwene. Na mohunuu deɛ ɛbaeɛ no koraa, moannye anni, enti moansakra.”
Apaafoɔ Ho Bɛ
Yesu buu wɔn bɛ foforɔ bi sɛ, “Da bi, ɔbarima bi a ɔwɔ bobefuo a wagye ban afa ho, na watu amena a wɔkyi nsa wɔ mu, de afuo no gyaa okuafoɔ bi. Yei akyi no, ɔtuu kwan kɔɔ ɔman foforɔ bi so.
“Ɛduruu berɛ a bobe no bereeɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔteɛ no, ɔsomaa ne ho nnipa baa akuafoɔ no hɔ sɛ wɔmmɛgye ne kyɛfa mmrɛ no. Wɔduruu hɔ ara pɛ na akuafoɔ no to hyɛɛ nnipa no so, boroo ɔbaako, kum ɔbaako ɛnna wɔsii ɔbaako nso aboɔ.
“Afei, ɔsan somaa nnipa a wɔn dodoɔ sene wɔn a ɔsomaa wɔn kane no sɛ wɔnkɔ akuafoɔ no nkyɛn, nanso asɛm korɔ no ara bi na ɛsiiɛ. Yei akyi, ɔsomaa ɔno ankasa ne ba akuafoɔ no nkyɛn susuu sɛ, wɔde nidie bɛma no.
“Nanso, akuafoɔ no hunuu sɛ ne ba no afiti reba pɛ, wɔfaa ne ho adwene kaa sɛ, ‘Ɔdedifoɔ no na ɔreba no; momma yɛnku no, na yɛmfa afuo no!’ Ɛhɔ ara, wɔtwee no firii afuo no mu, kɔkum no too baabi.
“Sɛ afuowura no san ba a, mogye di sɛ ɛdeɛn na ɔbɛyɔ saa akuafoɔ no?”
Yudafoɔ mpanin no buaa sɛ, “Ɔno nso bɛkum saa atirimuɔdenfoɔ no na ɔde afuo no ama akuafoɔ foforɔ a wɔde ne kyɛfa bɛma no ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ mu.”
Yesu bisaa wɔn bio sɛ, “Monkan no Atwerɛsɛm no mu da sɛ, ‘Ɛboɔ a adansifoɔ apoɔ no, ɛno ara na abɛyɛ ɛdan no ntweaso tiboɔ.’ Yei yɛ Awurade dwumadie no bi, na ayɛ yɛn ani so anwanwasɛm yi no?”
“Deɛ mereka ara ne sɛ, wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn Ahennie no afiri mo nsam de akɔma ɔman foforɔ a wɔbɛbu nʼafudeɛ no ho nkonta pa akyerɛ no. Wɔn a wɔbɛhwe saa nokorɛ botan yi so no mu bɛbubu, na deɛ nokorɛ no bɛhwe ne so no nso bɛpɛkyɛ”.
Ɛberɛ a asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin no tee aseɛ sɛ Yesu asɛm a ɔreka no fa wɔn ho no, wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔyɛ no bɔne, nanso na wɔsuro ɛdɔm no ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔagye Yesu atom sɛ ɔyɛ Odiyifoɔ.
Mateo 22Ayeforɔhyia Apontoɔ Ho Bɛ
1Yesu de mmɛbuo ahodoɔ kyerɛɛ sɛdeɛ Ɔsoro Ahennie no teɛ.
2Ɔse, “Ɔsoro Ahennie no te sɛ ɔhene bi a ne babarima hyiaa ayeforɔ na ɔtoo pon maa no. 3Ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ nnipa pii. Ɛberɛ no duruiɛ no, ɔsomaa nʼasomfoɔ sɛ wɔnkɔfrɛfrɛ nnipa no na wɔmmra. Nanso, nnipa no amma. 4Ɔsan somaa nʼasomfoɔ foforɔ sɛ, ‘Monkɔka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔawie biribiara. Wɔakum mʼanantwie ne me nyɛmmoa de anoa aduane awie. Mommra ayeforɔ no ase mmɛdidi!’
5“Nanso, ne ho yɛɛ wɔn a ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wɔn no sere. Obiara kɔdii ne dwuma. Obi kɔɔ nʼafuom. Ɔfoforɔ nso kɔdii ne dwa. 6Afoforɔ nso kyeree nʼasomfoɔ no hwee wɔn, pirapiraa wɔn, kunkum ebinom nso.
7“Ɔhene no tee deɛ nnipa no ayɛ nʼasomfoɔ no, ne bo fuiɛ. Ɔsomaa nʼasraafoɔ ma wɔkɔkunkum awudifoɔ no, hyee wɔn kuro no pasaa. 8Ɔsan frɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Wɔawie ayeforɔ aduane no. Nanso, wɔn a mefrɛɛ wɔn no mfata sɛ wɔba apontoɔ no ase. 9Enti, monkɔ mmɔnten so na obiara a mobɛhu no no, momfrɛ no mmra apontoɔ no ase.’
10“Asomfoɔ no firii adi kɔɔ mmɔnten so kɔfrɛɛ nnipa dodoɔ a wɔhunuu wɔn no nyinaa. Wɔfrɛɛ nnipa pa ne nnipa bɔne, maa ɛdan a wɔtoo pon wɔ mu no yɛɛ ma 11Ɔhene no baa hɔ sɛ ɔrebɛhwɛ nnipa a wɔaba no, ɔhunuu obi a ɔnhyɛ ayeforɔhyia atadeɛ wɔ hɔ.
12“Ɔbisaa no sɛ, ‘Damfo, ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wonhyɛ ayeforɔhyia atadeɛ, na wotumi baa ha?’ Nanso, damfo no antumi ammua.
13“Afei, ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ no sɛ, ‘Monkyekyere ne nan ne ne nsa na monkɔto no ntwene akyirikyiri sum mu, deɛ esu ne agyaadwoɔ wɔ no.’ 14Wɔafrɛ bebree, nanso kakraa bi na wɔayi wɔn.”
Ɛtoyie ho asɛmmisa
15Farisifoɔ no tuu Yesu ho agyina, pɛɛ ɛkwan bi a wɔnam nʼanom asɛm so bɛnya no akye no. 16Wɔsii no gyinaeɛ sɛ, wɔbɛsoma wɔn nnipa bi ne Herodefoɔ aba Yesu nkyɛn abɛbisa no sɛ, “Owura, yɛnim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ, na wonam nokorɛ kwan so kyerɛ nnipa ɛkwan a ɛkɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn a wonsuro akyire asɛm, ɛfiri sɛ, wonhwɛ nnipa anim. 17Ka ma yɛntie. Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔyi toɔ ma Roma Hempɔn Kaesare anaa ɛnyɛ?”
18Yesu hunuu wɔn adwemmɔne no maa ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mo nyaatwomfoɔ! Adɛn nti na mopɛ sɛ mode nnaadaa sɔ me hwɛ? 19Momfa sika a wɔde yi toɔ no bi nkyerɛ me.” Wɔde bi kyerɛɛ no. 20Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Hwan mfoni na ɛda so, na hwan din nso na ɛwɔ so?”
21Wɔbuaa sɛ, “Kaesare.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ, momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare, na momfa Onyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn.”
22Ne mmuaeɛ a ɔmaa wɔn no maa wɔn ho dwirii wɔn maa wɔgyaa no hɔ kɔeɛ.
Owusɔreɛ Ho Asɛmmisa
23Da no ara, Sadukifoɔ a wɔnnye owusɔreɛ nni no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, 24“Owura, Mose kaa nɛ, ‘Sɛ ɔbarima bi anwo na ɔwu a, ne nuabarima mfa ne yere no kunabaa na ɔne no nwo mma owufoɔ no.’ 25Anuanom baason bi ne yɛn tenaa ha. Ɔpanin no wareeɛ a wanwo ba na ɔwuiɛ. Enti, ne nua a ɔtɔ so mmienu no faa ne yere no kunabaa. 26Deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no nso wuiɛ, maa deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no faa ɔbaa no kunabaa. Ɔno nso wuiɛ a wanwo ba, maa ɔfoforɔ nso faa ɔbaa no kunabaa. Yei toaa so ara kɔsii sɛ anuanom baason no nyinaa waree ɔbaa no. 27Deɛ ɛdi akyire ne sɛ, ɔbaa no nso wuiɛ. 28Ɛno nti, owusɔreberɛ no, nnipa baason yi mu hwan na ɔbaa no bɛyɛ ne yere? Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa waree no!”
29Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Mo mfomsoɔ a moayɛ no firi nim a monnim Atwerɛsɛm no ne Onyankopɔn tumi a ɔwɔ no! 30Na owusɔreberɛ no, awadeɛ nni hɔ; obiara bɛyɛ sɛ abɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ soro no. 31Afei, ɛfa owusɔreɛ no ho no nso, monkanee deɛ Onyankopɔn aka afa ho no pɛn? Monhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ mo ɛberɛ a ɔkaa sɛ, 32‘Mene Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no?’ Yei kyerɛ sɛ. Onyankopɔn nyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn na mmom, ateasefoɔ Nyankopɔn.”
33Nnipadɔm no tee ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa.
Mmaransɛm No Mu Deɛ Ɛkyɛn Ne Nyinaa
34Farisifoɔ no tee sɛ Yesu abu afa Sadukifoɔ no so no, wɔkɔhyiaa Yesu.
35Wɔn mu baako a ɔyɛ mmaranimfoɔ bisaa Yesu sɛ, 36“Owura, Mose mmaransɛm no mu deɛ ɛwɔ he koraa na ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa?”
37Yesu buaa no sɛ, “ ‘Dɔ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn, wo koma nyinaa mu ne wo kra nyinaa mu ne wʼadwene nyinaa mu.’ 38Yei ne mmaransɛm no mu deɛ ɛdi kan na ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa. 39Deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu no te sɛ ɛno ara; ‘Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho.’ 40Mose mmaransɛm ne adiyifoɔ no nkyerɛkyerɛ no nyinaa gyina saa mmaransɛm mmienu yi so.”
Hwan Ba Ne Agyenkwa No?
41Farisifoɔ no twaa Yesu ho hyiaeɛ no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, 42“Ɛdeɛn na mowɔ ka wɔ Agyenkwa no ho? Hwan ba ne no?” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Dawid Ba.”
43Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ “Ɛnneɛ, adɛn na Dawid nam Honhom Kronkron so frɛ no ‘Awurade? Ɛfiri sɛ, Dawid kaa sɛ,
44“ ‘Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ me wura sɛ, Tena me nifa kɔsi sɛ mɛma woadi wʼatamfoɔ nyinaa so.’ 45Sɛ Dawid frɛ no ‘Awurade’ a, ɛnneɛ ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na watumi ayɛ ne ba?”
46Obiara antumi ammua. Yei akyi nso, obiara antumi ammisa no nsɛm bio.Ayeforɔhyia Apontoɔ Ho Bɛ
Yesu de mmɛbuo ahodoɔ kyerɛɛ sɛdeɛ Ɔsoro Ahennie no teɛ.
Ɔse, “Ɔsoro Ahennie no te sɛ ɔhene bi a ne babarima hyiaa ayeforɔ na ɔtoo pon maa no. Ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ nnipa pii. Ɛberɛ no duruiɛ no, ɔsomaa nʼasomfoɔ sɛ wɔnkɔfrɛfrɛ nnipa no na wɔmmra. Nanso, nnipa no amma. Ɔsan somaa nʼasomfoɔ foforɔ sɛ, ‘Monkɔka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔawie biribiara. Wɔakum mʼanantwie ne me nyɛmmoa de anoa aduane awie. Mommra ayeforɔ no ase mmɛdidi!’
“Nanso, ne ho yɛɛ wɔn a ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wɔn no sere. Obiara kɔdii ne dwuma. Obi kɔɔ nʼafuom. Ɔfoforɔ nso kɔdii ne dwa. Afoforɔ nso kyeree nʼasomfoɔ no hwee wɔn, pirapiraa wɔn, kunkum ebinom nso.
“Ɔhene no tee deɛ nnipa no ayɛ nʼasomfoɔ no, ne bo fuiɛ. Ɔsomaa nʼasraafoɔ ma wɔkɔkunkum awudifoɔ no, hyee wɔn kuro no pasaa. Ɔsan frɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Wɔawie ayeforɔ aduane no. Nanso, wɔn a mefrɛɛ wɔn no mfata sɛ wɔba apontoɔ no ase. Enti, monkɔ mmɔnten so na obiara a mobɛhu no no, momfrɛ no mmra apontoɔ no ase.’
“Asomfoɔ no firii adi kɔɔ mmɔnten so kɔfrɛɛ nnipa dodoɔ a wɔhunuu wɔn no nyinaa. Wɔfrɛɛ nnipa pa ne nnipa bɔne, maa ɛdan a wɔtoo pon wɔ mu no yɛɛ ma Ɔhene no baa hɔ sɛ ɔrebɛhwɛ nnipa a wɔaba no, ɔhunuu obi a ɔnhyɛ ayeforɔhyia atadeɛ wɔ hɔ.
“Ɔbisaa no sɛ, ‘Damfo, ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wonhyɛ ayeforɔhyia atadeɛ, na wotumi baa ha?’ Nanso, damfo no antumi ammua.
“Afei, ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ no sɛ, ‘Monkyekyere ne nan ne ne nsa na monkɔto no ntwene akyirikyiri sum mu, deɛ esu ne agyaadwoɔ wɔ no.’ Wɔafrɛ bebree, nanso kakraa bi na wɔayi wɔn.”
Ɛtoyie ho asɛmmisa
Farisifoɔ no tuu Yesu ho agyina, pɛɛ ɛkwan bi a wɔnam nʼanom asɛm so bɛnya no akye no. Wɔsii no gyinaeɛ sɛ, wɔbɛsoma wɔn nnipa bi ne Herodefoɔ aba Yesu nkyɛn abɛbisa no sɛ, “Owura, yɛnim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ, na wonam nokorɛ kwan so kyerɛ nnipa ɛkwan a ɛkɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn a wonsuro akyire asɛm, ɛfiri sɛ, wonhwɛ nnipa anim. Ka ma yɛntie. Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔyi toɔ ma Roma Hempɔn Kaesare anaa ɛnyɛ?”
Yesu hunuu wɔn adwemmɔne no maa ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mo nyaatwomfoɔ! Adɛn nti na mopɛ sɛ mode nnaadaa sɔ me hwɛ? Momfa sika a wɔde yi toɔ no bi nkyerɛ me.” Wɔde bi kyerɛɛ no. Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Hwan mfoni na ɛda so, na hwan din nso na ɛwɔ so?”
Wɔbuaa sɛ, “Kaesare.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ, momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare, na momfa Onyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn.”
Ne mmuaeɛ a ɔmaa wɔn no maa wɔn ho dwirii wɔn maa wɔgyaa no hɔ kɔeɛ.
Owusɔreɛ Ho Asɛmmisa
Da no ara, Sadukifoɔ a wɔnnye owusɔreɛ nni no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, “Owura, Mose kaa nɛ, ‘Sɛ ɔbarima bi anwo na ɔwu a, ne nuabarima mfa ne yere no kunabaa na ɔne no nwo mma owufoɔ no.’ Anuanom baason bi ne yɛn tenaa ha. Ɔpanin no wareeɛ a wanwo ba na ɔwuiɛ. Enti, ne nua a ɔtɔ so mmienu no faa ne yere no kunabaa. Deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no nso wuiɛ, maa deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no faa ɔbaa no kunabaa. Ɔno nso wuiɛ a wanwo ba, maa ɔfoforɔ nso faa ɔbaa no kunabaa. Yei toaa so ara kɔsii sɛ anuanom baason no nyinaa waree ɔbaa no. Deɛ ɛdi akyire ne sɛ, ɔbaa no nso wuiɛ. Ɛno nti, owusɔreberɛ no, nnipa baason yi mu hwan na ɔbaa no bɛyɛ ne yere? Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa waree no!”
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Mo mfomsoɔ a moayɛ no firi nim a monnim Atwerɛsɛm no ne Onyankopɔn tumi a ɔwɔ no! Na owusɔreberɛ no, awadeɛ nni hɔ; obiara bɛyɛ sɛ abɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ soro no. Afei, ɛfa owusɔreɛ no ho no nso, monkanee deɛ Onyankopɔn aka afa ho no pɛn? Monhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ mo ɛberɛ a ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Mene Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no?’ Yei kyerɛ sɛ. Onyankopɔn nyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn na mmom, ateasefoɔ Nyankopɔn.”
Nnipadɔm no tee ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa.
Mmaransɛm No Mu Deɛ Ɛkyɛn Ne Nyinaa
Farisifoɔ no tee sɛ Yesu abu afa Sadukifoɔ no so no, wɔkɔhyiaa Yesu.
Wɔn mu baako a ɔyɛ mmaranimfoɔ bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Owura, Mose mmaransɛm no mu deɛ ɛwɔ he koraa na ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa?”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “ ‘Dɔ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn, wo koma nyinaa mu ne wo kra nyinaa mu ne wʼadwene nyinaa mu.’ Yei ne mmaransɛm no mu deɛ ɛdi kan na ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa. Deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu no te sɛ ɛno ara; ‘Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho.’ Mose mmaransɛm ne adiyifoɔ no nkyerɛkyerɛ no nyinaa gyina saa mmaransɛm mmienu yi so.”
Hwan Ba Ne Agyenkwa No?
Farisifoɔ no twaa Yesu ho hyiaeɛ no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na mowɔ ka wɔ Agyenkwa no ho? Hwan ba ne no?” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Dawid Ba.”
Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ “Ɛnneɛ, adɛn na Dawid nam Honhom Kronkron so frɛ no ‘Awurade? Ɛfiri sɛ, Dawid kaa sɛ,
“ ‘Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ me wura sɛ, Tena me nifa kɔsi sɛ mɛma woadi wʼatamfoɔ nyinaa so.’ Sɛ Dawid frɛ no ‘Awurade’ a, ɛnneɛ ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na watumi ayɛ ne ba?”
Obiara antumi ammua. Yei akyi nso, obiara antumi ammisa no nsɛm bio.
Mateo 23Yesu Ka Atwerɛsɛm No Akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ Anim
1Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no ne nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, 2“Atwerɛsɛm no Akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no na wɔkyerɛ Mose mmara no ase. 3Yei nti, ɛsɛ sɛ motie wɔn, na moyɔ biribiara a wɔbɛka akyerɛ mo sɛ monyɔ no. Nanso, monnnyɛ deɛ wɔyɔ no bi ɛfiri sɛ, deɛ wɔka kyerɛ mo no, ɛnyɛ ɛno na wɔyɔ. 4Wɔhyɛ mo, ma modi mmara a ɛyɛ den so a wɔn ankasa mpɛ sɛ wɔdi so.
5“Biribiara a wɔyɛ no yɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ. Wɔde sɛbɛ a twerɛ nsɛm bi hyɛ mu sɛn wɔn nsa, hyɛ ntadeɛ yuu kyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛ ateneneefoɔ. 6Na sɛ wɔkɔ apontoɔ ase nso a, wɔpɛ sɛ daa wɔtena mpanin tenabea. Afei, wɔkɔ asɔre nso a, wɔpɛ sɛ wɔtena mpanin tenabea pa. 7Sɛ wode obuo kyea wɔn abɔnten so na wofrɛ wɔn ‘Rabi’ anaa ‘Owura’ a, ɛyɛ wɔn dɛ. 8Mommma obiara mmfrɛ mo saa. Ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn nko ara na ɔyɛ Owura. Mo nyinaa moyɛ pɛ sɛ anuanom. 9Mommfrɛ obiara wɔ asase so ha sɛ ‘Agya,’ ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ soro no nko ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfrɛ no saa. 10Na mommma wɔmmfrɛ mo ‘Owura,’ ɛfiri sɛ, ɔbaako pɛ na ɔyɛ mo wura a ɔne Agyenkwa no.
11“Wobrɛ wo ho ase som afoforɔ a, wobɛyɛ ɔkɛse. Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ kɛse a, yɛ ɔsomfoɔ. 12Na obiara a ɔbɛma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase; saa ara nso na obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.
Yesu Kasa Tia Nyaatwomyɛ
13“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, mosi afoforɔ Ɔsoro Ahennie ho kwan. Mo a, monkɔ mu. Mo nso a momma afoforɔ a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkɔ mu no kwan.
14“Nyaatwomfoɔ! Mobɔ mpaeɛ atenten wɔ mmɔnten so de kyerɛ sɛ moyɛ ateneneefoɔ wɔ berɛ a motu akunafoɔ firi wɔn afie mu.
15“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerekyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Mokɔ wiase afanan nyinaa sɛ mobɛnya onipa fua abɛfra mo mu. Na sɛ monya obi saa a, mosɛe no ma ɔyɛ ɔbonsam ba sene sɛdeɛ moteɛ no.
16“Monnue! Akwankyerɛfoɔ anifirafoɔ a moka sɛ, sɛ obi de asɔredan ka ntam a, ɛno deɛ, ɛnyɛ hwee. Na sɛ ɔde sikakɔkɔɔ a ɛwɔ asɔredan no mu ka ntam deɛ a, ɛnneɛ, ntam no kyekyere onii no. 17Anifirafoɔ nkwaseafoɔ! Asɔredan no ne emu sikakɔkɔɔ no mu deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛsom bo; sikakɔkɔɔ no anaa asɔredan no a ɛte sikakɔkɔɔ no ho no? 18Na moka sɛ, ‘Sɛ obi ka afɔremuka no ntam a, ɛnyɛ hwee. Na mmon, sɛ ɔka ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛgu afɔremuka no so ntam deɛ a, ɛkyekyere onii!’ 19Anifirafoɔ! Afɔremuka a ɛte ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛgu so no ho no ne ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛgu so no mu deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛsom bo? 20Sɛ woka afɔremuka no ntam a, woka afɔremuka no ne ɛso ayɛyɛdeɛ no nyinaa ntam, 21na sɛ woka asɔredan no ntam a, woka asɔredan no ne Onyankopɔn a ɔte mu no nyinaa ntam. 22Na sɛ woka ɔsoro ntam a, na woreka Onyankopɔn ahennwa ne Onyankopɔn no ankasa ntam.
23“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atweresɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Moyi ntotosoɔ du du wɔ afifideɛ a ɛwɔ mo mfikyifuo mu no ho, nanso mogya nnoɔma a ɛsom bo te sɛ atɛntenenee, ahummɔborɔ ne nokorɛdie. Ɛwom sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ moyiyi ntontosoɔ du du no deɛ, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mogya nnoɔma a ɛsom bo no. 24Anifirafoɔ akwankyerɛfoɔ! Mosɔne deɛ morenom so, yi mu nwansena nanso momene nantwie!
25“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Motwi mo kuruwa ne mo ayowa ho fɛfɛɛfɛ nanso emu no deɛ, asisie ne pɛsɛmenkomenya ahyɛ no ma tɔ. 26Farisifoɔ anifirafoɔ! Montwi kuruwa no mu kane, na kuruwa no ho nyinaa bɛte!
27“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ! Mote sɛ ɛda a wɔasra ho fɛfɛɛfɛ nanso awufoɔ nnompe ne nnoɔma funu ahyɛ mu ma tɔ. 28Moyɛ mo anim sɛ ateneneefoɔ, nanso bɔne ahodoɔ ahyɛ mo mu ma tɔ.
29“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne twerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Mosisi ada akɛseɛ ma adiyifoɔ a mo ara mo agyanom kunkum wɔn, na mode nhwiren gugu ateneneefoɔ a wɔkunkum wɔn no da so, 30na motwa mo ho ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ na yɛte ase saa berɛ no a, anka yɛrenyɛ bɔne a yɛn agyanom yɛeɛ no.’
31“Sɛ moka saa a, mobu mo ho fɔ sɛ moyɛ atirimuɔdenfoɔ mma. 32Na modi wɔn anammɔn akyi yɛ saa bɔne korɔ no ara bi pɛpɛɛpɛ. 33Awɔ! Nhurutoa mma! Mobɛyɛ dɛn adwane amanehunu gya mu atɛmmuo no?
34“Mɛsoma adiyifoɔ ne anyansafoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ aba mo nkyɛn. Mobɛbɔ wɔn mu bi asɛnnua mu aku wɔn. Mobɛbɔ ebinom akyi mmaa wɔ mo asɔredan mu, na moataa ebi firi nkuro so akɔ nkuro so. 35Na ateneneefoɔ mogya a moahwie agu asase so nyinaa, ɛfiri Habel so de kɔsi Barakia ba Sakaria a mokum no asɔredan ne afɔremuka ntam no, bɛba mo so. 36Mereka makyerɛ mo sɛ, atɛmmuo a wɔaboaboa ano no nyinaa bɛba nnɛmma yi so.
37“O Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wo a wokum adiyifoɔ, na wosi wɔn a wɔasoma wɔn wo nkyɛn aboɔ, mprɛ ahe na anka mepɛɛ sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano, sɛdeɛ akokɔbaatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban ase, nanso moampɛ! 38Wɔbɛgya mo fie fituo ama mo. 39Na mese mo sɛ, ɛfiri sɛsɛɛ morenhu me bio kɔsi sɛ, mobɛka sɛ, ‘Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no.’ ”Yesu Ka Atwerɛsɛm No Akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ Anim
Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no ne nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Atwerɛsɛm no Akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no na wɔkyerɛ Mose mmara no ase. Yei nti, ɛsɛ sɛ motie wɔn, na moyɔ biribiara a wɔbɛka akyerɛ mo sɛ monyɔ no. Nanso, monnnyɛ deɛ wɔyɔ no bi ɛfiri sɛ, deɛ wɔka kyerɛ mo no, ɛnyɛ ɛno na wɔyɔ. Wɔhyɛ mo, ma modi mmara a ɛyɛ den so a wɔn ankasa mpɛ sɛ wɔdi so.
“Biribiara a wɔyɛ no yɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ. Wɔde sɛbɛ a twerɛ nsɛm bi hyɛ mu sɛn wɔn nsa, hyɛ ntadeɛ yuu kyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛ ateneneefoɔ. Na sɛ wɔkɔ apontoɔ ase nso a, wɔpɛ sɛ daa wɔtena mpanin tenabea. Afei, wɔkɔ asɔre nso a, wɔpɛ sɛ wɔtena mpanin tenabea pa. Sɛ wode obuo kyea wɔn abɔnten so na wofrɛ wɔn ‘Rabi’ anaa ‘Owura’ a, ɛyɛ wɔn dɛ. Mommma obiara mmfrɛ mo saa. Ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn nko ara na ɔyɛ Owura. Mo nyinaa moyɛ pɛ sɛ anuanom. Mommfrɛ obiara wɔ asase so ha sɛ ‘Agya,’ ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ soro no nko ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfrɛ no saa. Na mommma wɔmmfrɛ mo ‘Owura,’ ɛfiri sɛ, ɔbaako pɛ na ɔyɛ mo wura a ɔne Agyenkwa no.
“Wobrɛ wo ho ase som afoforɔ a, wobɛyɛ ɔkɛse. Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ kɛse a, yɛ ɔsomfoɔ. Na obiara a ɔbɛma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase; saa ara nso na obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.
Yesu Kasa Tia Nyaatwomyɛ
“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, mosi afoforɔ Ɔsoro Ahennie ho kwan. Mo a, monkɔ mu. Mo nso a momma afoforɔ a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkɔ mu no kwan.
“Nyaatwomfoɔ! Mobɔ mpaeɛ atenten wɔ mmɔnten so de kyerɛ sɛ moyɛ ateneneefoɔ wɔ berɛ a motu akunafoɔ firi wɔn afie mu.
“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerekyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Mokɔ wiase afanan nyinaa sɛ mobɛnya onipa fua abɛfra mo mu. Na sɛ monya obi saa a, mosɛe no ma ɔyɛ ɔbonsam ba sene sɛdeɛ moteɛ no.
“Monnue! Akwankyerɛfoɔ anifirafoɔ a moka sɛ, sɛ obi de asɔredan ka ntam a, ɛno deɛ, ɛnyɛ hwee. Na sɛ ɔde sikakɔkɔɔ a ɛwɔ asɔredan no mu ka ntam deɛ a, ɛnneɛ, ntam no kyekyere onii no. Anifirafoɔ nkwaseafoɔ! Asɔredan no ne emu sikakɔkɔɔ no mu deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛsom bo; sikakɔkɔɔ no anaa asɔredan no a ɛte sikakɔkɔɔ no ho no? Na moka sɛ, ‘Sɛ obi ka afɔremuka no ntam a, ɛnyɛ hwee. Na mmon, sɛ ɔka ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛgu afɔremuka no so ntam deɛ a, ɛkyekyere onii!’ Anifirafoɔ! Afɔremuka a ɛte ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛgu so no ho no ne ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛgu so no mu deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛsom bo? Sɛ woka afɔremuka no ntam a, woka afɔremuka no ne ɛso ayɛyɛdeɛ no nyinaa ntam, na sɛ woka asɔredan no ntam a, woka asɔredan no ne Onyankopɔn a ɔte mu no nyinaa ntam. Na sɛ woka ɔsoro ntam a, na woreka Onyankopɔn ahennwa ne Onyankopɔn no ankasa ntam.
“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atweresɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Moyi ntotosoɔ du du wɔ afifideɛ a ɛwɔ mo mfikyifuo mu no ho, nanso mogya nnoɔma a ɛsom bo te sɛ atɛntenenee, ahummɔborɔ ne nokorɛdie. Ɛwom sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ moyiyi ntontosoɔ du du no deɛ, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mogya nnoɔma a ɛsom bo no. Anifirafoɔ akwankyerɛfoɔ! Mosɔne deɛ morenom so, yi mu nwansena nanso momene nantwie!
“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Motwi mo kuruwa ne mo ayowa ho fɛfɛɛfɛ nanso emu no deɛ, asisie ne pɛsɛmenkomenya ahyɛ no ma tɔ. Farisifoɔ anifirafoɔ! Montwi kuruwa no mu kane, na kuruwa no ho nyinaa bɛte!
“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ! Mote sɛ ɛda a wɔasra ho fɛfɛɛfɛ nanso awufoɔ nnompe ne nnoɔma funu ahyɛ mu ma tɔ. Moyɛ mo anim sɛ ateneneefoɔ, nanso bɔne ahodoɔ ahyɛ mo mu ma tɔ.
“Monnue! Mo Farisifoɔ ne twerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyaatwomfoɔ! Mosisi ada akɛseɛ ma adiyifoɔ a mo ara mo agyanom kunkum wɔn, na mode nhwiren gugu ateneneefoɔ a wɔkunkum wɔn no da so, na motwa mo ho ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ na yɛte ase saa berɛ no a, anka yɛrenyɛ bɔne a yɛn agyanom yɛeɛ no.’
“Sɛ moka saa a, mobu mo ho fɔ sɛ moyɛ atirimuɔdenfoɔ mma. Na modi wɔn anammɔn akyi yɛ saa bɔne korɔ no ara bi pɛpɛɛpɛ. Awɔ! Nhurutoa mma! Mobɛyɛ dɛn adwane amanehunu gya mu atɛmmuo no?
“Mɛsoma adiyifoɔ ne anyansafoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ aba mo nkyɛn. Mobɛbɔ wɔn mu bi asɛnnua mu aku wɔn. Mobɛbɔ ebinom akyi mmaa wɔ mo asɔredan mu, na moataa ebi firi nkuro so akɔ nkuro so. Na ateneneefoɔ mogya a moahwie agu asase so nyinaa, ɛfiri Habel so de kɔsi Barakia ba Sakaria a mokum no asɔredan ne afɔremuka ntam no, bɛba mo so. Mereka makyerɛ mo sɛ, atɛmmuo a wɔaboaboa ano no nyinaa bɛba nnɛmma yi so.
“O Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wo a wokum adiyifoɔ, na wosi wɔn a wɔasoma wɔn wo nkyɛn aboɔ, mprɛ ahe na anka mepɛɛ sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano, sɛdeɛ akokɔbaatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban ase, nanso moampɛ! Wɔbɛgya mo fie fituo ama mo. Na mese mo sɛ, ɛfiri sɛsɛɛ morenhu me bio kɔsi sɛ, mobɛka sɛ, ‘Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no.’ ”
Mateo 24Asɔredansɛeɛ Ho Nkɔmhyɛ
1Yesu refiri baabi a asɔredan no si hɔ no, nʼasuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn pɛɛ sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ no adan ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ asɔredan no mu.
2Nanso, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Wɔbɛdwiri saa dan yi agu pasaa!”
Ɔhaw ne Ɔtaa
3Yesu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so. Ɔte hɔ no, nʼasuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛberɛ bɛn na deɛ woreka yi bɛba? Na nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛn na ɛbɛma yɛahunu wo ba a wobɛsan aba bio no ne wiase awieeɛ a ɛbɛba no?”
4Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monhwɛ na obi annaadaa mo. 5Nnipa bebree de me din bɛba abɛka sɛ, wɔne Agyenkwa no, na wɔadaadaa mo mu pii. 6Sɛ mote sɛ wɔafiri akodie ase a, ɛnkyerɛ me ba a mɛsan aba no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne. Ɛsɛ sɛ yeinom ba, nanso awieeɛ no deɛ, ɛnnya mmaeɛ. 7Aman bɛsɔre aman so, na ahennie asɔre ahennie so, na ɔkɔm ne asasewosoɔ bɛba mmeammea. 8Yeinom nyinaa bɛyɛ nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu a ɛbɛba no mfitiaseɛ.
9“Sɛ moyɛ me deɛ nti, wɔbɛyɛ mo ayayadeɛ, na wɔaku mo wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa, 10na mo mu pii bɛsan akɔ bɔne mu, na moayiyi mo ho mo ho ama, na moatan mo ho. 11Atorɔ adiyifoɔ bebree bɛsɔre, na wɔadaadaa mo mu pii. 12Bɔne bɛdɔɔso wɔ wiase, na abrɛ nnipa dɔ a wɔwɔ no ase. 13Nanso, wɔn a wɔbɛgyina pintinn akɔduru awieeɛ no, wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa.
14“Na wɔbɛka asɛmpa a ɛfa Ahennie no ho no wɔ wiase mmaa nyinaa, na wɔate. Ɛno akyi ansa na awieeɛ no bɛba.
Ahohia A Ɛyɛ Hu
15“Enti, sɛ mohunu ‘Adeɛ a Ɛyɛ Hu’ a, Odiyifoɔ Daniel kaa ho asɛm sɛ ɛgyina kronkronbea hɔ no a, ‘Deɛ ɔkenkan no ɔnte yei ase!’ 16Wɔn a wɔte Yudea no nnwane nkɔ Yuda mmepɔ so. 17Wɔn a wɔtete wɔn afie mu no nso nnwane a wɔmfa biribiara mfiri wɔn adan mu. 18Wɔn a wɔwɔ mfuom no nso nnsan wɔn akyi mmɛfa wɔn ntoma.
19“Na wɔn a wɔafa afuro ne wɔn a wɔturu mma saa berɛ no mu no nnue. 20Na mommɔ mpaeɛ na ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ modwane no anyɛ awɔberɛ anaa Homeda. 21Ɛfiri sɛ, ɔtaa a ɛbɛba no, ebi nsii wɔ wiase abakɔsɛm mu da, na ebi nso rensi da.
22“Nokorɛm, sɛ wɔantwa saa nna no so a, nnipa nyinaa ase bɛtɔre.
23“Sɛ obi ka kyerɛ mo sɛ, ‘Agyenkwa no wɔ ha anaasɛ ɔwɔ dohoa anaa wayi ne ho adi wɔ ha anaa ɛhɔ’ a, monnnye nnni. 24Atorɔ Kristofoɔ ne atorɔ adiyifoɔ bɛsɔre, na wɔayɛ anwanwadeɛ ahodoɔ na sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, wɔadaadaa wɔn mpo a Onyankopɔn ayi wɔn no. 25Mabɔ mo kɔkɔ dada.
Onipa Ba No
26“Enti, sɛ obi ka kyerɛ mo sɛ, Agyenkwa no asan aba na ɔwɔ ɛserɛ so a, monnha mo ho sɛ mobɛkɔ hɔ akɔhwehwɛ no. Anaasɛ nso ɔde ne ho asie baabi a, monnnye nnni! 27Na sɛdeɛ anyinam pa firi apueeɛ kɔ atɔeɛ no, saa ara na sɛ Onipa Ba no reba a, ɛbɛyɛ ara ne no. 28Na deɛ efunu wɔ no, ɛhɔ na apete mpa.
29“Ɔtaa no akyiri pɛ, awia bɛduru sum, na ɔsram renhyerɛn, na nsoromma bɛtete ahwe, na wɔbɛwoso tumi a ɛwɔ soro no.
30“Afei, Onipa Ba no ba no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛda adi, na ɛsoro ne asase sofoɔ nyinaa bɛtwa agyaadwoɔ. Na wiase amanaman bɛhu me, sɛ mede tumi ne animuonyam nam ɛsoro mununkum mu reba. 31Na mɛsoma mʼabɔfoɔ a wɔrebɔ mmɛnson aba, na wɔbɛboaboa wɔn a mayi wɔn no ano firi ɛsoro ano kɔka asase ano.
32“Afei, monsua biribi mfiri ankaa dua no ho asɛm no mu. Sɛ ɛyi mman foforɔ, san yi ahaban foforɔ a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ asusɔ atue. 33Saa ara nso na sɛ mohunu sɛ saa nnoɔma yi nyinaa afiti aseɛ resisi a, mobɛhunu sɛ meba a mɛsan aba no abɛn, aduru apon ano. 34Nokorɛ me se mo sɛ, awontoatoasoɔ yi rentwam, gye sɛ saa nnoɔma yi nyinaa aba mu ansa.
35“Ɛsoro na asase bɛtwam akɔ, na me nsɛm deɛ, ɛbɛtena hɔ daa. 36Nanso, ɛda anaa dɔn ko a awieeɛ no bɛba deɛ, obiara nnim. Ɔsoro abɔfoɔ ne Onyankopɔn Ba no mpo nnim. Agya no nko na ɔnim.
37“Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛba no, bɛyɛ sɛdeɛ Noa berɛ so ɛyɛeɛ no ara pɛ. 38Na sɛdeɛ nna a ɛdi nsuyire no anim no, nnipa didiiɛ, na wɔnomeeɛ, warewareeɛ, de kɔsii da a Noa kɔɔ ɛhyɛn no mu, 39na nnipa annye deɛ ɛbɛba anni, kɔsii sɛ nsuyire bɛfaa wɔn nyinaa kɔeɛ no, saa ara na me ba a mɛsan aba no bɛyɛ.
40“Saa berɛ no, wɔbɛfa mmarima baanu a wɔreyɔ adwuma wɔ afuom no mu baako akɔ, na wɔagya ɔbaako. 41Saa ara nso na mmaa baanu a wɔwɔ fie renoa aduane no nso, wɔbɛfa ɔbaako agya ɔbaako no no. 42Enti, monwɛn ɛfiri sɛ, monnim da ko a Awurade bɛba.
43“Sɛdeɛ onipa tumi wɛn de bɔ ne ho ban firi akorɔmfoɔ ho no, 44saa ara na mobɛtumi asiesie mo ho, awɛn de atwɛn me ba a mɛba a obiara nnim berɛ ko no.
Akoa Pa anaa Akoa Bɔne
45“Woyɛ Awurade akoa onyansafoɔ nokwafoɔ anaa? Mama wo adwuma sɛ hwɛ me fie so, na da biara ma me mʼasomfoɔ aduane nni anaa? 46Nhyira nka wo sɛ, mɛsan aba abɛto wo sɛ, wode nokorɛ reyɔ wʼadwuma. 47Mede biribiara a mewɔ no bɛhyɛ saa nokwafoɔ no nsa na wahwɛ so! 48Na sɛ woyɛ akoa bɔne, na woka kyerɛ wo ho sɛ, ‘Me Wura nnya mmaeɛ,’ 49na wofiti aseɛ ha wo mfɛfoɔ nkoa, na wodidi, boro nsa a, 50wo Wura no bɛba ɛda a wʼani nna no kwan, 51na wabɛtwa wo mmaa a ano yɛ den, na ɔde wo akɔ deɛ wɔbu nyaatwomfoɔ atɛn; ɛhɔ na esu ne agyaadwoɔ wɔ.Asɔredansɛeɛ Ho Nkɔmhyɛ
Yesu refiri baabi a asɔredan no si hɔ no, nʼasuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn pɛɛ sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ no adan ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ asɔredan no mu.
Nanso, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Wɔbɛdwiri saa dan yi agu pasaa!”
Ɔhaw ne Ɔtaa
Yesu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so. Ɔte hɔ no, nʼasuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛberɛ bɛn na deɛ woreka yi bɛba? Na nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛn na ɛbɛma yɛahunu wo ba a wobɛsan aba bio no ne wiase awieeɛ a ɛbɛba no?”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monhwɛ na obi annaadaa mo. Nnipa bebree de me din bɛba abɛka sɛ, wɔne Agyenkwa no, na wɔadaadaa mo mu pii. Sɛ mote sɛ wɔafiri akodie ase a, ɛnkyerɛ me ba a mɛsan aba no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne. Ɛsɛ sɛ yeinom ba, nanso awieeɛ no deɛ, ɛnnya mmaeɛ. Aman bɛsɔre aman so, na ahennie asɔre ahennie so, na ɔkɔm ne asasewosoɔ bɛba mmeammea. Yeinom nyinaa bɛyɛ nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu a ɛbɛba no mfitiaseɛ.
“Sɛ moyɛ me deɛ nti, wɔbɛyɛ mo ayayadeɛ, na wɔaku mo wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa, na mo mu pii bɛsan akɔ bɔne mu, na moayiyi mo ho mo ho ama, na moatan mo ho. Atorɔ adiyifoɔ bebree bɛsɔre, na wɔadaadaa mo mu pii. Bɔne bɛdɔɔso wɔ wiase, na abrɛ nnipa dɔ a wɔwɔ no ase. Nanso, wɔn a wɔbɛgyina pintinn akɔduru awieeɛ no, wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa.
“Na wɔbɛka asɛmpa a ɛfa Ahennie no ho no wɔ wiase mmaa nyinaa, na wɔate. Ɛno akyi ansa na awieeɛ no bɛba.
Ahohia A Ɛyɛ Hu
“Enti, sɛ mohunu ‘Adeɛ a Ɛyɛ Hu’ a, Odiyifoɔ Daniel kaa ho asɛm sɛ ɛgyina kronkronbea hɔ no a, ‘Deɛ ɔkenkan no ɔnte yei ase!’ Wɔn a wɔte Yudea no nnwane nkɔ Yuda mmepɔ so. Wɔn a wɔtete wɔn afie mu no nso nnwane a wɔmfa biribiara mfiri wɔn adan mu. Wɔn a wɔwɔ mfuom no nso nnsan wɔn akyi mmɛfa wɔn ntoma.
“Na wɔn a wɔafa afuro ne wɔn a wɔturu mma saa berɛ no mu no nnue. Na mommɔ mpaeɛ na ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ modwane no anyɛ awɔberɛ anaa Homeda. Ɛfiri sɛ, ɔtaa a ɛbɛba no, ebi nsii wɔ wiase abakɔsɛm mu da, na ebi nso rensi da.
“Nokorɛm, sɛ wɔantwa saa nna no so a, nnipa nyinaa ase bɛtɔre.
“Sɛ obi ka kyerɛ mo sɛ, ‘Agyenkwa no wɔ ha anaasɛ ɔwɔ dohoa anaa wayi ne ho adi wɔ ha anaa ɛhɔ’ a, monnnye nnni. Atorɔ Kristofoɔ ne atorɔ adiyifoɔ bɛsɔre, na wɔayɛ anwanwadeɛ ahodoɔ na sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, wɔadaadaa wɔn mpo a Onyankopɔn ayi wɔn no. Mabɔ mo kɔkɔ dada.
Onipa Ba No
“Enti, sɛ obi ka kyerɛ mo sɛ, Agyenkwa no asan aba na ɔwɔ ɛserɛ so a, monnha mo ho sɛ mobɛkɔ hɔ akɔhwehwɛ no. Anaasɛ nso ɔde ne ho asie baabi a, monnnye nnni! Na sɛdeɛ anyinam pa firi apueeɛ kɔ atɔeɛ no, saa ara na sɛ Onipa Ba no reba a, ɛbɛyɛ ara ne no. Na deɛ efunu wɔ no, ɛhɔ na apete mpa.
“Ɔtaa no akyiri pɛ, awia bɛduru sum, na ɔsram renhyerɛn, na nsoromma bɛtete ahwe, na wɔbɛwoso tumi a ɛwɔ soro no.
“Afei, Onipa Ba no ba no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛda adi, na ɛsoro ne asase sofoɔ nyinaa bɛtwa agyaadwoɔ. Na wiase amanaman bɛhu me, sɛ mede tumi ne animuonyam nam ɛsoro mununkum mu reba. Na mɛsoma mʼabɔfoɔ a wɔrebɔ mmɛnson aba, na wɔbɛboaboa wɔn a mayi wɔn no ano firi ɛsoro ano kɔka asase ano.
“Afei, monsua biribi mfiri ankaa dua no ho asɛm no mu. Sɛ ɛyi mman foforɔ, san yi ahaban foforɔ a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ asusɔ atue. Saa ara nso na sɛ mohunu sɛ saa nnoɔma yi nyinaa afiti aseɛ resisi a, mobɛhunu sɛ meba a mɛsan aba no abɛn, aduru apon ano. Nokorɛ me se mo sɛ, awontoatoasoɔ yi rentwam, gye sɛ saa nnoɔma yi nyinaa aba mu ansa.
“Ɛsoro na asase bɛtwam akɔ, na me nsɛm deɛ, ɛbɛtena hɔ daa. Nanso, ɛda anaa dɔn ko a awieeɛ no bɛba deɛ, obiara nnim. Ɔsoro abɔfoɔ ne Onyankopɔn Ba no mpo nnim. Agya no nko na ɔnim.
“Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛba no, bɛyɛ sɛdeɛ Noa berɛ so ɛyɛeɛ no ara pɛ. Na sɛdeɛ nna a ɛdi nsuyire no anim no, nnipa didiiɛ, na wɔnomeeɛ, warewareeɛ, de kɔsii da a Noa kɔɔ ɛhyɛn no mu, na nnipa annye deɛ ɛbɛba anni, kɔsii sɛ nsuyire bɛfaa wɔn nyinaa kɔeɛ no, saa ara na me ba a mɛsan aba no bɛyɛ.
“Saa berɛ no, wɔbɛfa mmarima baanu a wɔreyɔ adwuma wɔ afuom no mu baako akɔ, na wɔagya ɔbaako. Saa ara nso na mmaa baanu a wɔwɔ fie renoa aduane no nso, wɔbɛfa ɔbaako agya ɔbaako no no. Enti, monwɛn ɛfiri sɛ, monnim da ko a Awurade bɛba.
“Sɛdeɛ onipa tumi wɛn de bɔ ne ho ban firi akorɔmfoɔ ho no, saa ara na mobɛtumi asiesie mo ho, awɛn de atwɛn me ba a mɛba a obiara nnim berɛ ko no.
Akoa Pa anaa Akoa Bɔne
“Woyɛ Awurade akoa onyansafoɔ nokwafoɔ anaa? Mama wo adwuma sɛ hwɛ me fie so, na da biara ma me mʼasomfoɔ aduane nni anaa? Nhyira nka wo sɛ, mɛsan aba abɛto wo sɛ, wode nokorɛ reyɔ wʼadwuma. Mede biribiara a mewɔ no bɛhyɛ saa nokwafoɔ no nsa na wahwɛ so! Na sɛ woyɛ akoa bɔne, na woka kyerɛ wo ho sɛ, ‘Me Wura nnya mmaeɛ,’ na wofiti aseɛ ha wo mfɛfoɔ nkoa, na wodidi, boro nsa a, wo Wura no bɛba ɛda a wʼani nna no kwan, na wabɛtwa wo mmaa a ano yɛ den, na ɔde wo akɔ deɛ wɔbu nyaatwomfoɔ atɛn; ɛhɔ na esu ne agyaadwoɔ wɔ.
Mateo 25Mmabaawa Du No Ho Bɛ
1“Ɔsoro Ahennie te sɛ mmabaawa du bi a wɔfaa wɔn akanea sɛ wɔrekɔhyia ayeforɔkunu. 2Na mmabaawa no mu baanum yɛ anyansafoɔ ɛnna baanum nso yɛ nkwaseafoɔ. 3Wɔn mu nkwaseafoɔ no rekɔ no, wɔfaa wɔn akanea nanso wɔamfa krasin anka ho. 4Nanso, wɔn mu anyansafoɔ no deɛ, wɔrekorɔ no, wɔfaa krasin kaa wɔn akanea ho de kɔeɛ.
5“Ayeforɔkunu no amma ntɛm, enti wɔfitii aseɛ totɔɔ nko dedaeɛ. 6Ɔdasuom na wɔtee nteateamu sɛ, ‘Ayeforɔkunu no reba! Momfiri adi nkɔhyia no!’
7“Mmabaawa yi nyinaa sɔre buebuee wɔn akanea no. 8Nkwaseafoɔ no srɛɛ anyansafoɔ no sɛ, ‘Momma yɛn mo krasin no bi ngu yɛn akanea no mu na ɛredum.’
9“Anyansafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Krasin a yɛwɔ no sua. Monkɔ kurom nkɔtɔ bi.’
10“Wɔrekɔtɔ krasin no pɛ, na ayeforɔkunu no baeɛ. Enti, wɔn a wɔasiesie wɔn ho no ne ayeforɔkunu no kɔɔ nʼapontoɔ no ase, na wɔtoo ɛpono no mu.
11“Akyire yi a baanum no san baeɛ no, wɔgyinaa ɛpono no akyi frɛɛ sɛ, ‘Owura, hini yɛn!’
12“Nanso, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momfiri hɔ nkɔ. Mennim mo!’
13“Enti, monwɛn na monnim da anaa dɔn ko a mɛsan aba.
Apaafoɔ Baasa Bi Ho Bɛ
14“Bio, Ɔsoro Ahennie te sɛ ɔbarima bi a ɔretu kwan akɔ ɔman foforɔ bi so. Ɔrekɔ no, ɔfrɛɛ nʼapaafoɔ baasa, maa wɔn mu biara sika a ɛfata sɛ wɔmfa nyɔ adwuma.
15“Ɔmaa ɔbaako sidi mpemnum. Ɔmaa deɛ ɔdi hɔ no sidi mpenu ɛnna ɔmaa deɛ ɔtwa toɔ no sidi apem. 16Ɔpaani a ɔmaa no sidi mpemnum no de sika no kɔdii dwa, nyaa mfasoɔ sidi mpemnum kaa ho. 17Deɛ ɔnyaa sidi mpenu no nso, de sika no kɔyɔɔ adwuma nyaa mfasoɔ sidi mpenu kaa ne sika no ho.
18“Nanso, ɔpaani a ne wura maa no sidi apem no deɛ, ɔkɔtuu fam de sika no siee hɔ.
19“Mmerɛ bi akyi, wɔn wura no firi akwantuom baeɛ. Ɔfrɛɛ apaafoɔ baasa yi sɛ wɔmmɛbu nkonta nkyerɛ no. 20Deɛ ɔmaa no sidi mpemnum no brɛɛ no sidi ɔpedu.
21“Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mo, akoa pa ne nokwafoɔ, woadi kakra yi ho nokorɛ, mede wo bɛsi nnoɔma pii so panin. Bra, na me ne wo nni dɛ!’
22“Ɔpaani a ɔmaa no sidi mpenu no nso baeɛ. Ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura no sɛ, ‘Worekɔ no, womaa me sidi mpenu. Mede yɔɔ adwuma, na manya sidi mpenu aka ho’.
23“Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mo, akoa pa ne nokwafoɔ, woadi kakra yi ho nokorɛ, mede wo bɛsi nnoɔma pii so panin. Bra, na me ne wo nni dɛ!’
24“Ɔpaani a ɔnyaa sidi apem no nso baeɛ. Ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura no sɛ, ‘Owura, menim sɛ woyɛ onipa a woyɛ den. Wotumi twa wɔ deɛ wonnuaeɛ, ɛnna wotumi boaboa ano wɔ deɛ wompeteeɛ; 25enti mesuroeɛ, na mede wo sika no kɔhyɛɛ fam, enti wʼadeɛ ni!’
26“Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ; ‘Akoa bɔne ne onihafoɔ! Wonim sɛ metumi twa wɔ deɛ mennuaeɛ, na metumi boaboa ano wɔ deɛ mempeteeɛ a, 27anka ɛsɛ sɛ wode sika no yɔ adwuma, nya ho mfasoɔ to hɔ ma me 28Monnye ne nsam sika no, na momfa nkɔma deɛ ɔnyaa sidi ɔpedu no. 29Obiara a ɔde deɛ wɔde ama no no bɛyɔ ade pa no, wɔde bi bɛka no ho. Na obiara a wamfa deɛ wɔde ama no no anyɔ ade pa no, deɛ ɔwɔ no mpo, wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam. 30Monto akoa a ne ho nni mfasoɔ yi ntwene esum kabii mu: ɛhɔ na esu ne agyaadwoɔ wɔ.’
Atɛmmu Da No
31“Na sɛ Onipa Ba no ba nʼanimuonyam mu a abɔfoɔ nyinaa ka ne ho a, saa berɛ no na ɔbɛtena nʼanimuonyam ahennwa no so. 32Na wɔbɛboaboa aman nyinaa ano nʼanim. Na ɔbɛpa nnipa no mu sɛdeɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ pa nnwan firi mpɔnkye mu; 33na ɔde nnwan no bɛgyina ne nifa so, na ɔde mpɔnkye no agyina ne benkum so.
34“Ɛno na Ɔhene no, bɛka akyerɛ wɔn a wɔgyina ne nifa so no sɛ, ‘Mo a mʼagya ahyira mo, mommra mmɛfa ahennie a wɔasiesie ama mo firi wiase mfitiaseɛ no nni! 35Ɔkɔm dee me, na momaa me aduane diiɛ. Sukɔm dee me, na momaa me nsuo nomeeɛ. Meyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, na mode me kɔɔ mo fie. 36Medaa adagya na mofiraa me ntoma. Meyareeɛ, na mobɛsraa me. Medaa afiase, na mobɛhwɛɛ me.’
37“Saa berɛ no mu na ateneneefoɔ bɛbisa sɛ, ‘Owura, da bɛn na yɛhunuu wo sɛ ɔkɔm de wo a, yɛmaa wo aduane, na sukɔm de wo a yɛmaa wo nsuo nomeeɛ? 38Afei, da bɛn na yɛhunuu sɛ woyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ a, yɛde wo kɔɔ yɛn fie, anaasɛ wodaa adagya a, yɛfiraa wo ntoma? 39Afei, da bɛn na yɛhunuu sɛ woyare a, yɛbɛsraa wo, anaasɛ wodaa afiase a, yɛbɛhwɛɛ wo?’
40“Na me, Ɔhene no, bɛbua wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛ moayɔ ama me nuanom nkumaa yi mu baako yi, moayɔ ama me!’
41“Afei, mɛdane mʼani akyerɛ wɔn a wɔgyina me benkum so no aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Mo a wɔadome mo, wɔmfa mo nkɔgu ogyatannaa a ɛnnum da a wɔasɔ ama ɔbonsam ne nʼahokafoɔ no mu. 42Na ɔkɔm dee me, moamma me aduane anni, sukɔm dee me, moamma me nsuo annom. 43Meyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, moamfa me ankɔ mo fie. Medaa adagya, moamfira me ntoma. Meyareeɛ, moammɛsra me. Medaa afiase, moammɛhwɛ me.’
44“Wɔn nso bɛbua no sɛ, ‘Awurade, da bɛn na yɛhunuu wo sɛ ɔkɔm dee wo, anaasɛ sukɔm dee wo, anaasɛ woyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, anaasɛ wodaa adagya, anaasɛ woyareeɛ, anaasɛ wodaa afiase, na yɛanyɔ deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɔ amma wo?’
45“Na mɛbua wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛ moanyɔ amma nkumaa yi mu baako nti, moanyɔ amma me.’
46“Na wɔbɛkɔ ahoyera a ɛtoɔ ntwa da mu, na ateneneefoɔ akɔ nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ mu.”Mmabaawa Du No Ho Bɛ
“Ɔsoro Ahennie te sɛ mmabaawa du bi a wɔfaa wɔn akanea sɛ wɔrekɔhyia ayeforɔkunu. Na mmabaawa no mu baanum yɛ anyansafoɔ ɛnna baanum nso yɛ nkwaseafoɔ. Wɔn mu nkwaseafoɔ no rekɔ no, wɔfaa wɔn akanea nanso wɔamfa krasin anka ho. Nanso, wɔn mu anyansafoɔ no deɛ, wɔrekorɔ no, wɔfaa krasin kaa wɔn akanea ho de kɔeɛ.
“Ayeforɔkunu no amma ntɛm, enti wɔfitii aseɛ totɔɔ nko dedaeɛ. Ɔdasuom na wɔtee nteateamu sɛ, ‘Ayeforɔkunu no reba! Momfiri adi nkɔhyia no!’
“Mmabaawa yi nyinaa sɔre buebuee wɔn akanea no. Nkwaseafoɔ no srɛɛ anyansafoɔ no sɛ, ‘Momma yɛn mo krasin no bi ngu yɛn akanea no mu na ɛredum.’
“Anyansafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Krasin a yɛwɔ no sua. Monkɔ kurom nkɔtɔ bi.’
“Wɔrekɔtɔ krasin no pɛ, na ayeforɔkunu no baeɛ. Enti, wɔn a wɔasiesie wɔn ho no ne ayeforɔkunu no kɔɔ nʼapontoɔ no ase, na wɔtoo ɛpono no mu.
“Akyire yi a baanum no san baeɛ no, wɔgyinaa ɛpono no akyi frɛɛ sɛ, ‘Owura, hini yɛn!’
“Nanso, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momfiri hɔ nkɔ. Mennim mo!’
“Enti, monwɛn na monnim da anaa dɔn ko a mɛsan aba.
Apaafoɔ Baasa Bi Ho Bɛ
“Bio, Ɔsoro Ahennie te sɛ ɔbarima bi a ɔretu kwan akɔ ɔman foforɔ bi so. Ɔrekɔ no, ɔfrɛɛ nʼapaafoɔ baasa, maa wɔn mu biara sika a ɛfata sɛ wɔmfa nyɔ adwuma.
“Ɔmaa ɔbaako sidi mpemnum. Ɔmaa deɛ ɔdi hɔ no sidi mpenu ɛnna ɔmaa deɛ ɔtwa toɔ no sidi apem. Ɔpaani a ɔmaa no sidi mpemnum no de sika no kɔdii dwa, nyaa mfasoɔ sidi mpemnum kaa ho. Deɛ ɔnyaa sidi mpenu no nso, de sika no kɔyɔɔ adwuma nyaa mfasoɔ sidi mpenu kaa ne sika no ho.
“Nanso, ɔpaani a ne wura maa no sidi apem no deɛ, ɔkɔtuu fam de sika no siee hɔ.
“Mmerɛ bi akyi, wɔn wura no firi akwantuom baeɛ. Ɔfrɛɛ apaafoɔ baasa yi sɛ wɔmmɛbu nkonta nkyerɛ no. Deɛ ɔmaa no sidi mpemnum no brɛɛ no sidi ɔpedu.
“Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mo, akoa pa ne nokwafoɔ, woadi kakra yi ho nokorɛ, mede wo bɛsi nnoɔma pii so panin. Bra, na me ne wo nni dɛ!’
“Ɔpaani a ɔmaa no sidi mpenu no nso baeɛ. Ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura no sɛ, ‘Worekɔ no, womaa me sidi mpenu. Mede yɔɔ adwuma, na manya sidi mpenu aka ho’.
“Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mo, akoa pa ne nokwafoɔ, woadi kakra yi ho nokorɛ, mede wo bɛsi nnoɔma pii so panin. Bra, na me ne wo nni dɛ!’
“Ɔpaani a ɔnyaa sidi apem no nso baeɛ. Ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura no sɛ, ‘Owura, menim sɛ woyɛ onipa a woyɛ den. Wotumi twa wɔ deɛ wonnuaeɛ, ɛnna wotumi boaboa ano wɔ deɛ wompeteeɛ; enti mesuroeɛ, na mede wo sika no kɔhyɛɛ fam, enti wʼadeɛ ni!’
“Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ; ‘Akoa bɔne ne onihafoɔ! Wonim sɛ metumi twa wɔ deɛ mennuaeɛ, na metumi boaboa ano wɔ deɛ mempeteeɛ a, anka ɛsɛ sɛ wode sika no yɔ adwuma, nya ho mfasoɔ to hɔ ma me Monnye ne nsam sika no, na momfa nkɔma deɛ ɔnyaa sidi ɔpedu no. Obiara a ɔde deɛ wɔde ama no no bɛyɔ ade pa no, wɔde bi bɛka no ho. Na obiara a wamfa deɛ wɔde ama no no anyɔ ade pa no, deɛ ɔwɔ no mpo, wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam. Monto akoa a ne ho nni mfasoɔ yi ntwene esum kabii mu: ɛhɔ na esu ne agyaadwoɔ wɔ.’
Atɛmmu Da No
“Na sɛ Onipa Ba no ba nʼanimuonyam mu a abɔfoɔ nyinaa ka ne ho a, saa berɛ no na ɔbɛtena nʼanimuonyam ahennwa no so. Na wɔbɛboaboa aman nyinaa ano nʼanim. Na ɔbɛpa nnipa no mu sɛdeɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ pa nnwan firi mpɔnkye mu; na ɔde nnwan no bɛgyina ne nifa so, na ɔde mpɔnkye no agyina ne benkum so.
“Ɛno na Ɔhene no, bɛka akyerɛ wɔn a wɔgyina ne nifa so no sɛ, ‘Mo a mʼagya ahyira mo, mommra mmɛfa ahennie a wɔasiesie ama mo firi wiase mfitiaseɛ no nni! Ɔkɔm dee me, na momaa me aduane diiɛ. Sukɔm dee me, na momaa me nsuo nomeeɛ. Meyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, na mode me kɔɔ mo fie. Medaa adagya na mofiraa me ntoma. Meyareeɛ, na mobɛsraa me. Medaa afiase, na mobɛhwɛɛ me.’
“Saa berɛ no mu na ateneneefoɔ bɛbisa sɛ, ‘Owura, da bɛn na yɛhunuu wo sɛ ɔkɔm de wo a, yɛmaa wo aduane, na sukɔm de wo a yɛmaa wo nsuo nomeeɛ? Afei, da bɛn na yɛhunuu sɛ woyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ a, yɛde wo kɔɔ yɛn fie, anaasɛ wodaa adagya a, yɛfiraa wo ntoma? Afei, da bɛn na yɛhunuu sɛ woyare a, yɛbɛsraa wo, anaasɛ wodaa afiase a, yɛbɛhwɛɛ wo?’
“Na me, Ɔhene no, bɛbua wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛ moayɔ ama me nuanom nkumaa yi mu baako yi, moayɔ ama me!’
“Afei, mɛdane mʼani akyerɛ wɔn a wɔgyina me benkum so no aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Mo a wɔadome mo, wɔmfa mo nkɔgu ogyatannaa a ɛnnum da a wɔasɔ ama ɔbonsam ne nʼahokafoɔ no mu. Na ɔkɔm dee me, moamma me aduane anni, sukɔm dee me, moamma me nsuo annom. Meyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, moamfa me ankɔ mo fie. Medaa adagya, moamfira me ntoma. Meyareeɛ, moammɛsra me. Medaa afiase, moammɛhwɛ me.’
“Wɔn nso bɛbua no sɛ, ‘Awurade, da bɛn na yɛhunuu wo sɛ ɔkɔm dee wo, anaasɛ sukɔm dee wo, anaasɛ woyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, anaasɛ wodaa adagya, anaasɛ woyareeɛ, anaasɛ wodaa afiase, na yɛanyɔ deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɔ amma wo?’
“Na mɛbua wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛ moanyɔ amma nkumaa yi mu baako nti, moanyɔ amma me.’
“Na wɔbɛkɔ ahoyera a ɛtoɔ ntwa da mu, na ateneneefoɔ akɔ nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ mu.”
Mateo 26Wɔbɔ Yesu Ho Pɔ
1Yesu wiee nsɛm yi nyinaa ka no, ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, 2“Monim sɛ aka nnanu na Twam Afahyɛ no adu, na wɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ama, na wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu.”
3Saa berɛ no ara na asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin bi ahyia mu wɔ Ɔsɔfopanin Kaiafa fie, 4retu agyina ahwehwɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so akyere Yesu, aku no a obiara renhunu akyire. 5Nanso, wɔkaa sɛ, “Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔkye no Twam Afahyɛ no mu, anyɛ saa a, ɛde basabasayɛ bɛba ɔman no mu.”
Wɔsra Yesu Ngo wɔ Betania
6Afei, Yesu kɔɔ Betania na ɔkɔɔ Simon ɔkwatani fie. 7Ɔwɔ hɔ redidi no, ɔbaa bi a ɔkuta ngo hwamhwamhwam bi a ne boɔ yɛ den yie toa ma baa hɔ, bɛhwie guu Yesu tirim. 8Asuafoɔ no hunuiɛ no, anyɛ wɔn dɛ. Wɔkaa sɛ, “Adesɛeɛ yi ase ne sɛn? 9Anka wɔbɛtumi atɔn sradeɛ hwamhwanhwam yi anya sika bebree de ama ahiafoɔ.”
10Yesu hunuu wɔn adwene, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn na moka deɛ ɔbaa yi yɔeɛ yi ho asɛm saa? Wayɛ ade pa ama me. 11Mo ne ahiafoɔ wɔ ha daa, na me deɛ, me ne mo nni hɔ daa. 12Wahwie ngo hwamhwamhwam yi agu me so, de asiesie me nipadua ama me sie. 13Wɔde deɛ wayɔ yi bɛkae no daa. Wɔbɛka deɛ ɔyɔeɛ yi wɔ wiase baabiara a wɔbɛka asɛmpa no.”
Yuda Pene So Sɛ Ɔbɛyi Yesu Ama
14Afei, Yuda Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanin no nkyɛn, 15kɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ meyi Yesu ma mo a, ahe na mode bɛma me?” Wɔmaa no dwetɛ mpɔ aduasa 16Ɛfiri saa berɛ no, Yuda hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a ɔbɛfa so ayi no ama wɔn.
Yesu ne Nʼasuafoɔ Adidie a Ɛdi Akyire
17Twam Afahyɛ da a ɛdi kan no, asuafoɔ no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔdi Twam Afahyɛ no?”
18Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Monkɔ kuro no mu nkɔhunu ɔpanin asomasi nka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Yɛn Wura se, ne berɛ abɛn, na wo fie na ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no bɛdi Twam Afahyɛ no.’ ” 19Asuafoɔ no dii deɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no so, yɛɛ Twam Afahyɛ aduane a wɔbɛdi wɔ efie a wɔnyaeɛ no mu. 20Ɛduruu anwummerɛ a ɔne Dumienu no te adidiiɛ no, 21ɔkaa sɛ, “Mo mu baako bɛyi me ama.”
22Asɛm yi maa wɔn werɛ hoo yie, na wɔfirii aseɛ bisabisaa mmaako mmaako sɛ, “Awurade, ɛyɛ me anaa.”
23Yesu buaa sɛ, “Deɛ mɛdi kan de aduane ama no no, ɔno ne saa onipa no. 24Ɛsɛ sɛ Onipa Ba no wuo sɛdeɛ odiyifoɔ no hyɛɛ ne ho nkɔm no; nanso onipa a ɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ama no, nnue! Sɛ wanwo saa onipa no a, anka ɛyɛ.”
25Yuda nso bisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ɛyɛ me anaa?” Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Aane.”
Adidi Kronkron
26Ɛberɛ a wɔredidi no. Yesu faa brodo, na ɔhyiraa so bubuu mu, de maa nʼasuafoɔ no kaa sɛ: “Monnye nni, yei ne me nipadua.”
27Na ɔfaa kuruwa no, na ɔdaa ase no, ɔde maa wɔn kaa sɛ, “Mo nyinaa monnom bi, 28na yei ne me mogya a ɛhyɛ Apam Foforɔ no mu den, a wɔhwie gu ma nnipa bebree nya bɔne fakyɛ. 29Montie deɛ mereka yi yie. Merennom saa nsa yi bi bio da, de bɛkɔ akɔsi da a me ne mo bɛnom bi bio wɔ mʼAgya Ahennie no mu.”
30Na wɔtoo dwom wieeɛ no, wɔfirii adi kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so.
Yesu Hyɛ Petro Pa a Ɔbɛpa No no Ho Nkɔm
31Wɔduruu deɛ wɔrekɔ hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Anadwo yi, mo nyinaa bɛdwane agya me. Na wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn bɛbɔ odwanhwɛfoɔ no, na nnwankuo no abɔ apete.’ 32Na sɛ mesan ba nkwa mu bio a, mɛkɔ Galilea, na makɔhyia mo wɔ hɔ.”
33Petro ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Sɛ nnipa nyinaa bɛdwane agya wo a, me deɛ, merennwane nnya wo da.” 34Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Nokorɛm, anadwo yi, akokɔ remmɔn, na woapa me mprɛnsa!”
35Petro kaa bio sɛ, “Mɛdi kan mawu!” Asuafoɔ no nyinaa nso kaa saa asɛm korɔ yi ara.
Yesu Bɔ Mpaeɛ wɔ Getsemane
36Yesu de wɔn kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Getsemane. Wɔduruu hɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔntena hɔ ntwɛn no, na ɔrekɔ nʼanim kakra akɔbɔ mpaeɛ. 37Ɔfaa Petro ne Sebedeo mma baanu a wɔn din de Yakobo ne Yohane kaa ne ho. Ne werɛ fitii aseɛ hoeɛ, na ne ho nso yeraa no.
38Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Awerɛhoɔ ahyɛ me kra so de kɔ owuo mu. Montena ha na mo ne me nwɛn.”
39Na ɔkɔɔ nʼanim kakra, de nʼanim kɔbutuu fam bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “MʼAgya, sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, ma kuruwa yi ntwa me ho nkɔ. Nanso, deɛ wopɛ na ɛnyɔ, na nyɛ deɛ mepɛ.”
40Na ɔsan baa asuafoɔ baasa no nkyɛn bɛhunuu sɛ wɔadeda. Ɔfrɛɛ Petro bisaa no sɛ, “Petro, woantumi antena ase ne me annwɛn dɔnhwere baako pɛ mpo? 41Monwɛn na mommɔ mpaeɛ, na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu. Honhom pɛ deɛ, nanso ɔhonam yɛ mmerɛ!”
42Ɔsan gyaa wɔn hɔ bio kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “MʼAgya, sɛ kuruwa yi rentwa me ho nkɔ, na nom ara na ɛsɛ sɛ menom deɛ ɛwɔ mu no a, deɛ wopɛ nyɔ.”
43Ɔsan baa wɔn nkyɛn bio bɛhunuu wɔn sɛ wɔadeda ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔn ani kum yie. 44Ɔsan kɔɔ mpaebɔ a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa so kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ kaa asɛm korɔ no ara.
45Ɔsan baa asuafoɔ no nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Afei deɛ, monna na monhome. Nanso, ɛdɔn no adu. Wɔrebɛyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa! 46Monsɔre na yɛnkɔ! Monhwɛ! Deɛ ɔreyi me ama no na ɔreba no!”
Wɔkyere Yesu
47Ɔgu so rekasa no, Yuda a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako ne dɔm a Yudafoɔ mpanin asoma wɔn a wɔkutakuta nkrantɛ ne mmaa baa hɔ. 48Na Yuda aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔnkyere onipa a ɔbɛyɛ no atuu no, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔno ne onipa a wɔrehwehwɛ no no. 49Yuda baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbam no kaa sɛ, “Me wura, atuu!”
50Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Damfo, deɛ wobaa ha sɛ worebɛyɔ no, yɔ no ntɛm.” Ɛhɔ ara, wɔn a wɔne Yuda nam no kyeree Yesu.
51Wɔn a wɔka Yesu ho no mu baako twee ne nkrantɛ de twaa Ɔsɔfopanin no akoa bi aso.
52Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “To wo nkrantɛ no twene. Na wɔn a wɔtwe nkrantɛ no, nkrantɛ ano na wɔbɛwuo. 53Monnim sɛ mɛtumi aka akyerɛ mʼAgya na wasoma nʼabɔfoɔ mpempem aba ntɛm so, na wɔabɛbɔ yɛn ho ban? 54Nanso, sɛ meyɛ saa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na deɛ Atwerɛsɛm ka wɔ deɛ asi yi ho no bɛba mu?”
55Yesu bisaa ɛdɔm a wɔbaa ne soɔ no sɛ, “Meyɛ owudifoɔ nti na mode nkrantɛ ne mmaa aba me so sɛ mode rebɛkye me? Metenaa mo nkyɛn kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ asɔrefie da biara da, nso moansi me kwan. 56Nanso, yei nyinaa aba sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a deɛ adiyifoɔ no kaeɛ wɔ Atwerɛsɛm mu no bɛba mu.”
Saa berɛ no ara mu na asuafoɔ no nyinaa dwane gyaa no.
Yesu Gyina Kaiafa Anim
57Afei, ɛdɔm a wɔkyeree Yesu no de no kɔɔ Ɔsɔfopanin Kaiafa anim, baabi a Yudafoɔ mpanin nyinaa ahyia hɔ. 58Petro tee ne ho dii nnipadɔm no akyi baa Ɔsɔfopanin no fie hɔ bi. Ɔkɔtenaa asomfoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu sɛ ɔrehwɛ asɛm a ɛbɛsie.
59Asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ asɛnnifoɔ akunini nyinaa hyiaa wɔ hɔ hwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛnya adansefoɔ bi a wɔbɛdi adansekurumu ato Yesu so, na wɔagyina so abu no kumfɔ. 60Nnipa bebree bɛdii adanseɛ, nanso wɔhunuu sɛ wɔredi adansekurumu ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔn nsɛm a wɔka no nyinaa bɔ abira.
Akyire yi, nnipa baanu bi ba bɛkaa 61sɛ, “Saa onipa yi kaa sɛ, ‘Mɛtumi abubu Onyankopɔn asɔredan na masi no nnansa!’ ”
62Ɔsɔfopanin no sɔre bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na wowɔ ka? Wokaa saa anaasɛ woanka saa?” 63Nanso, Yesu ammua no.
Ɔsɔfopanin no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Meka Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no sɛ, sɛ wone Agyenkwa no, Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn!”
64Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Aane, woaka. Na daakye mobɛhu me, Agyenkwa no, sɛ mete Onyankopɔn nifa na menam omununkum mu resan aba.”
65Ɔsɔfopanin no sunsuanee nʼatadeɛ mu teaam sɛ, “Abususɛm! Adansefoɔ bɛn na wɔn ho hia yɛn bio? Mo nyinaa ate abususɛm a ɔkaeɛ no! 66Asɛm bɛn na mowɔ ka?”
Wɔn nyinaa teaam sɛ, “Ɔsɛ owuo! Ɔsɛ owuo! Ɔsɛ owuo!”
67Afei, wɔtee ntasuo guu nʼani so. Ebinom bobɔɔ no akutu na ebinom nso bobɔɔ no asotorɔ 68kaa sɛ, “Wone Agyenkwa no! Kyerɛ yɛn deɛ ɔbɔɔ wo?”
Petro Pa Yesu
69Saa berɛ no na Petro te adihɔ. Abaayewa bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Wo nso na wo ne Yesu na ɛnam. Mo nyinaa mofiri Galilea.”
70Nanso, Petro de abufuo san ne ho sɛ, “Mennim deɛ woreka yi ho hwee.”
71Akyire yi, abaayewa foforɔ bi hyiaa no ɛpono bi ano ka kyerɛɛ wɔn a ɔne wɔn gyina hɔ no sɛ, “Na saa ɔbarima yi ne Yesu Nasaretni no na ɛnam.”
72Petro de ntam san ne ho bio sɛ, “Mennim saa onipa a moreka ne ho asɛm no.”
73Ɛkyɛɛ kakra no, mmarima a wɔgyina hɔ no bi bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yɛnim sɛ woyɛ nʼasuafoɔ no mu baako, na wo kasa nso yi wo adi sɛ woyɛ Galileani.”
74Petro fitii aseɛ dii nse, kekaa ntam sɛ, “Mennim onipa no!”
Amonom hɔ ara na akokɔ bɔneeɛ. 75Ɛhɔ na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa” no. Na ɔfirii adi kɔsuiɛ.Wɔbɔ Yesu Ho Pɔ
Yesu wiee nsɛm yi nyinaa ka no, ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Monim sɛ aka nnanu na Twam Afahyɛ no adu, na wɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ama, na wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu.”
Saa berɛ no ara na asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin bi ahyia mu wɔ Ɔsɔfopanin Kaiafa fie, retu agyina ahwehwɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so akyere Yesu, aku no a obiara renhunu akyire. Nanso, wɔkaa sɛ, “Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔkye no Twam Afahyɛ no mu, anyɛ saa a, ɛde basabasayɛ bɛba ɔman no mu.”
Wɔsra Yesu Ngo wɔ Betania
Afei, Yesu kɔɔ Betania na ɔkɔɔ Simon ɔkwatani fie. Ɔwɔ hɔ redidi no, ɔbaa bi a ɔkuta ngo hwamhwamhwam bi a ne boɔ yɛ den yie toa ma baa hɔ, bɛhwie guu Yesu tirim. Asuafoɔ no hunuiɛ no, anyɛ wɔn dɛ. Wɔkaa sɛ, “Adesɛeɛ yi ase ne sɛn? Anka wɔbɛtumi atɔn sradeɛ hwamhwanhwam yi anya sika bebree de ama ahiafoɔ.”
Yesu hunuu wɔn adwene, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn na moka deɛ ɔbaa yi yɔeɛ yi ho asɛm saa? Wayɛ ade pa ama me. Mo ne ahiafoɔ wɔ ha daa, na me deɛ, me ne mo nni hɔ daa. Wahwie ngo hwamhwamhwam yi agu me so, de asiesie me nipadua ama me sie. Wɔde deɛ wayɔ yi bɛkae no daa. Wɔbɛka deɛ ɔyɔeɛ yi wɔ wiase baabiara a wɔbɛka asɛmpa no.”
Yuda Pene So Sɛ Ɔbɛyi Yesu Ama
Afei, Yuda Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanin no nkyɛn, kɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ meyi Yesu ma mo a, ahe na mode bɛma me?” Wɔmaa no dwetɛ mpɔ aduasa Ɛfiri saa berɛ no, Yuda hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a ɔbɛfa so ayi no ama wɔn.
Yesu ne Nʼasuafoɔ Adidie a Ɛdi Akyire
Twam Afahyɛ da a ɛdi kan no, asuafoɔ no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔdi Twam Afahyɛ no?”
Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Monkɔ kuro no mu nkɔhunu ɔpanin asomasi nka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Yɛn Wura se, ne berɛ abɛn, na wo fie na ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no bɛdi Twam Afahyɛ no.’ ” Asuafoɔ no dii deɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no so, yɛɛ Twam Afahyɛ aduane a wɔbɛdi wɔ efie a wɔnyaeɛ no mu. Ɛduruu anwummerɛ a ɔne Dumienu no te adidiiɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Mo mu baako bɛyi me ama.”
Asɛm yi maa wɔn werɛ hoo yie, na wɔfirii aseɛ bisabisaa mmaako mmaako sɛ, “Awurade, ɛyɛ me anaa.”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Deɛ mɛdi kan de aduane ama no no, ɔno ne saa onipa no. Ɛsɛ sɛ Onipa Ba no wuo sɛdeɛ odiyifoɔ no hyɛɛ ne ho nkɔm no; nanso onipa a ɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ama no, nnue! Sɛ wanwo saa onipa no a, anka ɛyɛ.”
Yuda nso bisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ɛyɛ me anaa?” Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Aane.”
Adidi Kronkron
Ɛberɛ a wɔredidi no. Yesu faa brodo, na ɔhyiraa so bubuu mu, de maa nʼasuafoɔ no kaa sɛ: “Monnye nni, yei ne me nipadua.”
Na ɔfaa kuruwa no, na ɔdaa ase no, ɔde maa wɔn kaa sɛ, “Mo nyinaa monnom bi, na yei ne me mogya a ɛhyɛ Apam Foforɔ no mu den, a wɔhwie gu ma nnipa bebree nya bɔne fakyɛ. Montie deɛ mereka yi yie. Merennom saa nsa yi bi bio da, de bɛkɔ akɔsi da a me ne mo bɛnom bi bio wɔ mʼAgya Ahennie no mu.”
Na wɔtoo dwom wieeɛ no, wɔfirii adi kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so.
Yesu Hyɛ Petro Pa a Ɔbɛpa No no Ho Nkɔm
Wɔduruu deɛ wɔrekɔ hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Anadwo yi, mo nyinaa bɛdwane agya me. Na wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn bɛbɔ odwanhwɛfoɔ no, na nnwankuo no abɔ apete.’ Na sɛ mesan ba nkwa mu bio a, mɛkɔ Galilea, na makɔhyia mo wɔ hɔ.”
Petro ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Sɛ nnipa nyinaa bɛdwane agya wo a, me deɛ, merennwane nnya wo da.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Nokorɛm, anadwo yi, akokɔ remmɔn, na woapa me mprɛnsa!”
Petro kaa bio sɛ, “Mɛdi kan mawu!” Asuafoɔ no nyinaa nso kaa saa asɛm korɔ yi ara.
Yesu Bɔ Mpaeɛ wɔ Getsemane
Yesu de wɔn kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Getsemane. Wɔduruu hɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔntena hɔ ntwɛn no, na ɔrekɔ nʼanim kakra akɔbɔ mpaeɛ. Ɔfaa Petro ne Sebedeo mma baanu a wɔn din de Yakobo ne Yohane kaa ne ho. Ne werɛ fitii aseɛ hoeɛ, na ne ho nso yeraa no.
Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Awerɛhoɔ ahyɛ me kra so de kɔ owuo mu. Montena ha na mo ne me nwɛn.”
Na ɔkɔɔ nʼanim kakra, de nʼanim kɔbutuu fam bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “MʼAgya, sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, ma kuruwa yi ntwa me ho nkɔ. Nanso, deɛ wopɛ na ɛnyɔ, na nyɛ deɛ mepɛ.”
Na ɔsan baa asuafoɔ baasa no nkyɛn bɛhunuu sɛ wɔadeda. Ɔfrɛɛ Petro bisaa no sɛ, “Petro, woantumi antena ase ne me annwɛn dɔnhwere baako pɛ mpo? Monwɛn na mommɔ mpaeɛ, na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu. Honhom pɛ deɛ, nanso ɔhonam yɛ mmerɛ!”
Ɔsan gyaa wɔn hɔ bio kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “MʼAgya, sɛ kuruwa yi rentwa me ho nkɔ, na nom ara na ɛsɛ sɛ menom deɛ ɛwɔ mu no a, deɛ wopɛ nyɔ.”
Ɔsan baa wɔn nkyɛn bio bɛhunuu wɔn sɛ wɔadeda ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔn ani kum yie. Ɔsan kɔɔ mpaebɔ a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa so kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ kaa asɛm korɔ no ara.
Ɔsan baa asuafoɔ no nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Afei deɛ, monna na monhome. Nanso, ɛdɔn no adu. Wɔrebɛyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa! Monsɔre na yɛnkɔ! Monhwɛ! Deɛ ɔreyi me ama no na ɔreba no!”
Wɔkyere Yesu
Ɔgu so rekasa no, Yuda a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako ne dɔm a Yudafoɔ mpanin asoma wɔn a wɔkutakuta nkrantɛ ne mmaa baa hɔ. Na Yuda aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔnkyere onipa a ɔbɛyɛ no atuu no, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔno ne onipa a wɔrehwehwɛ no no. Yuda baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbam no kaa sɛ, “Me wura, atuu!”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Damfo, deɛ wobaa ha sɛ worebɛyɔ no, yɔ no ntɛm.” Ɛhɔ ara, wɔn a wɔne Yuda nam no kyeree Yesu.
Wɔn a wɔka Yesu ho no mu baako twee ne nkrantɛ de twaa Ɔsɔfopanin no akoa bi aso.
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “To wo nkrantɛ no twene. Na wɔn a wɔtwe nkrantɛ no, nkrantɛ ano na wɔbɛwuo. Monnim sɛ mɛtumi aka akyerɛ mʼAgya na wasoma nʼabɔfoɔ mpempem aba ntɛm so, na wɔabɛbɔ yɛn ho ban? Nanso, sɛ meyɛ saa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na deɛ Atwerɛsɛm ka wɔ deɛ asi yi ho no bɛba mu?”
Yesu bisaa ɛdɔm a wɔbaa ne soɔ no sɛ, “Meyɛ owudifoɔ nti na mode nkrantɛ ne mmaa aba me so sɛ mode rebɛkye me? Metenaa mo nkyɛn kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ asɔrefie da biara da, nso moansi me kwan. Nanso, yei nyinaa aba sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a deɛ adiyifoɔ no kaeɛ wɔ Atwerɛsɛm mu no bɛba mu.”
Saa berɛ no ara mu na asuafoɔ no nyinaa dwane gyaa no.
Yesu Gyina Kaiafa Anim
Afei, ɛdɔm a wɔkyeree Yesu no de no kɔɔ Ɔsɔfopanin Kaiafa anim, baabi a Yudafoɔ mpanin nyinaa ahyia hɔ. Petro tee ne ho dii nnipadɔm no akyi baa Ɔsɔfopanin no fie hɔ bi. Ɔkɔtenaa asomfoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu sɛ ɔrehwɛ asɛm a ɛbɛsie.
Asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ asɛnnifoɔ akunini nyinaa hyiaa wɔ hɔ hwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛnya adansefoɔ bi a wɔbɛdi adansekurumu ato Yesu so, na wɔagyina so abu no kumfɔ. Nnipa bebree bɛdii adanseɛ, nanso wɔhunuu sɛ wɔredi adansekurumu ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔn nsɛm a wɔka no nyinaa bɔ abira.
Akyire yi, nnipa baanu bi ba bɛkaa sɛ, “Saa onipa yi kaa sɛ, ‘Mɛtumi abubu Onyankopɔn asɔredan na masi no nnansa!’ ”
Ɔsɔfopanin no sɔre bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na wowɔ ka? Wokaa saa anaasɛ woanka saa?” Nanso, Yesu ammua no.
Ɔsɔfopanin no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Meka Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no sɛ, sɛ wone Agyenkwa no, Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn!”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Aane, woaka. Na daakye mobɛhu me, Agyenkwa no, sɛ mete Onyankopɔn nifa na menam omununkum mu resan aba.”
Ɔsɔfopanin no sunsuanee nʼatadeɛ mu teaam sɛ, “Abususɛm! Adansefoɔ bɛn na wɔn ho hia yɛn bio? Mo nyinaa ate abususɛm a ɔkaeɛ no! Asɛm bɛn na mowɔ ka?”
Wɔn nyinaa teaam sɛ, “Ɔsɛ owuo! Ɔsɛ owuo! Ɔsɛ owuo!”
Afei, wɔtee ntasuo guu nʼani so. Ebinom bobɔɔ no akutu na ebinom nso bobɔɔ no asotorɔ kaa sɛ, “Wone Agyenkwa no! Kyerɛ yɛn deɛ ɔbɔɔ wo?”
Petro Pa Yesu
Saa berɛ no na Petro te adihɔ. Abaayewa bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Wo nso na wo ne Yesu na ɛnam. Mo nyinaa mofiri Galilea.”
Nanso, Petro de abufuo san ne ho sɛ, “Mennim deɛ woreka yi ho hwee.”
Akyire yi, abaayewa foforɔ bi hyiaa no ɛpono bi ano ka kyerɛɛ wɔn a ɔne wɔn gyina hɔ no sɛ, “Na saa ɔbarima yi ne Yesu Nasaretni no na ɛnam.”
Petro de ntam san ne ho bio sɛ, “Mennim saa onipa a moreka ne ho asɛm no.”
Ɛkyɛɛ kakra no, mmarima a wɔgyina hɔ no bi bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yɛnim sɛ woyɛ nʼasuafoɔ no mu baako, na wo kasa nso yi wo adi sɛ woyɛ Galileani.”
Petro fitii aseɛ dii nse, kekaa ntam sɛ, “Mennim onipa no!”
Amonom hɔ ara na akokɔ bɔneeɛ. Ɛhɔ na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa” no. Na ɔfirii adi kɔsuiɛ.
Mateo 27Wɔde Yesu Kɔ Pilato Anim
1Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin kɔɔ agyina, hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so ama Roma aban abu Yesu kumfɔ. 2Afei, wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn guu Yesu, de no baa Pilato a ɔyɛ Roma amrado no anim.
Yuda Ahonuo
3Saa berɛ no ara mu, Yuda a ɔyii Yesu maeɛ no hunuu sɛ wɔabu Yesu kumfɔ no, ɔnuu ne ho yie. Enti, ɔsan de sika a ɔgye firii asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin no nkyɛn no brɛɛ wɔn kaa sɛ,
4“Mayɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ, mayi onipa a ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara ama.”
Wɔn nso kaa sɛ, “Ɛmfa yɛn ho. Wo ara wʼasɛm.”
5Ɔtoo sika no guu asɔredan no mu, firii hɔ kɔkyɛɛ homa. 6Asɔfoɔ mpanin no sesaa sika no kaa sɛ, “Yɛrentumi mfa saa sika yi mfra yɛn toɔ a yɛagyeɛ mu. Ɛfiri sɛ, yɛn mmara mma ho kwan sɛ yɛbɛgye sika a wɔde abɔ awudie ho paa.”
7Wɔdwennwenee ho sii gyinaeɛ sɛ, wɔde sika no bɛtɔ asase bi a wɔtu hɔ dɔteɛ de nwono nkukuo, na wɔde ɛhɔ ayɛ amusieeɛ ama ahɔhoɔ a wɔbɛwu wɔ Yerusalem no. 8Enti, na wɔda so frɛ saa asase no sɛ, “Mogya Asase” de bɛsi nnɛ yi. 9Yei maa deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yeremia kaa sɛ, “Wɔgyee dwetɛ mpɔ aduasa, ɛboɔ a Israelfoɔ sese hunuu sɛ ɛfata, 10ɛnna wɔfiri mu tɔɔ asase firii anwomfoɔ nkyɛn, sɛdeɛ Awurade hyɛɛ me” no baa mu.
Yesu Gyina Pilato Anim
11Afei, wɔde Yesu bɛgyinaa Pilato a ɔyɛ Roma amrado no anim. Ɔbisaa Yesu sɛ, “Wone Yudafoɔ Agyenkwa no anaa?”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Aane.”
12Nanso, ɛberɛ a asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin reka nsɛm gu Yesu so no, wankasa.
13Pilato bisaa no sɛ, “Wonte deɛ wɔreka no anaa?”
14Nanso, Yesu anka hwee maa ɛyɛɛ amrado no nwanwa.
Wɔbu Yesu Kumfɔ
15Na ɛyɛ amrado no amanneɛ sɛ afe biara Twam Afahyɛ no mu, ɔgyaa odeduani baako a ɔman no pɛ sɛ wɔgyaa no. 16Saa afe no mu, na onipa bɔnefoɔ bi a wɔfrɛ no Baraba nso da afiase. 17Anɔpa no a nnipadɔm no hyiaa wɔ Pilato ahemfie anim hɔ no, Pilato bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Hwan na mopɛ sɛ megyaa no ma mo, Baraba anaa Yesu, mo Agyenkwa no?” 18Na ɔnim pefee sɛ Yudafoɔ mpanin no de ɔtan na akyere Yesu ɛfiri sɛ, na wagye din.
19Pilato gu so redi Yesu asɛm no, ne yere soma maa wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Gyaa onipa tenenee no na ɔnkɔ ne baabi ɛfiri sɛ, anadwo yi, mesoo ne ho daeɛ a ɛyɛ hu yie maa me ho yeraa me.”
20Nanso, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin kasa kyerɛɛ ɛdɔm no sɛ, wɔmmisa na wɔnnyaa Baraba mma wɔn na wɔnkum Yesu. 21Enti, ɛberɛ a amrado no san bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Nnipa baanu yi mu hwan na mopɛ nɛ megyaa no ma mo?” Na, ɛdɔm no bɔ gyee so sɛ, “Baraba!”
22Pilato bisaa wɔn bio sɛ, “Sɛ saa deɛ a, ɛnneɛ ɛdeɛn na menyɛ Yesu, mo Agyenkwa no?”
Wɔn nyinaa bɔ gyee so bio sɛ, “Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”
23Pilato bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti? Bɔne bɛn na wayɔ?”
Nanso, wɔkɔɔ so bɔ gyee so ara sɛ, “Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”
24Afei, Pilato hunuu sɛ ɔyɛ asɛm no ho hwee a ɛnyɛ yie na basabasayɔ reba no, ɔmaa wɔsaa nsuo guu adeɛ mu brɛɛ no, maa ɔhohoroo ne nsa wɔ ɛdɔm no anim kaa sɛ, “Menni saa onipa tenenee yi mogya ho fɔ. Deɛ ɛbɛba biara no yɛ mo asɛm!”
25Nnipadɔm no san bɔ gyee so bio sɛ, “Ne mogya mmɛgu yɛn ne yɛn mma tiri so.”
26Afei Pilato yii Baraba firii afiase hɔ de no maa wɔn. Ɔbɔɔ Yesu mmaa wieeɛ no, ɔde no maa Roma asraafoɔ no sɛ wɔmfa no nkɔ nkɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Yesu Ho Fɛwdie
27Asraafoɔ no de Yesu kɔɔ amrado aban mu hɔ ɛnna wɔfrɛɛ asraafodɔm baa hɔ 28Wɔyii Yesu atadeɛ a na ɛhyɛ no no de batakari kɔkɔɔ bi hyɛɛ no, 29ɛnna wɔde nkasɛɛ atentene nwonoo ɛkyɛ hyɛɛ no, ɛnna wɔde dua bi hyɛɛ ne nsa nifa sɛ ahempoma, ɛnna wɔbubuu nkotodwe wɔ nʼanim fitii aseɛ bɔ gyee so, dii ne ho fɛw sɛ, “Yudafoɔ Hene, wo nkwa so.” 30Wɔtetee ntasuo guu ne so na wɔgyee dua no firii ne nsam de paa nʼapampam.
31Wɔdii ne ho fɛw wieeɛ no, wɔworɔɔ batakari kɔkɔɔ a wɔde hyɛɛ no no, de ɔno ankasa nʼatadeɛ no san hyɛɛ no bio. Afei, wɔde no kɔeɛ sɛ wɔrekɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu. 32Ɛberɛ a wɔde no rekɔ baabi a wɔbɔ asɛnnua mu hɔ no, wɔhyiaa ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Simon a ɔfiri Kirene a ɛwɔ Abibirem. Wɔhyɛɛ no maa ɔsoaa Yesu asɛnnua no bi.
Wɔbɔ Yesu Asɛnnua Mu
33Wɔde Yesu kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ sɛ Golgota a nʼasekyerɛ ne “Ne Tire So.” 34Ɛhɔ na asraafoɔ no maa no nsa nwononwono bi sɛ ɔnnom. Yesu kaa nʼano no, wannom.
35Afei, wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu. Ɛno akyi, wɔbɔɔ nʼatadeɛ no so ntonto kyekyɛ faeɛ. 36Afei, wɔn nyinaa tenatenaa ase wɛn no. 37Wɔtwerɛɛ nsɛm a wɔka guu ne so no bi fam nʼatifi sɛ, “Yesu, Yudafoɔ Hene No Ni.”
38Wɔbɔɔ awudifoɔ baanu bi asɛnnua mu kaa Yesu ho. Na ɔbaako sɛn ne nifa so ɛnna ɔbaako nso sɛn ne benkum so.
Wɔdi Yesu a Ɔsɛn Hɔ no Ho Fɛw
39Nnipa a wɔsen faa baabi a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu hɔ no nyinaa wosoo wɔn ti, dii Yesu ho fɛw sɛ, 40“Ɛnyɛ wo na woseɛ sɛ wobɛtumi abubu asɔredan na wode nnansa asi no? Sɛ wo na woseɛ sɛ woyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba ampa ara a, ɛnneɛ siane firi asɛnnua no so si fam ma yɛnhwɛ!”
41Saa ara nso na asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin bɛdii ne ho fɛw sɛ, 42“Ɔgye afoforɔ, nanso ɔntumi nnye ne ho! Sɛ wone Israelfoɔ hene no ampa ara a, siane firi asɛnnua no so si fam, na yɛnnye wo nni. 43Ɔde ne ho too Onyankopɔn so. Afei, ma Onyankopɔn nnye no! Wanka nso sɛ, ‘Meyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba?’ ”
44Awudifoɔ bi a wɔbɔɔ wɔne no asɛnnua mu no nso fitii aseɛ dii ne ho fɛw.
Yesu Wuo
45Ɛberɛ a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu no, esum duruu asase so mmaa nyinaa firi owigyinaeɛ kɔpem nnɔnmiɛnsa.
46Ɛbɛyɛ nnɔnmiɛnsa berɛ mu no, Yesu teaam denden sɛ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Aseɛ kyerɛ sɛ, “Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woagya me?”
47Wɔn a wɔgyina hɔ no bi ante aseɛ susuu sɛ ɔrefrɛ Elia. 48Wɔn mu baako tuu mmirika kɔfaa sapɔ bi de bɔɔ nsa nwononwono bi mu de tuaa dua bi so de brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔnnom. 49Nanso, nnipa no nkaeɛ no kaa sɛ, “Gyaa no na yɛnhwɛ sɛ Elia bɛba abɛgye no anaa.”
50Afei, Yesu teaam denden bio gyaee ne honhom mu wuiɛ. 51Ɛhɔ ara, ntoma a ɛtwa asɔredan no mu Kronkron mu Kronkron no mu suanee mmienu firi soro kɔsii fam. Asase wosoeɛ. Abotan mu paapaeeɛ, 52Adamena so buebueeɛ maa ateneefoɔ a wɔawuwuo nyanenyaneeɛ. 53Yesu wusɔreɛ akyi no, wɔfifirii wɔn adamena mu kɔɔ Yerusalem, kɔyii wɔn ho adi kyerɛɛ nnipa bebree.
54Asraafoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no hunuu asase wosoɔ ne nsɛm a ɛsisii hɔ no, wɔn akoma tuu yie, maa wɔkaa sɛ, “Ampa ara, onipa yi yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba.”
55Saa berɛ no na mmaa bebree a Yesu ho dɔ nti, wɔdii nʼakyi firi Galilea no gyinagyina akyiri baabi rehwɛ deɛ ɛrekɔ so. 56Mmaa no bi ne Maria Magdalene ne Maria a ɔyɛ Yakobo, Yohane ne Yosef maame. Na Sebedeo mma Yakobo ne Yohane nso maame ka wɔn ho.
Wɔsie Yesu
57Ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, osikani bi a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea a na ɔyɛ Yesu suani no, 58kɔɔ Pilato hɔ kɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa Yesu amu no mma no. 59Yosef faa amu no de nwera kyekyeree ho, 60na ɔde no kɔtoo ɔno ankasa ne boda foforɔ bi a wɔatwa mu, piree ɛboɔ kɛseɛ bi hinii ano, ansa na ɔregya hɔ akɔ. 61Maria Magdalene ne Maria baako no deɛ, na wɔte nkyɛn baabi rewɛn ɔboda no.
Wɔwɛn Ɔboda No
62Adeɛ kyeeɛ a ɛyɛ da a ɛdi Twam Afahyɛ no ahosiesie akyi no, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Farisifoɔ no kɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn, 63kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Owura, ɔtorofoɔ no kaa berɛ bi sɛ, ‘Nnansa akyi no, mɛsan aba nkwa mu bio.’ 64Yei nti, ma yɛn kwan na yɛnkɔtare ɛda no ano nkɔsi nnansa, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, nʼasuafoɔ no ntwa wɔn ho nkɔwia amu no mmɔ no dawuro sɛ wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu. Na sɛ ɛkɔba saa deɛ a, anka akyire yi nnaadaa bɛsene kane deɛ no.”
65Pilato ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mowɔ awɛmfoɔ. Momma wɔnkɔwɛn.”
66Enti, wɔkɔtaree ɔboda no ano, maa awɛmfoɔ kɔwɛneeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, obiara ntumi nkɔwura hɔ nkɔwia amu no.Wɔde Yesu Kɔ Pilato Anim
Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin kɔɔ agyina, hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so ama Roma aban abu Yesu kumfɔ. Afei, wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn guu Yesu, de no baa Pilato a ɔyɛ Roma amrado no anim.
Yuda Ahonuo
Saa berɛ no ara mu, Yuda a ɔyii Yesu maeɛ no hunuu sɛ wɔabu Yesu kumfɔ no, ɔnuu ne ho yie. Enti, ɔsan de sika a ɔgye firii asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin no nkyɛn no brɛɛ wɔn kaa sɛ,
“Mayɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ, mayi onipa a ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara ama.”
Wɔn nso kaa sɛ, “Ɛmfa yɛn ho. Wo ara wʼasɛm.”
Ɔtoo sika no guu asɔredan no mu, firii hɔ kɔkyɛɛ homa. Asɔfoɔ mpanin no sesaa sika no kaa sɛ, “Yɛrentumi mfa saa sika yi mfra yɛn toɔ a yɛagyeɛ mu. Ɛfiri sɛ, yɛn mmara mma ho kwan sɛ yɛbɛgye sika a wɔde abɔ awudie ho paa.”
Wɔdwennwenee ho sii gyinaeɛ sɛ, wɔde sika no bɛtɔ asase bi a wɔtu hɔ dɔteɛ de nwono nkukuo, na wɔde ɛhɔ ayɛ amusieeɛ ama ahɔhoɔ a wɔbɛwu wɔ Yerusalem no. Enti, na wɔda so frɛ saa asase no sɛ, “Mogya Asase” de bɛsi nnɛ yi. Yei maa deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yeremia kaa sɛ, “Wɔgyee dwetɛ mpɔ aduasa, ɛboɔ a Israelfoɔ sese hunuu sɛ ɛfata, ɛnna wɔfiri mu tɔɔ asase firii anwomfoɔ nkyɛn, sɛdeɛ Awurade hyɛɛ me” no baa mu.
Yesu Gyina Pilato Anim
Afei, wɔde Yesu bɛgyinaa Pilato a ɔyɛ Roma amrado no anim. Ɔbisaa Yesu sɛ, “Wone Yudafoɔ Agyenkwa no anaa?”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Aane.”
Nanso, ɛberɛ a asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin reka nsɛm gu Yesu so no, wankasa.
Pilato bisaa no sɛ, “Wonte deɛ wɔreka no anaa?”
Nanso, Yesu anka hwee maa ɛyɛɛ amrado no nwanwa.
Wɔbu Yesu Kumfɔ
Na ɛyɛ amrado no amanneɛ sɛ afe biara Twam Afahyɛ no mu, ɔgyaa odeduani baako a ɔman no pɛ sɛ wɔgyaa no. Saa afe no mu, na onipa bɔnefoɔ bi a wɔfrɛ no Baraba nso da afiase. Anɔpa no a nnipadɔm no hyiaa wɔ Pilato ahemfie anim hɔ no, Pilato bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Hwan na mopɛ sɛ megyaa no ma mo, Baraba anaa Yesu, mo Agyenkwa no?” Na ɔnim pefee sɛ Yudafoɔ mpanin no de ɔtan na akyere Yesu ɛfiri sɛ, na wagye din.
Pilato gu so redi Yesu asɛm no, ne yere soma maa wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Gyaa onipa tenenee no na ɔnkɔ ne baabi ɛfiri sɛ, anadwo yi, mesoo ne ho daeɛ a ɛyɛ hu yie maa me ho yeraa me.”
Nanso, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin kasa kyerɛɛ ɛdɔm no sɛ, wɔmmisa na wɔnnyaa Baraba mma wɔn na wɔnkum Yesu. Enti, ɛberɛ a amrado no san bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Nnipa baanu yi mu hwan na mopɛ nɛ megyaa no ma mo?” Na, ɛdɔm no bɔ gyee so sɛ, “Baraba!”
Pilato bisaa wɔn bio sɛ, “Sɛ saa deɛ a, ɛnneɛ ɛdeɛn na menyɛ Yesu, mo Agyenkwa no?”
Wɔn nyinaa bɔ gyee so bio sɛ, “Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”
Pilato bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti? Bɔne bɛn na wayɔ?”
Nanso, wɔkɔɔ so bɔ gyee so ara sɛ, “Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”
Afei, Pilato hunuu sɛ ɔyɛ asɛm no ho hwee a ɛnyɛ yie na basabasayɔ reba no, ɔmaa wɔsaa nsuo guu adeɛ mu brɛɛ no, maa ɔhohoroo ne nsa wɔ ɛdɔm no anim kaa sɛ, “Menni saa onipa tenenee yi mogya ho fɔ. Deɛ ɛbɛba biara no yɛ mo asɛm!”
Nnipadɔm no san bɔ gyee so bio sɛ, “Ne mogya mmɛgu yɛn ne yɛn mma tiri so.”
Afei Pilato yii Baraba firii afiase hɔ de no maa wɔn. Ɔbɔɔ Yesu mmaa wieeɛ no, ɔde no maa Roma asraafoɔ no sɛ wɔmfa no nkɔ nkɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Yesu Ho Fɛwdie
Asraafoɔ no de Yesu kɔɔ amrado aban mu hɔ ɛnna wɔfrɛɛ asraafodɔm baa hɔ Wɔyii Yesu atadeɛ a na ɛhyɛ no no de batakari kɔkɔɔ bi hyɛɛ no, ɛnna wɔde nkasɛɛ atentene nwonoo ɛkyɛ hyɛɛ no, ɛnna wɔde dua bi hyɛɛ ne nsa nifa sɛ ahempoma, ɛnna wɔbubuu nkotodwe wɔ nʼanim fitii aseɛ bɔ gyee so, dii ne ho fɛw sɛ, “Yudafoɔ Hene, wo nkwa so.” Wɔtetee ntasuo guu ne so na wɔgyee dua no firii ne nsam de paa nʼapampam.
Wɔdii ne ho fɛw wieeɛ no, wɔworɔɔ batakari kɔkɔɔ a wɔde hyɛɛ no no, de ɔno ankasa nʼatadeɛ no san hyɛɛ no bio. Afei, wɔde no kɔeɛ sɛ wɔrekɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu. Ɛberɛ a wɔde no rekɔ baabi a wɔbɔ asɛnnua mu hɔ no, wɔhyiaa ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Simon a ɔfiri Kirene a ɛwɔ Abibirem. Wɔhyɛɛ no maa ɔsoaa Yesu asɛnnua no bi.
Wɔbɔ Yesu Asɛnnua Mu
Wɔde Yesu kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ sɛ Golgota a nʼasekyerɛ ne “Ne Tire So.” Ɛhɔ na asraafoɔ no maa no nsa nwononwono bi sɛ ɔnnom. Yesu kaa nʼano no, wannom.
Afei, wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu. Ɛno akyi, wɔbɔɔ nʼatadeɛ no so ntonto kyekyɛ faeɛ. Afei, wɔn nyinaa tenatenaa ase wɛn no. Wɔtwerɛɛ nsɛm a wɔka guu ne so no bi fam nʼatifi sɛ, “Yesu, Yudafoɔ Hene No Ni.”
Wɔbɔɔ awudifoɔ baanu bi asɛnnua mu kaa Yesu ho. Na ɔbaako sɛn ne nifa so ɛnna ɔbaako nso sɛn ne benkum so.
Wɔdi Yesu a Ɔsɛn Hɔ no Ho Fɛw
Nnipa a wɔsen faa baabi a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu hɔ no nyinaa wosoo wɔn ti, dii Yesu ho fɛw sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ wo na woseɛ sɛ wobɛtumi abubu asɔredan na wode nnansa asi no? Sɛ wo na woseɛ sɛ woyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba ampa ara a, ɛnneɛ siane firi asɛnnua no so si fam ma yɛnhwɛ!”
Saa ara nso na asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin bɛdii ne ho fɛw sɛ, “Ɔgye afoforɔ, nanso ɔntumi nnye ne ho! Sɛ wone Israelfoɔ hene no ampa ara a, siane firi asɛnnua no so si fam, na yɛnnye wo nni. Ɔde ne ho too Onyankopɔn so. Afei, ma Onyankopɔn nnye no! Wanka nso sɛ, ‘Meyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba?’ ”
Awudifoɔ bi a wɔbɔɔ wɔne no asɛnnua mu no nso fitii aseɛ dii ne ho fɛw.
Yesu Wuo
Ɛberɛ a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu no, esum duruu asase so mmaa nyinaa firi owigyinaeɛ kɔpem nnɔnmiɛnsa.
Ɛbɛyɛ nnɔnmiɛnsa berɛ mu no, Yesu teaam denden sɛ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Aseɛ kyerɛ sɛ, “Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woagya me?”
Wɔn a wɔgyina hɔ no bi ante aseɛ susuu sɛ ɔrefrɛ Elia. Wɔn mu baako tuu mmirika kɔfaa sapɔ bi de bɔɔ nsa nwononwono bi mu de tuaa dua bi so de brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔnnom. Nanso, nnipa no nkaeɛ no kaa sɛ, “Gyaa no na yɛnhwɛ sɛ Elia bɛba abɛgye no anaa.”
Afei, Yesu teaam denden bio gyaee ne honhom mu wuiɛ. Ɛhɔ ara, ntoma a ɛtwa asɔredan no mu Kronkron mu Kronkron no mu suanee mmienu firi soro kɔsii fam. Asase wosoeɛ. Abotan mu paapaeeɛ, Adamena so buebueeɛ maa ateneefoɔ a wɔawuwuo nyanenyaneeɛ. Yesu wusɔreɛ akyi no, wɔfifirii wɔn adamena mu kɔɔ Yerusalem, kɔyii wɔn ho adi kyerɛɛ nnipa bebree.
Asraafoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no hunuu asase wosoɔ ne nsɛm a ɛsisii hɔ no, wɔn akoma tuu yie, maa wɔkaa sɛ, “Ampa ara, onipa yi yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba.”
Saa berɛ no na mmaa bebree a Yesu ho dɔ nti, wɔdii nʼakyi firi Galilea no gyinagyina akyiri baabi rehwɛ deɛ ɛrekɔ so. Mmaa no bi ne Maria Magdalene ne Maria a ɔyɛ Yakobo, Yohane ne Yosef maame. Na Sebedeo mma Yakobo ne Yohane nso maame ka wɔn ho.
Wɔsie Yesu
Ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, osikani bi a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea a na ɔyɛ Yesu suani no, kɔɔ Pilato hɔ kɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa Yesu amu no mma no. Yosef faa amu no de nwera kyekyeree ho, na ɔde no kɔtoo ɔno ankasa ne boda foforɔ bi a wɔatwa mu, piree ɛboɔ kɛseɛ bi hinii ano, ansa na ɔregya hɔ akɔ. Maria Magdalene ne Maria baako no deɛ, na wɔte nkyɛn baabi rewɛn ɔboda no.
Wɔwɛn Ɔboda No
Adeɛ kyeeɛ a ɛyɛ da a ɛdi Twam Afahyɛ no ahosiesie akyi no, asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Farisifoɔ no kɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn, kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Owura, ɔtorofoɔ no kaa berɛ bi sɛ, ‘Nnansa akyi no, mɛsan aba nkwa mu bio.’ Yei nti, ma yɛn kwan na yɛnkɔtare ɛda no ano nkɔsi nnansa, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, nʼasuafoɔ no ntwa wɔn ho nkɔwia amu no mmɔ no dawuro sɛ wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu. Na sɛ ɛkɔba saa deɛ a, anka akyire yi nnaadaa bɛsene kane deɛ no.”
Pilato ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mowɔ awɛmfoɔ. Momma wɔnkɔwɛn.”
Enti, wɔkɔtaree ɔboda no ano, maa awɛmfoɔ kɔwɛneeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, obiara ntumi nkɔwura hɔ nkɔwia amu no.
Mateo 28Owusɔreɛ
1Homeda a ɛyɛ Kwasiada ahemadakye, Maria Magdalene ne Maria baako no kɔɔ ɛda no so.
2Amonom, asase wosoo denden; na Awurade bɔfoɔ siane firii soro baeɛ bɛpiree ɛboɔ no firii ɛda no ano, na ɔtenaa so. 3Nʼanim hyerɛn te sɛ kanea na nʼatadeɛ yɛ fitaa te sɛ nwera. 4Awɛmfoɔ no hunuu no no, ehu maa wɔn ho popoeɛ, na wɔhwehwee ase, danee sɛ awufoɔ. 5Ɔbɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ mmaa no sɛ, “Monnsuro! Menim sɛ, morehwehwɛ Yesu a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no, 6nanso ɔnni ha. Wasɔre kɔ sɛdeɛ ɔkaeɛ no. Mommra mmɛhwɛ deɛ na ɔda hɔ no. 7Afei, monkɔ ntɛm nkɔka nkyerɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, ‘Wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu, na ɔredi mo anim kan akɔ Galilea akɔhyia mo wɔ hɔ.’ Yei ne nkra a mewɔ de ma mo.”
8Mmaa no de ehu ne anigyeɛ a adi afra tutuu mmirika firii ɛda no so sɛ, wɔrekɔhwehwɛ asuafoɔ no aka ɔbɔfoɔ no nkra no akyerɛ wɔn. 9Wɔrekɔ no, prɛko pɛ, Yesu bɛgyinaa wɔn anim. Ɔkyeaa wɔn sɛ,
“Asomdwoeɛ nka mo.” Wɔbuu no nkotodwe, som no.
10Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monnsuro! Monkɔ nkɔka nkyerɛ me nuanom no sɛ wɔnkɔ Galilea nkɔhyia me wɔ hɔ.”
Deɛ Awɛmfoɔ No Kaeɛ
11Ɛberɛ a mmaa no rekɔ kuro no mu no, awɛmfoɔ a wɔwɛn ɛda no mu bi kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanin no nkyɛn kɔkaa deɛ asie no nyinaa kyerɛɛ wɔn. 12Yudafoɔ mpanin no nyinaa hyiaeɛ, na wɔsii no gyinaeɛ sɛ, wɔbɛma awɛmfoɔ no sika aka akyerɛ wɔn 13sɛ, “Monka sɛ, ‘Anadwo a yɛdaeɛ no, na nʼasuafoɔ no ba bɛwiaa amu no de kɔeɛ.’ ”
14Wɔhyɛɛ awɛmfoɔ no bɔ sɛ, “Sɛ ɛba sɛ amrado te ɛho asɛm a, yɛbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no mu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, ɔrenyɛ mo hwee.”
15Yei nti, awɛmfoɔ no gyee sika no kɔyɔɔ sɛdeɛ wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɔ no. Asɛm a wɔkaeɛ no trɛ faa Yudafoɔ no mu nyinaa na wɔgye di de bɛsi nnɛ.
Yesu Yi Ne Ho Adi Kyerɛ Nʼasuafoɔ No
16Afei, asuafoɔ dubaako no siim kɔɔ Galilea bepɔ a Yesu kaa sɛ wɔnkɔ so no so. 17Ɛhɔ na wɔhuu no, koto, sɔree no. Nanso, na wɔn mu bi nnye nni ara.
18Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Wɔde ɔsoro ne asase so tumi nyinaa ama me. 19Enti, monkɔ nkɔyɛ amanaman nyinaa mʼasuafoɔ. Mommɔ wɔn asu nhyɛ Agya, Ɔba ne Honhom Kronkron din mu, 20na monkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔnni deɛ mahyɛ mo no nyinaa so. Na me ne mo wɔ hɔ nna nyinaa de bɛkɔ akɔsi wiase awieeɛ.”Owusɔreɛ
Homeda a ɛyɛ Kwasiada ahemadakye, Maria Magdalene ne Maria baako no kɔɔ ɛda no so.
Amonom, asase wosoo denden; na Awurade bɔfoɔ siane firii soro baeɛ bɛpiree ɛboɔ no firii ɛda no ano, na ɔtenaa so. Nʼanim hyerɛn te sɛ kanea na nʼatadeɛ yɛ fitaa te sɛ nwera. Awɛmfoɔ no hunuu no no, ehu maa wɔn ho popoeɛ, na wɔhwehwee ase, danee sɛ awufoɔ. Ɔbɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ mmaa no sɛ, “Monnsuro! Menim sɛ, morehwehwɛ Yesu a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no, nanso ɔnni ha. Wasɔre kɔ sɛdeɛ ɔkaeɛ no. Mommra mmɛhwɛ deɛ na ɔda hɔ no. Afei, monkɔ ntɛm nkɔka nkyerɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, ‘Wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu, na ɔredi mo anim kan akɔ Galilea akɔhyia mo wɔ hɔ.’ Yei ne nkra a mewɔ de ma mo.”
Mmaa no de ehu ne anigyeɛ a adi afra tutuu mmirika firii ɛda no so sɛ, wɔrekɔhwehwɛ asuafoɔ no aka ɔbɔfoɔ no nkra no akyerɛ wɔn. Wɔrekɔ no, prɛko pɛ, Yesu bɛgyinaa wɔn anim. Ɔkyeaa wɔn sɛ,
“Asomdwoeɛ nka mo.” Wɔbuu no nkotodwe, som no.
Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monnsuro! Monkɔ nkɔka nkyerɛ me nuanom no sɛ wɔnkɔ Galilea nkɔhyia me wɔ hɔ.”
Deɛ Awɛmfoɔ No Kaeɛ
Ɛberɛ a mmaa no rekɔ kuro no mu no, awɛmfoɔ a wɔwɛn ɛda no mu bi kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanin no nkyɛn kɔkaa deɛ asie no nyinaa kyerɛɛ wɔn. Yudafoɔ mpanin no nyinaa hyiaeɛ, na wɔsii no gyinaeɛ sɛ, wɔbɛma awɛmfoɔ no sika aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monka sɛ, ‘Anadwo a yɛdaeɛ no, na nʼasuafoɔ no ba bɛwiaa amu no de kɔeɛ.’ ”
Wɔhyɛɛ awɛmfoɔ no bɔ sɛ, “Sɛ ɛba sɛ amrado te ɛho asɛm a, yɛbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no mu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, ɔrenyɛ mo hwee.”
Yei nti, awɛmfoɔ no gyee sika no kɔyɔɔ sɛdeɛ wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɔ no. Asɛm a wɔkaeɛ no trɛ faa Yudafoɔ no mu nyinaa na wɔgye di de bɛsi nnɛ.
Yesu Yi Ne Ho Adi Kyerɛ Nʼasuafoɔ No
Afei, asuafoɔ dubaako no siim kɔɔ Galilea bepɔ a Yesu kaa sɛ wɔnkɔ so no so. Ɛhɔ na wɔhuu no, koto, sɔree no. Nanso, na wɔn mu bi nnye nni ara.
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Wɔde ɔsoro ne asase so tumi nyinaa ama me. Enti, monkɔ nkɔyɛ amanaman nyinaa mʼasuafoɔ. Mommɔ wɔn asu nhyɛ Agya, Ɔba ne Honhom Kronkron din mu, na monkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔnni deɛ mahyɛ mo no nyinaa so. Na me ne mo wɔ hɔ nna nyinaa de bɛkɔ akɔsi wiase awieeɛ.”
Marko NhyɛnmuNhyɛnmu
Na Marko yɛ aberantewaa a nʼadamfo pa ara ne Petro a, na ɔyɛ Yesu asuafoɔ no mu baako no. Na nsɛm a ɔtwerɛeɛ no yɛ nsɛm a Petro ka kyerɛɛ no fa Yesu abrabɔ ho no. Wantwerɛ biribiara amfa Yesu abusuadua, nʼawoɔ ne ne mmɔfraase ho. Afei nso, wanka nsɛm a Yesu kaeɛ no ho nsɛm pii na mmom, dwuma a Yesu diiɛ no titire na ɔkaa ho nsɛm. Ɔtwerɛɛ nsɛm bebree faa Yudafoɔ amanneɛ ho a ɛkyerɛ sɛ, saa nwoma yi, wɔtwerɛ maa wɔn a wɔnyɛ Yudafoɔ
Emu Nsɛm
1. Yesu fiti ne nkyerɛkyerɛ ase, 1.1-13
2. Yesu nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛdi kan wɔ Galilea, 1.14–3.6
3. Yesu nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu wɔ Galilea, 3.7–7.23
4. Yesu nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa wɔ Galilea, 7.24–9.50
5. Yesu firi Galilea kɔ Yerusalem, 10.1-52
6. Yesu wɔ Yerusalem, nʼamanehunu ne ne wuo, 11.1–16.8
7. Owusɔreɛ ne Yesu ho adiyisɛm, 16.9-20Nhyɛnmu
Na Marko yɛ aberantewaa a nʼadamfo pa ara ne Petro a, na ɔyɛ Yesu asuafoɔ no mu baako no. Na nsɛm a ɔtwerɛeɛ no yɛ nsɛm a Petro ka kyerɛɛ no fa Yesu abrabɔ ho no. Wantwerɛ biribiara amfa Yesu abusuadua, nʼawoɔ ne ne mmɔfraase ho. Afei nso, wanka nsɛm a Yesu kaeɛ no ho nsɛm pii na mmom, dwuma a Yesu diiɛ no titire na ɔkaa ho nsɛm. Ɔtwerɛɛ nsɛm bebree faa Yudafoɔ amanneɛ ho a ɛkyerɛ sɛ, saa nwoma yi, wɔtwerɛ maa wɔn a wɔnyɛ Yudafoɔ

Marko 1Yohane Osubɔni Asɛnka
1Asɛmpa a ɛfa Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no ho no, mfitiaseɛ ni:
2Odiyifoɔ Yesaia nwoma no mu no, Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ, ɔbɛsoma ne Ba aba asase so. Nanso, ɔbɔfoɔ bi bɛdi nʼanim a, ɔno na ɔbɛsiesie kwan ama no.
3Saa ɔbɔfoɔ yi bɛtena ɛserɛ so, na wateam sɛ, “Monsiesie Awurade akwan. Obiara nsiesie ne ho mfa ntwɛn Awurade ba no.”
4Saa ɔbɔfoɔ no, ɔne Yohane Osuboni. Ɔtenaa ɛserɛ so, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, wɔnnu wɔn ho wɔ wɔn bɔne ho, na wɔmma wɔmmɔ wɔn asu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, Onyankopɔn de wɔn bɔne bɛkyɛ wɔn. 5Nnipa fifiri Yerusalem ne Yudea nkuro so kɔhunuu Yohane, tiee no. Na wɔkaa wɔn bɔne kyerɛɛ no no, ɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Asubɔnten Yordan mu. 6Na Yohane hyɛ atadeɛ a wɔde aboa nwoma na apam a aboa nwoma abɔsoɔ nso bɔ mu. Na nʼaduane yɛ ntutummɛ ne ɛwoɔ. 7Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu, ɔkaa sɛ, “Ɛrenkyɛ koraa, obi bɛba a ɔwɔ tumi sene me a, ne mpaboa homa mpo, mensɛ sɛ mekoto mesane. 8Me deɛ, mede nsuo na ɛbɔ mo asu, na ɔno deɛ, ɔde Onyankopɔn Honhom Kronkron na ɛbɛbɔ mo asu!”
Yesu Asubɔ ne Ne Sɔhwɛ
9Da bi, Yesu firii Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galileaman mu baeɛ maa Yohane bɔɔ no asu wɔ Asubɔnten Yordan mu 10Yesu firi nsuo no mu sii konkɔn so ara pɛ, ɔhunuu sɛ ɛsoro abue, na Honhom Kronkron resiane sɛ aborɔnoma aba ne so. Saa berɛ no ara mu, 11ɛnne bi firi soro kaa sɛ, “Wone me Dɔ Ba a wosɔ mʼani.”
12Ɛhɔ ara, Honhom Kronkron de Yesu kɔɔ ɛserɛ so. 13Ɔtenaa hɔ adaduanan a na obiara nka ne ho ka wiram mmoa nko ara. Ɛhɔ na ɔbonsam sɔɔ no hwɛeɛ. Akyire yi, abɔfoɔ ba bɛsom no.
Asuafoɔ Baanan a Wɔdi Kan No Frɛ
14Ɔhene Herode kyeree Yohane akyi no, Yesu kɔɔ Galiilea kɔkaa asɛmpa no wɔ hɔ.
15Ɔkaa sɛ, “Ɛberɛ no awie du! Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn. Monsakra mo adwene na monnye asɛmpa no nni!”
16Da bi a Yesu nam Galilea mpoano no, ɔhunuu Simon ne ne nua Andrea sɛ wɔregu asau.
17Yesu frɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mommɛdi mʼakyi! Na mɛma mo ayɛ nnipayifoɔ.” 18Ɛhɔ ara, wɔgyaa wɔn asau no guu hɔ bɛdii nʼakyi.
19Ɔkɔɔ nʼanim kakra no, ɔhunuu Sebedeo mma baanu a wɔfrɛ ɔbaako Yohane, ɛnna ɔbaako nso Yakobo, sɛ wɔte kodoɔ mu reyɔ wɔn asau ho adwuma. 20Ɔfrɛɛ wɔn nso sɛ wɔmmɛdi nʼakyi. Ntɛm ara, wɔgyaa wɔn papa Sebedeo ne nʼapaafoɔ hɔ wɔ kodoɔ no mu bɛdii nʼakyi.
Yesu Tu Hohommɔne
21Yesu ne nʼakyidifoɔ yi bɛduruu Kapernaum. Na Homeda duruiɛ noɔ ɔkɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔkaa asɛmpa no. 22Nnipa no tee asɛm no no, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔkasaa te sɛ obi a ɔwɔ tumi, na mmom wankasa sɛ Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no.
23Amonom hɔ ara, ɔbarima bi a hohommɔne bi hyɛ ne mu de nteateamu puee asɔredan mu hɔ sɛ, 24“Ɛdeɛn na wo Naseretni Yesu wɔ ne yɛn yɔ? Woaba sɛ worebɛsɛe yɛn anaa? Menim wo sɛ wone Onyankopɔn Ba Kronkron no!”
25Yesu teateaa hohommɔne no sɛ, “Mua wʼano! Firi ne mu kɔ!” 26Hohommɔne no wosoo saa ɔbarima no, maa ɔteateaam den na ɛtu kɔeɛ. 27Nnipa no nyinaa ho dwirii wɔn, maa wɔbisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ. “Nkyerɛkyerɛ foforɔ bɛn ni? Ahohommɔne mpo tie ne nne!”
28Saa anwanwadeɛ a ɔyɔeɛ yi ho nsɛm trɛ faa Galileaman mu nyinaa.
Yesu Sa Nyarewa
29Wɔfirii asɔredan no mu no, ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no kɔɔ Simon ne Andrea fie. 30Wɔkɔtoo sɛ huraeɛ akyere Simon ase baa ma ɔda hɔ. 31Yesu kɔɔ baabi a ɔda hɔ, kɔsɔɔ ne nsa, maa ɔsɔre tenaa ase. Ɛhɔ ara, huraeɛ no tu firii ne so. Ɔsɔre noaa aduane maa wɔn.
