Ɔmansinihene Herode tee deɛ Yesu ayɔ no nyinaa no, ɛhaa no yie, ɛfiri sɛ, na ebinom keka sɛ Yohane Osubɔni na wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu, na afoforɔ nso se ɛyɛ Elia anaa tete adiyifoɔ no mu baako na wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu aba.
Herode kaa sɛ, “Yohane deɛ, matwa ne ti, na hwan koraa ne saa onipa yi a mete anwanwasɛm a ɛte seyie fa ne ho yi?” Yei nti, ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔhu no.
Yesu Ma Nnipa Mpemnum Aduane
Asomafoɔ no firii wɔn akwantuo mu baeɛ no, wɔbɔɔ nsɛm a ɛsisii hɔ nyinaa ho amanneɛ kyerɛɛ Yesu. Yei akyi, Yesu ne wɔn twee wɔn ho kɔɔ baabi a ɛbɛn Betsaida. Nnipakuo no hunuu deɛ Yesu ne aʼasomafoɔ no wɔ no, wɔtii wɔn maa ɔgyee wɔn fɛw so, kaa Onyankopɔn Ahennie ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn, saa ayarefoɔ yadeɛ.
Anim rebiribiri no, dumienu no baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ka kyerɛ nnipa no na wɔnkɔ nkuro ne nkuraa a atwa yɛn ho ahyia yi mu nkɔpɛ deɛ wɔbɛdi ne deɛ wɔbɛda ɛfiri sɛ, baabi a yɛwɔ yi yɛ serɛ so.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mo ara momma wɔn biribi nni.” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Yɛwɔ brodo enum ne atidie mmienu pɛ. Ɛno nti, gye sɛ yɛkɔtɔ aduane brɛ wɔn nyinaa.” Na nnipa bɛyɛ mpemnum na wɔahyia wɔ hɔ. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Monhwɛ na nnipa no ntenatena ase aduonum aduonum.” Wɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ Yesu kaeɛ no.
Afei, Yesu faa brodo num no ne atidie mmienu no na ɔhwɛɛ soro, daa so ase, hyiraa so, bubuu mu de maa nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ wɔnkyɛ mma nnipa no.
Obiara didi meeɛ. Afei, asuafoɔ no boaboaa deɛ wɔdi ma ɛkaeɛ no ano no, ɛyɛɛ nkɛntɛmma dumienu.
Petro Kyerɛ Onipa Ko A Yesu Yɛ
Da bi Yesu nko ara kɔhyɛɛ baabi bɔɔ mpaeɛ. Yei akyi no, ɔbisaa nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Nnipa ka sɛ mene hwan?”
Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Ebinom ka sɛ, woyɛ Yohane Osubɔni, ebinom nso ka sɛ Elia, na afoforɔ nso sɛ, woyɛ tete adiyifoɔ no baako a wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu aba.”
Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Na mo nso mose mene hwan?” Petro buaa no sɛ, “Wone Kristo, deɛ Onyankopɔn asoma no no.”
Yesu Hyɛ Ne Wuo Ho Nkɔm
Yesu bɔɔ wɔn ano sɛ wɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara. Ɔtoaa so sɛ, “Ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no hunu amane pii; Yudafoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nso bɛpo no. Akyire yi wɔbɛku no, na ne nnansa so wasɔre.”
Afei, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn nyinaa sɛ, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi mʼakyi a, ɔmpa ne ho akyi na daa ɔnsoa nʼasɛnnua na ɔnni mʼakyi. Na obiara a ɔma nʼani ku ne ho sene me no, ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa; na deɛ me nti ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa no, ne nsa bɛka. Na sɛ onipa nya wiase yi mu nnoɔma nyinaa na ɔhwere ne kra a, ɛdeɛn mfasoɔ na ɔbɛnya? Na deɛ nʼani bɛwu me ne me nsɛm ho no, ɔno nso, da a me, Kristo bɛba wɔ me ne Agya no ne abɔfo kronkron no animuonyam mu no, mʼani bɛwu ne ho. Na mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, mo a mogyina ha yi mu bi wɔ hɔ a wɔrenwu kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛhunu Onyankopɔn Ahennie no.”
Yesu Animuonyam Da Adi
Yesu kaa ne nsɛm yi wieeɛ no, ɛbɛyɛ nnawɔtwe akyi, ɔne Petro, Yohane ne Yakobo kɔɔ bepɔ bi so sɛ wɔrekɔbɔ mpaeɛ. Na Yesu gu so rebɔ mpaeɛ no, nʼanimdua sesaeɛ, na nʼatadeɛ nso hyerɛneeɛ. Prɛko pɛ, nnipa baanu a ɛyɛ Mose ne Elia ne no bɛkasaeɛ. Saa nnipa baanu yi bɛpuee hɔ animuonyam mu kaa ne wuo a ɔbɛwu wɔ Yerusalem no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no.
Saa berɛ no na Petro ne nnipa a wɔka ne ho no adeda hatehatee na wɔnyanenyanee a wɔn ani so tetee wɔn no, wɔhunuu Yesu sɛ ɔwɔ nʼanimuonyam mu ne nnipa baanu bi a wɔka ne ho. Na ɛbaa sɛ nnipa no refiri Yesu nkyɛn akɔ no, Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, ɛyɛ sɛ yɛn nso yɛwɔ ha bi. Ma yɛmmɔ asese mmiɛnsa; wo deɛ baako, Mose deɛ baako na Elia nso deɛ baako.” Na Petro nnim asɛm a ɔreka no.
Ɔgu so rekasa no, omununkum bɛkataa wɔn so maa wɔsuroeɛ. Na nne bi firi omununkum no mu kaa sɛ, “Oyi ne me Ba a mayi no. Montie no!”
Kasa yi akyi no, wohunuu sɛ aka Yesu nko ara na ɔgyina hɔ. Na mmerɛ no mu, wɔanka deɛ wɔhunuiɛ no ankyerɛ obiara.
Otwafoɔ Bi Ayaresa
Adeɛ kyeeɛ a wɔsiane firii bepɔ no so baeɛ no, nnipakuo bi bɛhyiaa Yesu. Ɔbarima bi firi nnipakuo no mu teaam sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, mesrɛ wo, bra bɛhwɛ me ba a medi no ba korɔ ma me; sɛ hohommɔne ba ne so a, amonom, ɔteam, ɔtwa hwe, ɔsensene, nʼano pu ahuro, na ɔbu fa so, na ɛkyɛ ansa na afiri ne so. Na mesrɛɛ wʼasuafoɔ no sɛ wɔntu hohommɔne no, nanso wɔantumi.”
Yesu kaa sɛ, “O! Mo a monni gyidie, mentena mo nkyɛn na mennya mo ho boasetɔ nkɔsi da bɛn!” Afei, ɔdanee nʼani ka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima no sɛ, “Fa wo ba no bra ha.”
Ɔde abɔfra no reba no, hohommɔne no twaa no hwee fam maa ɔsenseneeɛ. Nanso, Yesu teateaa hohommɔne no maa abɔfra no ho yɛɛ no den na ɔde no maa ne papa.
Onyankopɔn tumi ne ne kɛseyɛ a ɛdaa adi wɔ hohommɔne no tu mu no maa nnipa no ho dwirii wɔn. Na wɔredwennwene deɛ asi yi ho no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Montie asɛm a merebɛka yi yie. Wɔbɛyi Kristo no ama.” Deɛ ɔkaeɛ yi na ɛyɛ ahuntasɛm nti, asuafoɔ no ante aseɛ. Nanso, na wɔsuro sɛ wɔbɛbisa no aseɛ.
Deɛ Ɔyɛ Kɛse Onyankopɔn Anim
Asuafoɔ no gyee akyinnyeɛ a ɛfa wɔn mu deɛ ɔbɛyɛ kɛse Onyankoɔn Ahennie mu no ho. Na Yesu hunuu wɔn adwene no, ɔsɔɔ abɔfra bi mu de no bɛgyinaa ne nkyɛn pɛɛ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Obiara a ɔbɛgye saa abɔfra yi wɔ me din mu no, gye me; na deɛ ɔgye me no nso, gye deɛ ɔsomaa me no. Deɛ ɔyɛ aketewa wɔ mo nyinaa mu no, ɔno ne ɔkɛseɛ.” Yohane nso ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Awurade, yehunuu obi a ɔnka yɛn ho sɛ ɔde wo din tu ahohommɔne enti yɛbraa no.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛnsɛ sɛ anka mobra no, ɛfiri sɛ, deɛ ɔntia mo no, na ɔwɔ mo afa.”
Samariafoɔ Bi Po Yesu
Na berɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ Yesu sane kɔ soro no rebɛn no, ɔsii ne bo sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Yerusalem. Ansa na ɔrebɛkɔ no, ɔsomaa nnipa bi dii kan kɔɔ Samaria akuraa bi ase sɛ wɔnkɔsiesie baabi mma no. Nanso, Samariafoɔ no annye Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔhunuu sɛ na ɔrekɔ Yerusalem. Asuafoɔ no tee deɛ aba no, Yakobo ne Yohane bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, wopɛ sɛ yɛma egya firi soro bɛhye wɔn pasaa anaa?” Yesu danee nʼani kyerɛɛ wɔn kaa wɔn anim, na wɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ akuraa foforɔ bi ase.
Kristo Akyidie Mu Brɛ
Berɛ a wɔrekɔ no, ɔbarima bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, mɛdi wʼakyi.”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Sakraman wɔ wɔn abɔn, wiem nnomaa nso wɔ mpirebuo, nanso Kristo no deɛ, ɔnni daberɛ.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima foforɔ bi nso sɛ, “Bɛdi mʼakyi.” Nanso, ɔbarima no kaa sɛ, “Awurade, ma me kwan na menkɔsie me papa ansa.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ma wɔn a wɔte ase na wɔawu wɔ honhom mu no nyɔ saa nnwuma no, na wo deɛ, kɔka Onyankopɔn Ahennie no ho asɛm kyerɛ amanaman nyinaa.” Na ɔfoforɔ nso kaa sɛ, “Awurade, mɛdi wʼakyi; nanso ma me kwan na me ne mʼabusuafoɔ nkɔdi nkra ansa.”
Nanso, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Obiara a ɔbɛma nʼadwene ayɛ no ntanta wɔ dwumadie bi a mede ahyɛ ne nsa no ho no, mfata Onyankopɔn Ahennie no.”
Luka 10Asuafoɔ Aduɔson No Soma
1Yei akyi, Yesu yii nʼakyidifoɔ no mu aduɔson somaa wɔn baanu baanu kɔɔ nkuro ne nkuraa a akyire yi ɔbɛkɔ hɔ no so.
2Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Otwa adwuma no dɔɔso, nanso adwumayɔfoɔ no sua. Enti, monsrɛ adwumawura no na ɔmma adwumayɛfoɔ bebree mmra ne twa adwuma no mu. 3Monkɔ, na meresoma mo sɛ nnwan akɔ mpataku mu. 4Mommfa sika, akwantubɔtɔ anaa mpaboa; na monnkyea obiara nso a mobɛhyia no wɔ kwan so.
5“Sɛ mokɔ efie biara mu a, monni kan nkyea efie hɔfoɔ no sɛ, ‘Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!’ 6Na sɛ asomdwoe ba bi wɔ hɔ a, mo asomdwoeɛ bɛba ne so; na sɛ obi a ɔte saa nni hɔ a, mo asomdwoeɛ bɛsane aba mo nkyɛn. 7Ɛfie biara a mokɔ mu no, momma ɛhɔ nyɛ mo atenaeɛ; aduane biara a wɔde bɛma mo no, monni, ɛfiri sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ odwumayɔfoɔ biara nya nʼadwumayɔ so akatua; monnni atutena wɔ afie mu.
8“Na sɛ mokɔ kuro biara mu na wɔgye mo fɛw so a, aduane biara a wɔde bɛma mo no, monni. 9Monsa kuro no mu ayarefoɔ yadeɛ, na monka nkyerɛ ɛhɔfoɔ nyinaa sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn mo.’
10“Nanso, sɛ mokɔ kuro biara mu na wɔannye mo fɛw so a, monkɔ ne mmɔnten so nkɔpae mu nka sɛ, 11‘Mo kurom ha mfuturo a ɛwɔ yɛn nan ase mpo, yɛreporoporo agu, de atia mo; na mmom monhunu pefee sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn.’ 12Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, saa kuro no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn atɛmmu da no bɛsene deɛ ɛtoo Sodom no. 13Korasin, due! Betsaida, due! Anwanwadeɛ a meyɛɛ wɔ mo mu no, sɛ meyɛɛ wɔ Tiro ne Sidon a, anka ɛhɔfoɔ no de awerɛhoɔ ne ahonuo asakra wɔn adwene dada. 14Atɛmmu da no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn no bɛsene deɛ ɛbɛto Tiro ne Sidon. 15Na wo Kapernaum, wogye di sɛ wobɛnya ɔsoro animuonyam? Dabida, wobɛkɔ asaman.
16“Obiara a ɔtie mo no tie me, na deɛ ɔpo mo no po me, na deɛ ɔpo me no nso po deɛ ɔsomaa me no.”
Aduɔson No Amanneɛbɔ
17Aduɔson no sane de anigyeɛ baeɛ bɛbɔɔ amanneɛ sɛ, “Awurade, wo din nti, ahohommɔne mpo abrɛ wɔn ho ase ama yɛn.”
18Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mehunuu sɛ ɔbonsam rete afiri soro sɛ anyinam abɛhwe fam. 19Mama mo tumi ne ahoɔden a mode bɛtiatia awɔ ne nkekantwerɛ ne ɔtamfoɔ no tumi biara a ɔwɔ so, na biribiara nso rentumi mo. 20Nanso mommma mo ani nnnye sɛ ahohommɔne brɛ wɔn ho ase ma mo, na mmom, momma mo ani nnye sɛ wɔatwerɛ mo din wɔ soro.”
Yesu Aseda Mpaeɛ
21Saa berɛ no ara mu, Yesu de Honhom Kronkron mu anigyeɛ bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “Agya, ɔsoro ne asasewura, meda wo ase sɛ wode saa nnoɔma yi ahunta wɔn a wɔsusu sɛ wɔyɛ anyansafoɔ, na mmom woada nokorɛ no adi akyerɛ wɔn a wɔde ahobrɛaseɛ gye wo di sɛ mmɔfra no. Nanso, Agya, wo pɛ mu na woma ɛbaa saa. 22Mʼagya de nnoama nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa; na obiara nnim Ɔba no, gye Agya no. Saa ara nso na obiara nnim Agya no, gye Ɔba no ne wɔn a Ɔba no bɛda Agya no adi akyerɛ wɔn no.”
23Ɛkaa ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Nhyira ne aniwa a ɛhunu deɛ muhunu! 24Ɛfiri sɛ, adiyifoɔ ne ahene pii pɛɛ sɛ anka wɔhunu deɛ mohunu yi na wɔte deɛ mote yi, nanso wɔanhunu na wɔante.”
Mmaranimfoɔ Bi Asɛmmisa
25Mmaranimfoɔ bi pɛɛ sɛ ɔsɔ Yesu hwɛ nti ɔbisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, menyɛ dɛn na manya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ?”
26Yesu nso bisaa no sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na wɔatwerɛ wɔ Mose mmara no mu? Na wote aseɛ sɛn?”
27Ɔbuaa no sɛ, “Mmara no ka sɛ, ‘Fa wo koma, ne wo kra, ne wʼahoɔden, ne wʼadwene nyinaa dɔ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn, na dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho!’ ”
28Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Woabua no yie. Yɛ yeinom na wobɛnya nkwa.”
29Nanso, ɔbarima no pɛɛ sɛ ɔkyerɛ sɛ ɔdi mmara no nyinaa so nti, ɔbisaa Yesu sɛ, “Hwan ne me yɔnko?”
Samariani A Ɔhunuu Mmɔbɔ No
30Yesu nso maa no mfatoho bi sɛ, “Da bi na ɔbarima bi retu kwan firi Yerusalem akɔ Yeriko. Na ɔnam kwan so no, ɔkɔtɔɔ akwanmukafoɔ mu na wɔgyee ne ho nnoɔma nyinaa, hwee no, pirapiraa no maa ɔtɔɔ beraw, gyaa no too kwankyɛn kɔeɛ.
31“Ankyɛ biara, Yudani sɔfoɔ bi bɛpuee ne so, nanso ɔmane faa nkyɛn kɔeɛ. 32Saa ara nso na Lewini bi nso bɛpuee ne so mane faa nkyɛn.
33“Ankyɛ biara na Samariani bi nso bɛpuee hɔ. Ɔhunuu no no, ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ. 34Ɔkɔkotoo ne nkyɛn, hohoroo nʼapirakuro no anim, de aduro guguu mu, kyekyereeɛ. Afei, ɔmaa no so de no tenaa nʼafunumu so dii aboa no nkyɛn de no kɔɔ ahɔhobea bi hwɛɛ no anadwo mu no nyinaa. 35Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔgyaa ahɔhobea sohwɛfoɔ no sika a ɛbɛso no hwɛ sɛ ɔmfa nhwɛ no. Ɔsane hyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ, ‘Ɛka foforɔ biara a wobɛbɔ wɔ ne ho no, mɛba abɛtua.’
36“Afei, saa nnipa baasa yi mu hwan na ɔyɛɛ ne yɔnko?”
37Mmaranimfoɔ no buaa sɛ, “Deɛ ɔhunuu opirafoɔ no mmɔbɔ no.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Wo nso, kɔ na kɔyɛ saa ara.”
Marta Ne Maria
38Ɛbaa sɛ Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ rekɔ Yerusalem no, wɔkɔduruu akuraa bi ase. Wɔduruu hɔ no, ɔbaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Marta de no kɔɔ ne fie. 39Marta nuabaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Maria tenaa fam wɔ Yesu nkyɛn tiee no,
40Saa berɛ no, Marta a nʼani abere reyɛ aduane no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Awurade, mayɔ adwuma abrɛ nti ka kyerɛ Maria na ɔmmɛsɔ me mu.”
41Awurade buaa no sɛ, “Marta, Marta, wodwennwene ha wo ho wɔ nnoɔma pii ho. 42Adeɛ baako pɛ na ɛhia; ɛno na Maria afa no; na wɔrennye mfiri ne nsam.”Asuafoɔ Aduɔson No Soma
Yei akyi, Yesu yii nʼakyidifoɔ no mu aduɔson somaa wɔn baanu baanu kɔɔ nkuro ne nkuraa a akyire yi ɔbɛkɔ hɔ no so.
Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Otwa adwuma no dɔɔso, nanso adwumayɔfoɔ no sua. Enti, monsrɛ adwumawura no na ɔmma adwumayɛfoɔ bebree mmra ne twa adwuma no mu. Monkɔ, na meresoma mo sɛ nnwan akɔ mpataku mu. Mommfa sika, akwantubɔtɔ anaa mpaboa; na monnkyea obiara nso a mobɛhyia no wɔ kwan so.
“Sɛ mokɔ efie biara mu a, monni kan nkyea efie hɔfoɔ no sɛ, ‘Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!’ Na sɛ asomdwoe ba bi wɔ hɔ a, mo asomdwoeɛ bɛba ne so; na sɛ obi a ɔte saa nni hɔ a, mo asomdwoeɛ bɛsane aba mo nkyɛn. Ɛfie biara a mokɔ mu no, momma ɛhɔ nyɛ mo atenaeɛ; aduane biara a wɔde bɛma mo no, monni, ɛfiri sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ odwumayɔfoɔ biara nya nʼadwumayɔ so akatua; monnni atutena wɔ afie mu.
“Na sɛ mokɔ kuro biara mu na wɔgye mo fɛw so a, aduane biara a wɔde bɛma mo no, monni. Monsa kuro no mu ayarefoɔ yadeɛ, na monka nkyerɛ ɛhɔfoɔ nyinaa sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn mo.’
“Nanso, sɛ mokɔ kuro biara mu na wɔannye mo fɛw so a, monkɔ ne mmɔnten so nkɔpae mu nka sɛ, ‘Mo kurom ha mfuturo a ɛwɔ yɛn nan ase mpo, yɛreporoporo agu, de atia mo; na mmom monhunu pefee sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn.’ Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, saa kuro no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn atɛmmu da no bɛsene deɛ ɛtoo Sodom no. Korasin, due! Betsaida, due! Anwanwadeɛ a meyɛɛ wɔ mo mu no, sɛ meyɛɛ wɔ Tiro ne Sidon a, anka ɛhɔfoɔ no de awerɛhoɔ ne ahonuo asakra wɔn adwene dada. Atɛmmu da no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn no bɛsene deɛ ɛbɛto Tiro ne Sidon. Na wo Kapernaum, wogye di sɛ wobɛnya ɔsoro animuonyam? Dabida, wobɛkɔ asaman.
“Obiara a ɔtie mo no tie me, na deɛ ɔpo mo no po me, na deɛ ɔpo me no nso po deɛ ɔsomaa me no.”
Aduɔson No Amanneɛbɔ
Aduɔson no sane de anigyeɛ baeɛ bɛbɔɔ amanneɛ sɛ, “Awurade, wo din nti, ahohommɔne mpo abrɛ wɔn ho ase ama yɛn.”
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mehunuu sɛ ɔbonsam rete afiri soro sɛ anyinam abɛhwe fam. Mama mo tumi ne ahoɔden a mode bɛtiatia awɔ ne nkekantwerɛ ne ɔtamfoɔ no tumi biara a ɔwɔ so, na biribiara nso rentumi mo. Nanso mommma mo ani nnnye sɛ ahohommɔne brɛ wɔn ho ase ma mo, na mmom, momma mo ani nnye sɛ wɔatwerɛ mo din wɔ soro.”
Yesu Aseda Mpaeɛ
Saa berɛ no ara mu, Yesu de Honhom Kronkron mu anigyeɛ bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “Agya, ɔsoro ne asasewura, meda wo ase sɛ wode saa nnoɔma yi ahunta wɔn a wɔsusu sɛ wɔyɛ anyansafoɔ, na mmom woada nokorɛ no adi akyerɛ wɔn a wɔde ahobrɛaseɛ gye wo di sɛ mmɔfra no. Nanso, Agya, wo pɛ mu na woma ɛbaa saa. Mʼagya de nnoama nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa; na obiara nnim Ɔba no, gye Agya no. Saa ara nso na obiara nnim Agya no, gye Ɔba no ne wɔn a Ɔba no bɛda Agya no adi akyerɛ wɔn no.”
Ɛkaa ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Nhyira ne aniwa a ɛhunu deɛ muhunu! Ɛfiri sɛ, adiyifoɔ ne ahene pii pɛɛ sɛ anka wɔhunu deɛ mohunu yi na wɔte deɛ mote yi, nanso wɔanhunu na wɔante.”
Mmaranimfoɔ Bi Asɛmmisa
Mmaranimfoɔ bi pɛɛ sɛ ɔsɔ Yesu hwɛ nti ɔbisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, menyɛ dɛn na manya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ?”
Yesu nso bisaa no sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na wɔatwerɛ wɔ Mose mmara no mu? Na wote aseɛ sɛn?”
Ɔbuaa no sɛ, “Mmara no ka sɛ, ‘Fa wo koma, ne wo kra, ne wʼahoɔden, ne wʼadwene nyinaa dɔ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn, na dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho!’ ”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Woabua no yie. Yɛ yeinom na wobɛnya nkwa.”
Nanso, ɔbarima no pɛɛ sɛ ɔkyerɛ sɛ ɔdi mmara no nyinaa so nti, ɔbisaa Yesu sɛ, “Hwan ne me yɔnko?”
Samariani A Ɔhunuu Mmɔbɔ No
Yesu nso maa no mfatoho bi sɛ, “Da bi na ɔbarima bi retu kwan firi Yerusalem akɔ Yeriko. Na ɔnam kwan so no, ɔkɔtɔɔ akwanmukafoɔ mu na wɔgyee ne ho nnoɔma nyinaa, hwee no, pirapiraa no maa ɔtɔɔ beraw, gyaa no too kwankyɛn kɔeɛ.
“Ankyɛ biara, Yudani sɔfoɔ bi bɛpuee ne so, nanso ɔmane faa nkyɛn kɔeɛ. Saa ara nso na Lewini bi nso bɛpuee ne so mane faa nkyɛn.
“Ankyɛ biara na Samariani bi nso bɛpuee hɔ. Ɔhunuu no no, ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ. Ɔkɔkotoo ne nkyɛn, hohoroo nʼapirakuro no anim, de aduro guguu mu, kyekyereeɛ. Afei, ɔmaa no so de no tenaa nʼafunumu so dii aboa no nkyɛn de no kɔɔ ahɔhobea bi hwɛɛ no anadwo mu no nyinaa. Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔgyaa ahɔhobea sohwɛfoɔ no sika a ɛbɛso no hwɛ sɛ ɔmfa nhwɛ no. Ɔsane hyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ, ‘Ɛka foforɔ biara a wobɛbɔ wɔ ne ho no, mɛba abɛtua.’
“Afei, saa nnipa baasa yi mu hwan na ɔyɛɛ ne yɔnko?”
Mmaranimfoɔ no buaa sɛ, “Deɛ ɔhunuu opirafoɔ no mmɔbɔ no.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Wo nso, kɔ na kɔyɛ saa ara.”
Marta Ne Maria
Ɛbaa sɛ Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ rekɔ Yerusalem no, wɔkɔduruu akuraa bi ase. Wɔduruu hɔ no, ɔbaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Marta de no kɔɔ ne fie. Marta nuabaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Maria tenaa fam wɔ Yesu nkyɛn tiee no,
Saa berɛ no, Marta a nʼani abere reyɛ aduane no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Awurade, mayɔ adwuma abrɛ nti ka kyerɛ Maria na ɔmmɛsɔ me mu.”
Awurade buaa no sɛ, “Marta, Marta, wodwennwene ha wo ho wɔ nnoɔma pii ho. Adeɛ baako pɛ na ɛhia; ɛno na Maria afa no; na wɔrennye mfiri ne nsam.”
Luka 11Yesu Kyerɛ Mpaebɔ
1Da bi na Yesu rebɔ mpaeɛ wɔ baabi. Ɔwieeɛ no, nʼasuafoɔ no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn mpaebɔ, sɛdeɛ Yohane kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ mpaebɔ no.”
2Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ morebɔ mpaeɛ a, monka sɛ,
“Agya, wo din ho nte. Wʼahennie mmra. 3Ma yɛn yɛn ano aduane daa. 4Fa yɛn bɔne kyɛ yɛn sɛdeɛ yɛn nso, yɛde wɔn a wɔfom yɛn no bɔne kyɛ wɔn no. Na nnyaa yɛn mma yɛnnkɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”
5Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛkɔ ne yɔnko hɔ dasuom akɔka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Me nua, fɛm me aduane kakra, 6ɛfiri sɛ, ɔhɔhoɔ bi abɛfu me mu, na menni aduane biara a mede bɛma no,’ 7na ɔbɛma no mmuaeɛ afiri ne dan mu sɛ, ‘Nha me! Mato me pono mu ne me mma ada. Merentumi nsɔre mma wo biribiara.’
8“Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, na ade asa no nti, ɔyɛ ne yɔnko koraa mpo a, ɔrensɔre. Nanso, ɛsiane sɛ ɔkɔɔ so srɛɛ no no nti, ɛbɛma wasɔre ama no deɛ ɛhia no no nyinaa. 9Ɛno nti mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ; Mommisa, na wɔbɛma mo; monhwehwɛ na mobɛhu; mompem na wɔbɛbue mo. 10Na obiara a ɔbisa no, wɔma no; na obiara a ɔhwehwɛ no, ɔhu; na deɛ ɔpem no, wɔbue no.
11“Agya bɛn na ɔwɔ mo mu na ne ba bisa no brodo a ɔbɛma no ɛboɔ, 12anaasɛ ɔbisa no otidie a, ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ, anaasɛ ɔbisa nkosua a ɔbɛma no akakantwerɛ? 13Na sɛ mo a moyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ mpo nim sɛdeɛ moma mo mma nnepa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no remfa Honhom Kronkron no mma wɔn a wɔbisa no no!”
Yesu Ne Beelsebul
14Berɛ bi Yesu tuu hohommɔne bi a ɛyɛ mumu firii onipa bi mu. Hohommɔne no tu firii ne mu no, ɔkasaeɛ maa ɛyɛɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa ahodwiri. 15Nanso, ebinom kaa sɛ, “Ɔnam ahohommɔne panin Beelsebul tumi so na ɛtu ahohommɔne.” 16Afoforɔ nso pɛɛ sɛ wɔsɔ no hwɛ nti, wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi a ɛfiri soro nkyerɛ wɔn.
17Nanso, ɔhunuu wɔn adwene maa wɔn mmuaeɛ sɛ, “Kuro biara a ɛmu akyekyɛ no dane amamfo. Saa ara nso na efie biara a ɛmu kyekyɛ no guo. 18Na sɛ ɔbonsam nso ko tia ne ho a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na nʼahennie agyina? Deɛ enti a mereka saa asɛm yi ne sɛ, mose menam Beelsebul tumi so na metu ahohommɔne. 19Na sɛ menam Beelsebul tumi so na metu ahohommɔne a hwan so na mo nkurɔfoɔ nam tu ahohommɔne? Saa na ɛteɛ de a, mo nkurɔfoɔ no ara na wɔbɛbu mo atɛn. 20Nanso, sɛ menam Onyankopɔn tumi so na ɛtu hohommɔne de a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no aba mo so.
21“Sɛ ɔhoɔdenfoɔ de akodeɛ wɛn ne fie a, obiara rentumi nkɔwia nʼagyapadeɛ; 22nanso, sɛ deɛ ne ho yɛ den na ɔwɔ akodeɛ pa sene no kɔ ne so a, ɔdi ne so nkonim, gye nʼakodeɛ a ɔde ne ho too so no, sesa nʼagyapadeɛ no nyinaa kɔ.
23“Obiara a ɔnni mʼafa no tia me, na deɛ ɔne me mmoaboa ano no, hwete mu.
24“Sɛ wɔtu hohommɔne firi onipa bi mu a, ɛkyinkyini hwehwɛ homebea, nanso, ɛnnya bi. Na sɛ wannya homebea a, ɔka sɛ, ‘Mɛsan makɔ onipa a mifirii ne mu baeɛ no mu bio.’ 25Na sɛ ɔsan kɔ onipa no mu a, ɔbɛhunu sɛ ɛhɔ te a ɛfi biara nni mu na biribiara yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ. 26Afei, ɔsan nʼakyi kɔfa ahohommɔne afoforɔ nson a wɔyɛ den kyɛn no ba ma wɔn nyinaa bɛtena hɔ. Yei ma onipa no sɛe koraa sene sɛdeɛ anka na ɔte kane no.”
Adeɛ A Ɛho Hia
27Yesu gu so rekasa no, ɔbaa bi firi nnipakuo no mu kaa sɛ, “Nhyira nka yafunu a ɛwoo wo ne nufuɔ a wonumuu ano!” 28Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛwom deɛ, nanso nhyira ne wɔn a wɔte Onyankopɔn asɛm na wɔdi so.”
Yudafoɔ Bisa Nsɛnkyerɛnne
29Nnipa no kyeree Yesu so no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Nnɛmma yi yɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ. Wɔhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi ahunu nanso wɔrenhu nsɛnkyerɛnne biara sɛ Yona nsɛnkyerɛnne no. 30Na sɛdeɛ Yona yɔeɛ no yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne mma Niniwefoɔ a, saa ara na Kristo nso bɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ma nnɛmma yi. 31Atɛmmu da no, Shebahemmaa ne nnɛmma bɛsɔre ayi ɔman yi atɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔfiri asase ano dohoa bɛtiee Salomo nyansa nsɛm. Nanso, deɛ ɔsene Salomo no wɔ ha.
32“Atɛmmuda no, Niniwe mmarima ne nnɛmma bɛsɔre ayi ɔman yi atɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, berɛ a Yona kaa asɛmpa no wɔsakraa wɔn adwene. Nanso, deɛ ɔsene Yona wɔ ha.
Kanea Adwuma
33“Obiara nsɔ kanea mfa nsie, na mmom, ɔde si petee mu na ahyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔba mu no nyinaa. 34Wʼani yɛ wo nipadua kanea. Ɛno nti sɛ, wʼani yɛ a, na wo nipadua nso yɛ hann. Nanso, sɛ ɛnyɛ a, ɛma wo nipadua no dane sum tumm. 35Enti hwɛ yie na hann a ɛwɔ wo mu no annane sum. 36Sɛ wo nipadua yɛ hann a esum nni fa baabiara a, nipadua no bɛhyerɛn sɛdeɛ kanea hyerɛn gu wo so.”
Farisini Bi Fie Adidie
37Yesu kasa wieeɛ no, Farisini bi hyiaa no adidie enti ɔkɔeɛ sɛ ɔne no rekɔdidi. 38Farisini no hunuu sɛ Yesu anhohoro ne nsa ansa sɛdeɛ wɔn amanneɛ kyerɛ ansa na ɔredidi no, ɛyɛɛ no nwanwa.
39Yesu hunuu Farisini no adwene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Mo Farisifoɔ deɛ, mohohoro nkukuo ne nwowaa ho, nanso efi, anibereɛ ne nnebɔne ahyɛ mo ma tɔ! 40Adwenemherɛfoɔ! Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔyɔɔ akyire no ara na ɔyɔɔ ɛmu nso? 41Monyɛ ahiafoɔ adɔeɛ na biribiara ho bɛte ama mo.
42“Mo Farisifoɔ, monnue! Moma mo nnɔbaeɛ so ntotosoɔ du du, nanso mototo adeteneneeyɛ ne ɔdɔ a mode dɔ Onyankopɔn no ase. Sɛ mokɔ hyiadan mu a, mpanin tenaberɛ na mopɛ. Saa ara nso na sɛ mokɔ badwa mu a, mopɛ sɛ nnipa hu mo kyea mo.
43“Mo Farisifoɔ, monnue! Sɛ mokɔ hyiadan mu a, mpanin tenaberɛ na mopɛ. 44Monnue! Ɛfiri sɛ, mote sɛ adamena a ɛso asram na nnipa nante so a wɔnnim sɛ wɔnam adamena so.”
45Mmaranimfoɔ no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, sɛ woka saa a na woakasa atia yɛn nso.”
46Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Mo mmaranimfoɔ nso, monnue! Mohyɛ nnipa ma wɔdi mmara so pɛpɛɛpɛ, nanso mo deɛ, monni so sɛ sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ. 47Monnue! Ɛfiri sɛ, moatoto adiyifoɔ a mo ankasa anaa mo agyanom kum wɔn no ada so. 48Mo nneyɛɔe yi di adanseɛ sɛ mopene deɛ mo agyanom yɔeɛ no so. Nʼasekyerɛ ne sɛ, mo agyanom kunkum adiyifoɔ no na mo nso mototoo wɔn ada so maa wɔn. 49Yei ne deɛ Onyankopɔn aka afa mo ho: ‘Mɛsoma adiyifoɔ ne asomafoɔ aba mo nkyɛn na mobɛkunkum bi na moataa wɔn a aka no.’
50“Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, adiyifoɔ no mogya a wɔka gu firi wiase mfitiaseɛ no, 51ɛfiri Habel kum so kɔsi Sakaria a, wɔkum no wɔ afɔremuka ne kronkronbea ntam hɔ no so, wɔbɛbisa ɛho asɛm afiri mo nkyɛn.
52“Mo, mmaranimfoɔ, monnue! Mode nokorɛ hunta mo nkurɔfoɔ. Mo ankasa monni so, na mommma wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔdi so no kwan mma wɔnni so.”
53Ɔfiri Farisini no fie hɔ a ɔrekɔ no, mmaranimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no dii nʼakyi de nsɛmmisa dwanee ne ho, 54pɛɛ sɛ ɔka biribi a wɔbɛgyina so anya no akye no.Yesu Kyerɛ Mpaebɔ
Da bi na Yesu rebɔ mpaeɛ wɔ baabi. Ɔwieeɛ no, nʼasuafoɔ no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn mpaebɔ, sɛdeɛ Yohane kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ mpaebɔ no.”
Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ morebɔ mpaeɛ a, monka sɛ,
“Agya, wo din ho nte. Wʼahennie mmra. Ma yɛn yɛn ano aduane daa. Fa yɛn bɔne kyɛ yɛn sɛdeɛ yɛn nso, yɛde wɔn a wɔfom yɛn no bɔne kyɛ wɔn no. Na nnyaa yɛn mma yɛnnkɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”
Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛkɔ ne yɔnko hɔ dasuom akɔka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Me nua, fɛm me aduane kakra, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔhɔhoɔ bi abɛfu me mu, na menni aduane biara a mede bɛma no,’ na ɔbɛma no mmuaeɛ afiri ne dan mu sɛ, ‘Nha me! Mato me pono mu ne me mma ada. Merentumi nsɔre mma wo biribiara.’
“Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, na ade asa no nti, ɔyɛ ne yɔnko koraa mpo a, ɔrensɔre. Nanso, ɛsiane sɛ ɔkɔɔ so srɛɛ no no nti, ɛbɛma wasɔre ama no deɛ ɛhia no no nyinaa. Ɛno nti mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ; Mommisa, na wɔbɛma mo; monhwehwɛ na mobɛhu; mompem na wɔbɛbue mo. Na obiara a ɔbisa no, wɔma no; na obiara a ɔhwehwɛ no, ɔhu; na deɛ ɔpem no, wɔbue no.
“Agya bɛn na ɔwɔ mo mu na ne ba bisa no brodo a ɔbɛma no ɛboɔ, anaasɛ ɔbisa no otidie a, ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ, anaasɛ ɔbisa nkosua a ɔbɛma no akakantwerɛ? Na sɛ mo a moyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ mpo nim sɛdeɛ moma mo mma nnepa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no remfa Honhom Kronkron no mma wɔn a wɔbisa no no!”
Yesu Ne Beelsebul
Berɛ bi Yesu tuu hohommɔne bi a ɛyɛ mumu firii onipa bi mu. Hohommɔne no tu firii ne mu no, ɔkasaeɛ maa ɛyɛɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa ahodwiri. Nanso, ebinom kaa sɛ, “Ɔnam ahohommɔne panin Beelsebul tumi so na ɛtu ahohommɔne.” Afoforɔ nso pɛɛ sɛ wɔsɔ no hwɛ nti, wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi a ɛfiri soro nkyerɛ wɔn.
Nanso, ɔhunuu wɔn adwene maa wɔn mmuaeɛ sɛ, “Kuro biara a ɛmu akyekyɛ no dane amamfo. Saa ara nso na efie biara a ɛmu kyekyɛ no guo. Na sɛ ɔbonsam nso ko tia ne ho a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na nʼahennie agyina? Deɛ enti a mereka saa asɛm yi ne sɛ, mose menam Beelsebul tumi so na metu ahohommɔne. Na sɛ menam Beelsebul tumi so na metu ahohommɔne a hwan so na mo nkurɔfoɔ nam tu ahohommɔne? Saa na ɛteɛ de a, mo nkurɔfoɔ no ara na wɔbɛbu mo atɛn. Nanso, sɛ menam Onyankopɔn tumi so na ɛtu hohommɔne de a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no aba mo so.
“Sɛ ɔhoɔdenfoɔ de akodeɛ wɛn ne fie a, obiara rentumi nkɔwia nʼagyapadeɛ; nanso, sɛ deɛ ne ho yɛ den na ɔwɔ akodeɛ pa sene no kɔ ne so a, ɔdi ne so nkonim, gye nʼakodeɛ a ɔde ne ho too so no, sesa nʼagyapadeɛ no nyinaa kɔ.
“Obiara a ɔnni mʼafa no tia me, na deɛ ɔne me mmoaboa ano no, hwete mu.
“Sɛ wɔtu hohommɔne firi onipa bi mu a, ɛkyinkyini hwehwɛ homebea, nanso, ɛnnya bi. Na sɛ wannya homebea a, ɔka sɛ, ‘Mɛsan makɔ onipa a mifirii ne mu baeɛ no mu bio.’ Na sɛ ɔsan kɔ onipa no mu a, ɔbɛhunu sɛ ɛhɔ te a ɛfi biara nni mu na biribiara yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ. Afei, ɔsan nʼakyi kɔfa ahohommɔne afoforɔ nson a wɔyɛ den kyɛn no ba ma wɔn nyinaa bɛtena hɔ. Yei ma onipa no sɛe koraa sene sɛdeɛ anka na ɔte kane no.”
Adeɛ A Ɛho Hia
Yesu gu so rekasa no, ɔbaa bi firi nnipakuo no mu kaa sɛ, “Nhyira nka yafunu a ɛwoo wo ne nufuɔ a wonumuu ano!” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛwom deɛ, nanso nhyira ne wɔn a wɔte Onyankopɔn asɛm na wɔdi so.”
Yudafoɔ Bisa Nsɛnkyerɛnne
Nnipa no kyeree Yesu so no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Nnɛmma yi yɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ. Wɔhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi ahunu nanso wɔrenhu nsɛnkyerɛnne biara sɛ Yona nsɛnkyerɛnne no. Na sɛdeɛ Yona yɔeɛ no yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne mma Niniwefoɔ a, saa ara na Kristo nso bɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ma nnɛmma yi. Atɛmmu da no, Shebahemmaa ne nnɛmma bɛsɔre ayi ɔman yi atɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔfiri asase ano dohoa bɛtiee Salomo nyansa nsɛm. Nanso, deɛ ɔsene Salomo no wɔ ha.
“Atɛmmuda no, Niniwe mmarima ne nnɛmma bɛsɔre ayi ɔman yi atɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, berɛ a Yona kaa asɛmpa no wɔsakraa wɔn adwene. Nanso, deɛ ɔsene Yona wɔ ha.
Kanea Adwuma
“Obiara nsɔ kanea mfa nsie, na mmom, ɔde si petee mu na ahyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔba mu no nyinaa. Wʼani yɛ wo nipadua kanea. Ɛno nti sɛ, wʼani yɛ a, na wo nipadua nso yɛ hann. Nanso, sɛ ɛnyɛ a, ɛma wo nipadua no dane sum tumm. Enti hwɛ yie na hann a ɛwɔ wo mu no annane sum. Sɛ wo nipadua yɛ hann a esum nni fa baabiara a, nipadua no bɛhyerɛn sɛdeɛ kanea hyerɛn gu wo so.”
Farisini Bi Fie Adidie
Yesu kasa wieeɛ no, Farisini bi hyiaa no adidie enti ɔkɔeɛ sɛ ɔne no rekɔdidi. Farisini no hunuu sɛ Yesu anhohoro ne nsa ansa sɛdeɛ wɔn amanneɛ kyerɛ ansa na ɔredidi no, ɛyɛɛ no nwanwa.
Yesu hunuu Farisini no adwene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Mo Farisifoɔ deɛ, mohohoro nkukuo ne nwowaa ho, nanso efi, anibereɛ ne nnebɔne ahyɛ mo ma tɔ! Adwenemherɛfoɔ! Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔyɔɔ akyire no ara na ɔyɔɔ ɛmu nso? Monyɛ ahiafoɔ adɔeɛ na biribiara ho bɛte ama mo.
“Mo Farisifoɔ, monnue! Moma mo nnɔbaeɛ so ntotosoɔ du du, nanso mototo adeteneneeyɛ ne ɔdɔ a mode dɔ Onyankopɔn no ase. Sɛ mokɔ hyiadan mu a, mpanin tenaberɛ na mopɛ. Saa ara nso na sɛ mokɔ badwa mu a, mopɛ sɛ nnipa hu mo kyea mo.
“Mo Farisifoɔ, monnue! Sɛ mokɔ hyiadan mu a, mpanin tenaberɛ na mopɛ. Monnue! Ɛfiri sɛ, mote sɛ adamena a ɛso asram na nnipa nante so a wɔnnim sɛ wɔnam adamena so.”
Mmaranimfoɔ no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, sɛ woka saa a na woakasa atia yɛn nso.”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Mo mmaranimfoɔ nso, monnue! Mohyɛ nnipa ma wɔdi mmara so pɛpɛɛpɛ, nanso mo deɛ, monni so sɛ sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ. Monnue! Ɛfiri sɛ, moatoto adiyifoɔ a mo ankasa anaa mo agyanom kum wɔn no ada so. Mo nneyɛɔe yi di adanseɛ sɛ mopene deɛ mo agyanom yɔeɛ no so. Nʼasekyerɛ ne sɛ, mo agyanom kunkum adiyifoɔ no na mo nso mototoo wɔn ada so maa wɔn. Yei ne deɛ Onyankopɔn aka afa mo ho: ‘Mɛsoma adiyifoɔ ne asomafoɔ aba mo nkyɛn na mobɛkunkum bi na moataa wɔn a aka no.’
“Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, adiyifoɔ no mogya a wɔka gu firi wiase mfitiaseɛ no, ɛfiri Habel kum so kɔsi Sakaria a, wɔkum no wɔ afɔremuka ne kronkronbea ntam hɔ no so, wɔbɛbisa ɛho asɛm afiri mo nkyɛn.
“Mo, mmaranimfoɔ, monnue! Mode nokorɛ hunta mo nkurɔfoɔ. Mo ankasa monni so, na mommma wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔdi so no kwan mma wɔnni so.”
Ɔfiri Farisini no fie hɔ a ɔrekɔ no, mmaranimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no dii nʼakyi de nsɛmmisa dwanee ne ho, pɛɛ sɛ ɔka biribi a wɔbɛgyina so anya no akye no.
Luka 12Nyaatwomyɛ Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
1Nnipa mpempem kyeree so a wɔnnya baabi ntu wɔn nan nsi mpo no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no kane sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yie wɔ Farisifoɔ nyaatwom a ɛte sɛ mmɔka no ho. 2Biribiara a wɔyɛ no kɔkoam no bɛda adi na deɛ ahunta no nso bɛpue. 3Enti, deɛ moaka wɔ sum mu no, wɔbɛte wɔ hann mu. Na deɛ moaka no asomsɛm wɔ adan mu no, wɔbɛbɔ no dawuro.
Onipa A Monsuro No
4“Me nnamfonom, mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, monnsuro wɔn a wɔkum nipadua na ɛno akyi wɔntumi nyɛ hwee bio no. 5Na mɛkyerɛ mo deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ mosuro no. Monsuro deɛ wakum onipadua no awie no, ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔto twene amanehunu kurom. Mereti mu akyerɛ mo sɛ, oyi na monsuro no.
6“Wɔntɔn mmuruburo num nnye sidi mmienu? Nanso, Onyankopɔn werɛ remfi wɔn mu baako po da. 7Mo tirinwi mpo, wɔakan ne nyinaa. Enti, monnsuro, ɛfiri sɛ, mosom bo sene mmuruburo dodo biara.
Kristo Ne Honhom Kronkron
8“Na mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, obiara a ɔbɛbɔ me din wɔ nnipa anim no, Kristo no nso bɛbɔ ne din wɔ Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim. 9Na deɛ ɔbɛpa me nnipa anim no, me nso mɛpa no, Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim. 10Obiara a ɔbɛkasa atia Kristo no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no. Nanso deɛ ɔbɛkasa atia Honhom Kronkron no deɛ, wɔremfa nkyɛ no da.
11“Sɛ wɔde mo ba mpanin anim wɔ hyia adan mu a, monnnwennwene nsɛm a mobɛka anaasɛ deɛ mode bɛyi mo ho ano no ho, 12Ɛfiri sɛ, saa berɛ no ara mu Honhom Kronkrom no bɛkyerɛ mo deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ moka.”
Adifudepɛ Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
13Obi firi nnipa no mu ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ka kyerɛ me nua na ɔne me nkyɛ agyapadeɛ a yɛn papa de agya yɛn no mu.”
14Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Damfo, hwan na ɔyɛɛ me ɔtɛmmufoɔ ne mo adekyɛfoɔ sɛ memmɛkyɛ mo agyapadeɛ mu mma mo.” 15Ɔtoaa so sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho yie wɔ adifudepɛ ho, ɛfiri sɛ, onipa nkwa nnyina nʼahonya dodoɔ a ɔwɔ so.”
16Afei, ɔbuu wɔn bɛ yi sɛ, “Ɔdefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ asase pa a ɛmaa no nnɔbaeɛ pii. 17Ɛsiane sɛ na ne nnɔbaeɛ no nkɔ pata a wabɔ no so nti, ɛyɛɛ no dadwene maa ɔbisaa ne ho sɛ, ‘Mennya baabi a mede me nnɔbaeɛ bebrebe yi bɛgu yi, menyɛ no dɛn?’ 18Afei, ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Monim deɛ mɛyɔ. Mɛbubu mʼapata yi nyinaa na mabɔ no akɛse de deɛ mewɔ nyinaa asie hɔ. 19Na maka akyerɛ me kra sɛ, “Ɔkra, ma wʼani nnye na didi, na nom ɛfiri sɛ, wowɔ nnoɔma pa pii a ɛbɛso wo mfeɛ bebree!” ’
20“Nanso, Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Ɔkwasea! Anadwo yi, wɔbegye wo kra afiri wo nsam, na hwan na nnoɔma bebree a woapɛ agu hɔ yi, wode begya no?’
21“Ɛno nti, saa ara na obiara a ɔbɛboaboa agyapadeɛ ano de ne ho ato so no nyɛ ɔdefoɔ Onyankopɔn anim ne no.”
Fa Wo Ho To Onyankopɔn So
22Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Monnnwennwene mo kra ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛdi anaa mo nipadua ho sɛ deɛn na mobɛfira. 23Ɔkra som bo sene aduane na onipadua nso som bo sene ntoma. 24Monhwɛ kwaakwaadabi, wɔnnua aba ɛnna wɔntwa. Saa ara nso na wɔnni pata a wɔde wɔn nnɔbaeɛ sie so, nanso Onyankopɔn ma wɔn aduane di. Monsom bo nsene wɔn anaa?
25“Monnnwennwene mo nkwa ho. Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛtumi de da koro ato ne nna so? 26Na sɛ montumi nyɛ ade ketewaa a ɛte seyie mpo a, adɛn na modwennwene nnoɔma akɛseɛ ho?
27“Monhwɛ sɛdeɛ sukooko nyini. Wɔnyɔ adwuma, ɛnna wɔnnwene ntoma mfira. Nanso, Salomo ahonya nyinaa mu, na ɔnni ntoma a ɛyɛ fɛ sɛ saa nhwiren no mu baako mpo. 28Mo a mo gyidie hinhim, sɛ Onyankopɔn siesie wiram nhwiren a ɛfifiri nnɛ na ɔkyena awu no ho ma ɛyɛ fɛ a, adɛn nti na ɔrensiesie mo nso mo ho mma ɛnyɛ fɛ. 29Saa ara nso na monnnwennwene deɛ mobɛdi anaa deɛ mobɛnom ho. 30Saa nnoɔma yi na wiase amanaman pere hwehwɛ, nanso mo deɛ, mo agya nim sɛ yeinom nyinaa ho hia mo. 31Enti, monhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie kane na ɔde yeinom nyinaa bɛma mo.
32“Ekuo ketewa, monnsuro, ɛfiri sɛ, ɛyɛ mo agya no pɛ sɛ ɔde ahennie no bɛma mo. 33Montontɔn mo ahodeɛ na monkyɛ ahiafoɔ adeɛ. Yei bɛma mo agyapadeɛ a ɛwɔ soro no ayɛ pii. Monhyehyɛ mo agyapadeɛ wɔ soro, deɛ owifoɔ ntumi nkɔwia na mfɔteɛ ntumi nkɔwe 34Na deɛ wʼagyapadeɛ wɔ no, ɛhɔ na wʼakoma nso wɔ.”
Monwɛn
35“Monnyina pintinn na momma mo akanea nhyerɛn, 36na monyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔretwɛn wɔn wura a ɔkɔ ayeforɔhyia ase a, sɛ ɔba na ɔbɔ pono mu pɛ a, wɔbɛbue no ntɛm no. 37Wɔn a wɔn wura no ba a ɔbɛba abɛto wɔn sɛ wɔretwɛn no no ani bɛgye. Ɔbɛto wɔn pono na ɔno ankasa asom wɔn. 38Sɛ ɔba dasum anaa ahemadakye mpo a, asomfoɔ a ɔbɛba abɛto wɔn sɛ wɔrewɛn no no, ani bɛgye.
39“Ɛsɛ sɛ mohunu sɛ, sɛ efiewura nim berɛ a owifoɔ bɛba a, anka ɔbɛwɛn na owifoɔ no annya ne ho kwan ammɛbɔ no korɔno. 40Enti, monsiesie mo ho ntwɛn Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛba no, ɛfiri sɛ, monnim berɛ ko a ɔbɛba.”
41Petro bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, worebu bɛ yi akyerɛ yɛn nko ara anaasɛ obiara?” 42Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Merekasa akyerɛ ɔsomfoɔ nokwafoɔ nyansafoɔ biara a ne wura de ne fie sohwɛ bɛhyɛ ne nsa na wahwɛ ama obiara aduane wɔ ne berɛ mu. 43Nhyira ne ɔsomfoɔ a ne wura no bɛba abɛto no sɛ wayɔ nʼadwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ. 44Nokorɛm, ɔde nʼagyapadeɛ nyinaa bɛhyɛ ne nsa.
45“Na sɛ ɛba sɛ saa ɔsomfoɔ yi nso ka sɛ, ‘Me wura nnya mmaeɛ’ na ɛno nti, ɔhwe asomfoɔ a aka no, na ɔdidi, nom nsa bo a, 46ne wura no bɛba da a nʼani nna so sɛ ɔbɛba. Na sɛ ne wura no ba a, ɔbɛtwe nʼaso denden na wabu no sɛ obi a ɔnnye Onyankopɔn nni. 47Ɔsomfoɔ a ɔnim deɛ ne wura pɛ, na wanyɛ ne wura no apɛdeɛ no wɔbɛbɔ no mmaa pii.
48“Na ɔsomfoɔ a ɔnnim deɛ ne wura pɛ na enti ɔyɛɛ deɛ ne wura mpɛ no, wɔbɛbɔ no mmaa kakraa bi. Na obiara a wɔama no pii no, wɔbɛbisa pii afiri ne nkyɛn; na deɛ wɔde bebree ahyɛ ne nsa no, ɔbɛbu bebree ho nkonta.”
Mpaapaemu
49“Maba sɛ merebɛsɔ egya wɔ asase so na sɛ asɔ dada a, na deɛ merehwehwɛ ara ne no. 50Asubɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔde bɛbɔ me a, ɛde me bɛkɔ amanehunu mu, na merennya ahotɔ gye sɛ wɔabɔ me saa asu no ansa.
51“Mosusu sɛ mebaeɛ sɛ mede asomdwoeɛ reba asase yi so? Dabi! Ɛnyɛ asomdwoeɛ na mede baeɛ na mmom mpaapaemu. 52Ɛfiri nnɛ, mpaapaemu bɛba afie mu, baasa bɛba mʼafa na baanu atia me anaasɛ baanu bɛba mʼafa na baasa atia me. 53Agya ne ne babarima renyɛ adwene, ɛna ne ne babaaa renyɛ adwene, ase ne ase adwene renhyia.”
54Na ɔka kyerɛɛ nnipakuo no nso sɛ, “Sɛ mohunu sɛ osuo amuna wɔ atɔeɛ a, ntɛm ara, moka sɛ, ‘Osuo bɛtɔ’! Na osuo tɔ ampa.
55“Saa ara nso na sɛ mohunu sɛ mframa bɔ firi anafo reba a, moka sɛ, ‘Ahuhuro bɛba!’ Na ɛba mu ampa. 56Mo nyaatwomfoɔ! Motumi kyerɛ wiem nsakraeɛ ase, nanso nnoɔma a ɛnnɛ yi atwa mo ho ahyia, ne deɛ ɛbɔ mo kɔkɔ no deɛ, monhu. 57Adɛn nti na monim deɛ ɛyɛ na monyɛ?
58“Sɛ wode obi ka a, bɔ mmɔden kɔhu no na wone no nka ho asɛm na wamfa wo ankɔ asɛnniiiɛ amma ɔtɛmmufoɔ amfa wo anto afiase. 59Sɛ woanyɛ no saa a, ɔbɛma woatua ka a wode no no nyinaa ansa na wagyaa wo.”Nyaatwomyɛ Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
Nnipa mpempem kyeree so a wɔnnya baabi ntu wɔn nan nsi mpo no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no kane sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yie wɔ Farisifoɔ nyaatwom a ɛte sɛ mmɔka no ho. Biribiara a wɔyɛ no kɔkoam no bɛda adi na deɛ ahunta no nso bɛpue. Enti, deɛ moaka wɔ sum mu no, wɔbɛte wɔ hann mu. Na deɛ moaka no asomsɛm wɔ adan mu no, wɔbɛbɔ no dawuro.
Onipa A Monsuro No
“Me nnamfonom, mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, monnsuro wɔn a wɔkum nipadua na ɛno akyi wɔntumi nyɛ hwee bio no. Na mɛkyerɛ mo deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ mosuro no. Monsuro deɛ wakum onipadua no awie no, ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔto twene amanehunu kurom. Mereti mu akyerɛ mo sɛ, oyi na monsuro no.
“Wɔntɔn mmuruburo num nnye sidi mmienu? Nanso, Onyankopɔn werɛ remfi wɔn mu baako po da. Mo tirinwi mpo, wɔakan ne nyinaa. Enti, monnsuro, ɛfiri sɛ, mosom bo sene mmuruburo dodo biara.
Kristo Ne Honhom Kronkron
“Na mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, obiara a ɔbɛbɔ me din wɔ nnipa anim no, Kristo no nso bɛbɔ ne din wɔ Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim. Na deɛ ɔbɛpa me nnipa anim no, me nso mɛpa no, Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ anim. Obiara a ɔbɛkasa atia Kristo no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no. Nanso deɛ ɔbɛkasa atia Honhom Kronkron no deɛ, wɔremfa nkyɛ no da.
“Sɛ wɔde mo ba mpanin anim wɔ hyia adan mu a, monnnwennwene nsɛm a mobɛka anaasɛ deɛ mode bɛyi mo ho ano no ho, Ɛfiri sɛ, saa berɛ no ara mu Honhom Kronkrom no bɛkyerɛ mo deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ moka.”
Adifudepɛ Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
Obi firi nnipa no mu ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ka kyerɛ me nua na ɔne me nkyɛ agyapadeɛ a yɛn papa de agya yɛn no mu.”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Damfo, hwan na ɔyɛɛ me ɔtɛmmufoɔ ne mo adekyɛfoɔ sɛ memmɛkyɛ mo agyapadeɛ mu mma mo.” Ɔtoaa so sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho yie wɔ adifudepɛ ho, ɛfiri sɛ, onipa nkwa nnyina nʼahonya dodoɔ a ɔwɔ so.”
Afei, ɔbuu wɔn bɛ yi sɛ, “Ɔdefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ asase pa a ɛmaa no nnɔbaeɛ pii. Ɛsiane sɛ na ne nnɔbaeɛ no nkɔ pata a wabɔ no so nti, ɛyɛɛ no dadwene maa ɔbisaa ne ho sɛ, ‘Mennya baabi a mede me nnɔbaeɛ bebrebe yi bɛgu yi, menyɛ no dɛn?’ Afei, ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Monim deɛ mɛyɔ. Mɛbubu mʼapata yi nyinaa na mabɔ no akɛse de deɛ mewɔ nyinaa asie hɔ. Na maka akyerɛ me kra sɛ, “Ɔkra, ma wʼani nnye na didi, na nom ɛfiri sɛ, wowɔ nnoɔma pa pii a ɛbɛso wo mfeɛ bebree!” ’
“Nanso, Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Ɔkwasea! Anadwo yi, wɔbegye wo kra afiri wo nsam, na hwan na nnoɔma bebree a woapɛ agu hɔ yi, wode begya no?’
“Ɛno nti, saa ara na obiara a ɔbɛboaboa agyapadeɛ ano de ne ho ato so no nyɛ ɔdefoɔ Onyankopɔn anim ne no.”
Fa Wo Ho To Onyankopɔn So
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Monnnwennwene mo kra ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛdi anaa mo nipadua ho sɛ deɛn na mobɛfira. Ɔkra som bo sene aduane na onipadua nso som bo sene ntoma. Monhwɛ kwaakwaadabi, wɔnnua aba ɛnna wɔntwa. Saa ara nso na wɔnni pata a wɔde wɔn nnɔbaeɛ sie so, nanso Onyankopɔn ma wɔn aduane di. Monsom bo nsene wɔn anaa?
“Monnnwennwene mo nkwa ho. Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛtumi de da koro ato ne nna so? Na sɛ montumi nyɛ ade ketewaa a ɛte seyie mpo a, adɛn na modwennwene nnoɔma akɛseɛ ho?
“Monhwɛ sɛdeɛ sukooko nyini. Wɔnyɔ adwuma, ɛnna wɔnnwene ntoma mfira. Nanso, Salomo ahonya nyinaa mu, na ɔnni ntoma a ɛyɛ fɛ sɛ saa nhwiren no mu baako mpo. Mo a mo gyidie hinhim, sɛ Onyankopɔn siesie wiram nhwiren a ɛfifiri nnɛ na ɔkyena awu no ho ma ɛyɛ fɛ a, adɛn nti na ɔrensiesie mo nso mo ho mma ɛnyɛ fɛ. Saa ara nso na monnnwennwene deɛ mobɛdi anaa deɛ mobɛnom ho. Saa nnoɔma yi na wiase amanaman pere hwehwɛ, nanso mo deɛ, mo agya nim sɛ yeinom nyinaa ho hia mo. Enti, monhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie kane na ɔde yeinom nyinaa bɛma mo.
“Ekuo ketewa, monnsuro, ɛfiri sɛ, ɛyɛ mo agya no pɛ sɛ ɔde ahennie no bɛma mo. Montontɔn mo ahodeɛ na monkyɛ ahiafoɔ adeɛ. Yei bɛma mo agyapadeɛ a ɛwɔ soro no ayɛ pii. Monhyehyɛ mo agyapadeɛ wɔ soro, deɛ owifoɔ ntumi nkɔwia na mfɔteɛ ntumi nkɔwe Na deɛ wʼagyapadeɛ wɔ no, ɛhɔ na wʼakoma nso wɔ.”
Monwɛn
“Monnyina pintinn na momma mo akanea nhyerɛn, na monyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔretwɛn wɔn wura a ɔkɔ ayeforɔhyia ase a, sɛ ɔba na ɔbɔ pono mu pɛ a, wɔbɛbue no ntɛm no. Wɔn a wɔn wura no ba a ɔbɛba abɛto wɔn sɛ wɔretwɛn no no ani bɛgye. Ɔbɛto wɔn pono na ɔno ankasa asom wɔn. Sɛ ɔba dasum anaa ahemadakye mpo a, asomfoɔ a ɔbɛba abɛto wɔn sɛ wɔrewɛn no no, ani bɛgye.
“Ɛsɛ sɛ mohunu sɛ, sɛ efiewura nim berɛ a owifoɔ bɛba a, anka ɔbɛwɛn na owifoɔ no annya ne ho kwan ammɛbɔ no korɔno. Enti, monsiesie mo ho ntwɛn Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛba no, ɛfiri sɛ, monnim berɛ ko a ɔbɛba.”
Petro bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, worebu bɛ yi akyerɛ yɛn nko ara anaasɛ obiara?” Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Merekasa akyerɛ ɔsomfoɔ nokwafoɔ nyansafoɔ biara a ne wura de ne fie sohwɛ bɛhyɛ ne nsa na wahwɛ ama obiara aduane wɔ ne berɛ mu. Nhyira ne ɔsomfoɔ a ne wura no bɛba abɛto no sɛ wayɔ nʼadwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ. Nokorɛm, ɔde nʼagyapadeɛ nyinaa bɛhyɛ ne nsa.
“Na sɛ ɛba sɛ saa ɔsomfoɔ yi nso ka sɛ, ‘Me wura nnya mmaeɛ’ na ɛno nti, ɔhwe asomfoɔ a aka no, na ɔdidi, nom nsa bo a, ne wura no bɛba da a nʼani nna so sɛ ɔbɛba. Na sɛ ne wura no ba a, ɔbɛtwe nʼaso denden na wabu no sɛ obi a ɔnnye Onyankopɔn nni. Ɔsomfoɔ a ɔnim deɛ ne wura pɛ, na wanyɛ ne wura no apɛdeɛ no wɔbɛbɔ no mmaa pii.
“Na ɔsomfoɔ a ɔnnim deɛ ne wura pɛ na enti ɔyɛɛ deɛ ne wura mpɛ no, wɔbɛbɔ no mmaa kakraa bi. Na obiara a wɔama no pii no, wɔbɛbisa pii afiri ne nkyɛn; na deɛ wɔde bebree ahyɛ ne nsa no, ɔbɛbu bebree ho nkonta.”
Mpaapaemu
“Maba sɛ merebɛsɔ egya wɔ asase so na sɛ asɔ dada a, na deɛ merehwehwɛ ara ne no. Asubɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔde bɛbɔ me a, ɛde me bɛkɔ amanehunu mu, na merennya ahotɔ gye sɛ wɔabɔ me saa asu no ansa.
“Mosusu sɛ mebaeɛ sɛ mede asomdwoeɛ reba asase yi so? Dabi! Ɛnyɛ asomdwoeɛ na mede baeɛ na mmom mpaapaemu. Ɛfiri nnɛ, mpaapaemu bɛba afie mu, baasa bɛba mʼafa na baanu atia me anaasɛ baanu bɛba mʼafa na baasa atia me. Agya ne ne babarima renyɛ adwene, ɛna ne ne babaaa renyɛ adwene, ase ne ase adwene renhyia.”
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ nnipakuo no nso sɛ, “Sɛ mohunu sɛ osuo amuna wɔ atɔeɛ a, ntɛm ara, moka sɛ, ‘Osuo bɛtɔ’! Na osuo tɔ ampa.
“Saa ara nso na sɛ mohunu sɛ mframa bɔ firi anafo reba a, moka sɛ, ‘Ahuhuro bɛba!’ Na ɛba mu ampa. Mo nyaatwomfoɔ! Motumi kyerɛ wiem nsakraeɛ ase, nanso nnoɔma a ɛnnɛ yi atwa mo ho ahyia, ne deɛ ɛbɔ mo kɔkɔ no deɛ, monhu. Adɛn nti na monim deɛ ɛyɛ na monyɛ?
“Sɛ wode obi ka a, bɔ mmɔden kɔhu no na wone no nka ho asɛm na wamfa wo ankɔ asɛnniiiɛ amma ɔtɛmmufoɔ amfa wo anto afiase. Sɛ woanyɛ no saa a, ɔbɛma woatua ka a wode no no nyinaa ansa na wagyaa wo.”
Luka 13Ɔsoro Kwan No Yɛ Hihiaa
1Saa berɛ no ara mu, nnipa bi bɛka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, Pilato akum Galileafoɔ bi a wɔrebɔ afɔdeɛ ama Onyankopɔn maa wɔn mogya fraa afɔrebɔ no.
2Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Mogye di sɛ saa Galileafoɔ no yɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sene wɔn a aka no nyinaa nti na wɔkum wɔn no? 3Dabida, sɛ mo nso moansakra mo adwene a, wɔbɛkunkum mo saa ara.
4“Anaasɛ mosusu sɛ nnipa dunwɔtwe a Siloa abantenten no bu guu wɔn so, kum wɔn no yɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sene nnipa a na wɔte Yerusalem no? 5Dabida, mo nso moansakra a, mobɛwuwu saa ara.”
6Afei, Yesu buu wɔn bɛ yi sɛ, “Ɔbarima bi duaa akutuo wɔ ne turo mu. Da bi ɔkɔɔ turo no mu hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔte ɛso aba no bi nanso wannya bi. 7Ɛno akyi, ɔfrɛɛ turo no sohwɛfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mfe mmiɛnsa ni, berɛ biara a mɛba sɛ merebɛte akutuo no bi no, mennya bi. Adɛn nti na ɛresɛe kwa yi? Twa twene.’
8“Turo no sohwɛfoɔ no srɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, ma ɛnsi hɔ afeɛ yi nso na mengugu aseɛ sumina nhwɛ 9sɛ ebia, ɛbɛso aba bi anaa, na sɛ antumi anso a, ɛnneɛ mɛtwa atwene.’ ”
Yesu Sa Yadeɛ Homeda
10Homeda bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ hyiadan mu no, 11na ɔbaa bi wɔ hɔ a hohommɔne mu yadeɛ bi akye no mfeɛ dunwɔtwe ama ne mu akoa a ɔntumi ntene ne mu koraa.
12Yesu hunuu no no, ɔfrɛɛ no firii nnipa no mu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɔbaa, wo ho nyɛ wo den.” 13Ɔde ne nsa guu ne so, na amonom hɔ ara ɔtumi tenee ne mu. Na ɔbaa no yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
14Hyiadan no so panin a ɔhunuu ɔbaa no ayaresa no de abufuo kaa sɛ, “Nnansia na ɛsɛ sɛ mode yɔ adwuma a saa nna no mu na ɛsɛ sɛ moba ma wɔsa mo yadeɛ na ɛnyɛ homeda.”
15Na Awurade buaa no sɛ, “Nyaatwomfoɔ! Mo mu hwan na ɔnsane ne nantwie anaa nʼafunumu na ɔnka no nkɔnom nsuo homeda? 16Adɛn nti na Abraham aseni yi a ɔbonsam afa no dommum mfeɛ dunwɔtwe ni no ɛnsɛ sɛ mesa no yadeɛ homeda?”
17Ɔkaa saa no, wɔn a na wɔne nʼadwene nhyia no nyinaa ani wuiɛ. Nnipa no nso a na wɔwɔ hyiadan no mu nyinaa ani gyee nʼanwanwadeɛ ahodoɔ a ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa ho.
Onyina Aba Ne Mmɔka Ho Bɛ
18Afei, Yesu fitii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn Onyankopɔn Ahennie no ho asɛm, na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Onyankopɔn Ahennie no te sɛn? Na ɛdeɛn na memfa nto ho nkyerɛkyerɛ aseɛ? 19Onyankopɔn Ahennie no te sɛ onyina aba ketewa bi a obi dua wɔ nʼafuo mu na ɛnyini yɛɛ dutan kɛseɛ ma nnomaa kɔnwono wɔn mpirebuo wɔ so.”
20Ɔbisaa bio sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn bio na memfa ntoto ho nkyerɛ aseɛ? 21Ɛte sɛ mmɔka bi a brodotofoɔ de fotɔ mmɔre ma ɛtu.”
Ɔpono Teateawa No
22Berɛ a Yesu rekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ nkuro so ne nkuraa ase ansa na ɔreduru hɔ.
23Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu no obi bisaa no sɛ, “Awurade, nnipa kakraa bi na wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa anaa?” 24Ɔbuaa no sɛ, “Mompere nhyɛn ɔpono teateawa no mu, ɛfiri sɛ, nnipa pii bɛpere sɛ wɔbɛwura mu, nanso wɔrentumi. 25Sɛ ɛba sɛ efiewura no ato ɛpono no mu a, mobɛba abɛgyina akyire abɔ mu, aka sɛ, ‘Owura, yɛsrɛ wo, bue yɛn.’ Na ɔno nso abisa mo sɛ, ‘Mofiri he? Mennim mo?’
26“Na mo nso moaka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Yɛne wo too nsa didii na wokyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ yɛn mmorɔno so.’
27“Na efiewura no nso bɛbisa mo bio sɛ, ‘Mofiri he? Mennim mo. Momfiri mʼani so nkɔ, mo nnebɔneyɛfoɔ!’
28“Na sɛ mohunu Abraham, Isak, Yakob ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nyinaa sɛ wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu na montumi nkɔ hɔ bi a, mode mo nsa bɛgu mo ti atwa agyaadwoɔ. 29Nnipa firi wiase afanan nyinaa bɛhyia wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu hɔ ato nsa adidi. 30Na monkae sɛ akyikafoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛdi kan, na adikanfoɔ bi nso wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛka akyi.”
Yesu Twa Yerusalem Ho Agyaadwoɔ
31Saa berɛ no ara mu Farisifoɔ bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Firi ha kɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, Herode rehwehwɛ wo aku wo.” 32Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monkɔka nkyerɛ sakraman no sɛ, metu ahohommɔne, na masa nyarewa ɛnnɛ ne ɔkyena na ne nnansa so no, mɛdu Yerusalem. 33Nanso, ɛsɛ sɛ menantew ɛnnɛ ne ɔkyena ne nʼadekyeeɛ na ɛtwa ara na ɛtwa sɛ odiyifoɔ bɛwu wɔ Yerusalem!
34“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wo a wokum adiyifoɔ na wosi wɔn a wɔsoma wɔn wo nkyɛn no aboɔ! Mprɛ ahe ni a mepɛɛ sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano sɛ akokɔbaatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban ase, nanso moampene so. 35Na mo afie bɛdane afituo na morenhu me kɔsi sɛ mobɛka sɛ, ‘Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no!’ ”Ɔsoro Kwan No Yɛ Hihiaa
Saa berɛ no ara mu, nnipa bi bɛka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, Pilato akum Galileafoɔ bi a wɔrebɔ afɔdeɛ ama Onyankopɔn maa wɔn mogya fraa afɔrebɔ no.
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Mogye di sɛ saa Galileafoɔ no yɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sene wɔn a aka no nyinaa nti na wɔkum wɔn no? Dabida, sɛ mo nso moansakra mo adwene a, wɔbɛkunkum mo saa ara.
“Anaasɛ mosusu sɛ nnipa dunwɔtwe a Siloa abantenten no bu guu wɔn so, kum wɔn no yɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sene nnipa a na wɔte Yerusalem no? Dabida, mo nso moansakra a, mobɛwuwu saa ara.”
Afei, Yesu buu wɔn bɛ yi sɛ, “Ɔbarima bi duaa akutuo wɔ ne turo mu. Da bi ɔkɔɔ turo no mu hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔte ɛso aba no bi nanso wannya bi. Ɛno akyi, ɔfrɛɛ turo no sohwɛfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mfe mmiɛnsa ni, berɛ biara a mɛba sɛ merebɛte akutuo no bi no, mennya bi. Adɛn nti na ɛresɛe kwa yi? Twa twene.’
“Turo no sohwɛfoɔ no srɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, ma ɛnsi hɔ afeɛ yi nso na mengugu aseɛ sumina nhwɛ sɛ ebia, ɛbɛso aba bi anaa, na sɛ antumi anso a, ɛnneɛ mɛtwa atwene.’ ”
Yesu Sa Yadeɛ Homeda
Homeda bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ hyiadan mu no, na ɔbaa bi wɔ hɔ a hohommɔne mu yadeɛ bi akye no mfeɛ dunwɔtwe ama ne mu akoa a ɔntumi ntene ne mu koraa.
Yesu hunuu no no, ɔfrɛɛ no firii nnipa no mu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɔbaa, wo ho nyɛ wo den.” Ɔde ne nsa guu ne so, na amonom hɔ ara ɔtumi tenee ne mu. Na ɔbaa no yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
Hyiadan no so panin a ɔhunuu ɔbaa no ayaresa no de abufuo kaa sɛ, “Nnansia na ɛsɛ sɛ mode yɔ adwuma a saa nna no mu na ɛsɛ sɛ moba ma wɔsa mo yadeɛ na ɛnyɛ homeda.”
Na Awurade buaa no sɛ, “Nyaatwomfoɔ! Mo mu hwan na ɔnsane ne nantwie anaa nʼafunumu na ɔnka no nkɔnom nsuo homeda? Adɛn nti na Abraham aseni yi a ɔbonsam afa no dommum mfeɛ dunwɔtwe ni no ɛnsɛ sɛ mesa no yadeɛ homeda?”
Ɔkaa saa no, wɔn a na wɔne nʼadwene nhyia no nyinaa ani wuiɛ. Nnipa no nso a na wɔwɔ hyiadan no mu nyinaa ani gyee nʼanwanwadeɛ ahodoɔ a ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa ho.
Onyina Aba Ne Mmɔka Ho Bɛ
Afei, Yesu fitii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn Onyankopɔn Ahennie no ho asɛm, na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Onyankopɔn Ahennie no te sɛn? Na ɛdeɛn na memfa nto ho nkyerɛkyerɛ aseɛ? Onyankopɔn Ahennie no te sɛ onyina aba ketewa bi a obi dua wɔ nʼafuo mu na ɛnyini yɛɛ dutan kɛseɛ ma nnomaa kɔnwono wɔn mpirebuo wɔ so.”
Ɔbisaa bio sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn bio na memfa ntoto ho nkyerɛ aseɛ? Ɛte sɛ mmɔka bi a brodotofoɔ de fotɔ mmɔre ma ɛtu.”
Ɔpono Teateawa No
Berɛ a Yesu rekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ nkuro so ne nkuraa ase ansa na ɔreduru hɔ.
Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu no obi bisaa no sɛ, “Awurade, nnipa kakraa bi na wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa anaa?” Ɔbuaa no sɛ, “Mompere nhyɛn ɔpono teateawa no mu, ɛfiri sɛ, nnipa pii bɛpere sɛ wɔbɛwura mu, nanso wɔrentumi. Sɛ ɛba sɛ efiewura no ato ɛpono no mu a, mobɛba abɛgyina akyire abɔ mu, aka sɛ, ‘Owura, yɛsrɛ wo, bue yɛn.’ Na ɔno nso abisa mo sɛ, ‘Mofiri he? Mennim mo?’
“Na mo nso moaka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Yɛne wo too nsa didii na wokyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ yɛn mmorɔno so.’
“Na efiewura no nso bɛbisa mo bio sɛ, ‘Mofiri he? Mennim mo. Momfiri mʼani so nkɔ, mo nnebɔneyɛfoɔ!’
“Na sɛ mohunu Abraham, Isak, Yakob ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nyinaa sɛ wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu na montumi nkɔ hɔ bi a, mode mo nsa bɛgu mo ti atwa agyaadwoɔ. Nnipa firi wiase afanan nyinaa bɛhyia wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu hɔ ato nsa adidi. Na monkae sɛ akyikafoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛdi kan, na adikanfoɔ bi nso wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛka akyi.”
Yesu Twa Yerusalem Ho Agyaadwoɔ
Saa berɛ no ara mu Farisifoɔ bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Firi ha kɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, Herode rehwehwɛ wo aku wo.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monkɔka nkyerɛ sakraman no sɛ, metu ahohommɔne, na masa nyarewa ɛnnɛ ne ɔkyena na ne nnansa so no, mɛdu Yerusalem. Nanso, ɛsɛ sɛ menantew ɛnnɛ ne ɔkyena ne nʼadekyeeɛ na ɛtwa ara na ɛtwa sɛ odiyifoɔ bɛwu wɔ Yerusalem!
“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wo a wokum adiyifoɔ na wosi wɔn a wɔsoma wɔn wo nkyɛn no aboɔ! Mprɛ ahe ni a mepɛɛ sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano sɛ akokɔbaatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban ase, nanso moampene so. Na mo afie bɛdane afituo na morenhu me kɔsi sɛ mobɛka sɛ, ‘Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no!’ ”
Luka 14Yesu Sa Yadeɛ Homeda
1Homeda bi, Farisini panin bi too nsa frɛɛ Yesu adidi. Adidie no ase hɔ no, na wɔn a wɔahyia no nyinaa rehwɛ deɛ Yesu bɛyɛ. 2Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyare ahonhono.
3Yesu bisaa Farisifoɔ no ne mmaranimfoɔ a na wɔwɔ hɔ no sɛ, “Mmara ma ho kwan sɛ wɔsa yadeɛ homeda anaa?”
4Wɔammua no. Enti, Yesu sɔɔ ɔyarefoɔ no mu saa no yadeɛ, gyaa no kwan.
5Yesu bisaa wɔn a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa sɛ, “Mo mu hwan na sɛ nʼafunumu tɔ abura mu homeda a ɔrennyi no da no ara?” 6Nanso, wɔantumi ammua no.
7Afei, Yesu hunuu sɛ, nnipa a wɔfrɛɛ wɔn adidi no ase no mu biara pɛɛ sɛ ɔtena mpanin tenabea no, ɔbuu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, 8“Sɛ obi to nsa frɛ wo apontoɔ ase a, mpere wo ho nkɔtena mpanin tenabea, ɛfiri sɛ, ebia na wato nsa afrɛ onipa titire bi a ɔsene wo. 9Sɛ ɛba saa a, deɛ ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wo no bɛtu wo afiri akonnwa a wote so no so de ama deɛ ɔsene wo no na wode aniwuo akɔtena akyire baabi.
10“Enti, sɛ obi hyia wo apontoɔ ase a, kɔtena akyire baabi na sɛ deɛ ɔhyiaa wo no bɛhu wo a, waka akyerɛ wo sɛ, ‘Onua, sɔre na kɔtena mpanin tenabea.’ 11Na obiara a ɔma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.”
12Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Farisini a ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ no no sɛ, “Sɛ woto pono a mfrɛ wo nnamfo, wo nuanom, wʼabusuafoɔ ne asikafoɔ a wo ne wɔn bɔ fipam nko ara; sɛ woyɛ saa a, wɔn nso bɛto nsa afrɛ wo bi na ɛba saa a, na wonyɛɛ hwee. 13Na sɛ woto pono a, hyia ahiafoɔ, mmubuafoɔ, mpakye ne anifirafoɔ. 14Ɛsiane sɛ wɔntumi nyɛ saa bi mma wo no nti, ɛda a ateneneefoɔ bɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu no, Onyankopɔn bɛhyira wo.”
Apontoɔ Kɛseɛ Bi Ho Bɛ
15Wɔn a wɔte adidiiɛ no mu baako tee deɛ Yesu kaeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Nhyira nka deɛ ɔbɛdidi wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu.”
16Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Da bi ɔbarima bi too pono kɛseɛ hyiaa nnipa bebree. 17Berɛ soeɛ no, ɔsomaa ne somfoɔ bi sɛ ɔnkɔfrɛ wɔn a wɔahyia wɔn no sɛ wɔmmra. 18Nanso, wɔn nyinaa yiyii wɔn ho wɔn ho ano. Deɛ ɔdi kan no yii ne ho ano sɛ, ‘Matɔ asase a ɛnnɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔhwɛ enti mesrɛ no sɛ merentumi mma.’ 19Na ɔfoforɔ nso yii ne ho ano sɛ, ‘Matɔ anantwie du a mede wɔn bɛyɔ mʼafuo a ɛnnɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ enti mesrɛ no sɛ merentumi mma.’ 20Ɔfoforɔ bi nso yii ne ho ano sɛ, ‘Afei na maware, enti merentumi mma.’
21“Ɔsomfoɔ no sane bɛbɔɔ ne wura no amanneɛ no, ɔde abufuo somaa no bio sɛ, ‘Ka wo ho kɔ mmɔnten so ne mmantam na kɔfrɛfrɛ ahiafoɔ, mmubuafoɔ, anifirafoɔ ne mpakye sɛ wɔmmra.’ 22Ɔsomfoɔ no kɔfrɛfrɛɛ nnipa no baeɛ, nanso na afa da so wɔ hɔ ara.
23“Ɛno nti, owura no sane somaa no sɛ, ‘Kɔ akwan so ne mfikyire na frɛ obiara a wobɛhu no no sɛ, mato pono, enti wɔmmra. 24Na merema woate aseɛ sɛ, nnipa a metoo nsa hyiaa wɔn no mu biara nni hɔ a mʼaduane yi bi bɛka nʼano da biara da.’ ”
Yesu Akyidie
25Da bi a na nkurɔfoɔ akuoakuo bi di Yesu akyi no, ɔdanee ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, 26“Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi mʼakyi a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔdɔ me sene nʼawofoɔ, ne yere, ne mma, ne nuanom ne nʼankasa ho, anyɛ saa a, ɔrentumi nyɛ me suani. 27Obiara a ɔdi mʼakyi na ɔntumi nnyina amanehunu ano no, rentumi nyɛ me suani.
28“Mo mu hwan na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔsi aban a ɔrentena ase nsese nhwɛ sɛ ɔwɔ sika a ɔde bɛwie? 29Anyɛ saa na ɔhyɛ ɛdan no ase na wantumi anwie a, wɔn a wɔhu no nyinaa bɛsere no, 30aka sɛ, ‘Onipa yi fitii aseɛ sɛ ɔresi dan, nanso wantumi anwie’.
31“Anaasɛ ɔhene bɛn na ɔkuta asraafoɔ ɔpedu na ɔrekɔhyia ɔsahene foforɔ a ɔkuta asraafoɔ ɔpeduonu a, ɔrenkari ne ho nhwɛ ansa na wakɔ akono? 32Na sɛ ɔhwɛ na ɔrentumi nso a, ansa koraa na ɔsahene foforɔ no bɛbɛn no no, ɔtu abɔfoɔ kɔhu no sɛ, ɔmma wɔnsiesie wɔn ntam na asomdwoeɛ mmra.
33“Ɛno nti, obiara a wampa ne ho akyi no rentumi nyɛ me suani.
34“Nkyene yɛ dɛ. Na sɛ ɛyera ne dɛ a, ɛkwan bɛn so na wɔbɛfa ama ayɛ dɛ bio? 35Ɛho nni mfasoɔ mma biribiara. Wɔbɛto agu. Deɛ ɔwɔ aso a ɔbetie no, ɔntie.”Yesu Sa Yadeɛ Homeda
Homeda bi, Farisini panin bi too nsa frɛɛ Yesu adidi. Adidie no ase hɔ no, na wɔn a wɔahyia no nyinaa rehwɛ deɛ Yesu bɛyɛ. Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyare ahonhono.
Yesu bisaa Farisifoɔ no ne mmaranimfoɔ a na wɔwɔ hɔ no sɛ, “Mmara ma ho kwan sɛ wɔsa yadeɛ homeda anaa?”
Wɔammua no. Enti, Yesu sɔɔ ɔyarefoɔ no mu saa no yadeɛ, gyaa no kwan.
Yesu bisaa wɔn a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa sɛ, “Mo mu hwan na sɛ nʼafunumu tɔ abura mu homeda a ɔrennyi no da no ara?” Nanso, wɔantumi ammua no.
Afei, Yesu hunuu sɛ, nnipa a wɔfrɛɛ wɔn adidi no ase no mu biara pɛɛ sɛ ɔtena mpanin tenabea no, ɔbuu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, “Sɛ obi to nsa frɛ wo apontoɔ ase a, mpere wo ho nkɔtena mpanin tenabea, ɛfiri sɛ, ebia na wato nsa afrɛ onipa titire bi a ɔsene wo. Sɛ ɛba saa a, deɛ ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wo no bɛtu wo afiri akonnwa a wote so no so de ama deɛ ɔsene wo no na wode aniwuo akɔtena akyire baabi.
“Enti, sɛ obi hyia wo apontoɔ ase a, kɔtena akyire baabi na sɛ deɛ ɔhyiaa wo no bɛhu wo a, waka akyerɛ wo sɛ, ‘Onua, sɔre na kɔtena mpanin tenabea.’ Na obiara a ɔma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.”
Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Farisini a ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ no no sɛ, “Sɛ woto pono a mfrɛ wo nnamfo, wo nuanom, wʼabusuafoɔ ne asikafoɔ a wo ne wɔn bɔ fipam nko ara; sɛ woyɛ saa a, wɔn nso bɛto nsa afrɛ wo bi na ɛba saa a, na wonyɛɛ hwee. Na sɛ woto pono a, hyia ahiafoɔ, mmubuafoɔ, mpakye ne anifirafoɔ. Ɛsiane sɛ wɔntumi nyɛ saa bi mma wo no nti, ɛda a ateneneefoɔ bɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu no, Onyankopɔn bɛhyira wo.”
Apontoɔ Kɛseɛ Bi Ho Bɛ
Wɔn a wɔte adidiiɛ no mu baako tee deɛ Yesu kaeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Nhyira nka deɛ ɔbɛdidi wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu.”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Da bi ɔbarima bi too pono kɛseɛ hyiaa nnipa bebree. Berɛ soeɛ no, ɔsomaa ne somfoɔ bi sɛ ɔnkɔfrɛ wɔn a wɔahyia wɔn no sɛ wɔmmra. Nanso, wɔn nyinaa yiyii wɔn ho wɔn ho ano. Deɛ ɔdi kan no yii ne ho ano sɛ, ‘Matɔ asase a ɛnnɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔhwɛ enti mesrɛ no sɛ merentumi mma.’ Na ɔfoforɔ nso yii ne ho ano sɛ, ‘Matɔ anantwie du a mede wɔn bɛyɔ mʼafuo a ɛnnɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ enti mesrɛ no sɛ merentumi mma.’ Ɔfoforɔ bi nso yii ne ho ano sɛ, ‘Afei na maware, enti merentumi mma.’
“Ɔsomfoɔ no sane bɛbɔɔ ne wura no amanneɛ no, ɔde abufuo somaa no bio sɛ, ‘Ka wo ho kɔ mmɔnten so ne mmantam na kɔfrɛfrɛ ahiafoɔ, mmubuafoɔ, anifirafoɔ ne mpakye sɛ wɔmmra.’ Ɔsomfoɔ no kɔfrɛfrɛɛ nnipa no baeɛ, nanso na afa da so wɔ hɔ ara.
“Ɛno nti, owura no sane somaa no sɛ, ‘Kɔ akwan so ne mfikyire na frɛ obiara a wobɛhu no no sɛ, mato pono, enti wɔmmra. Na merema woate aseɛ sɛ, nnipa a metoo nsa hyiaa wɔn no mu biara nni hɔ a mʼaduane yi bi bɛka nʼano da biara da.’ ”
Yesu Akyidie
Da bi a na nkurɔfoɔ akuoakuo bi di Yesu akyi no, ɔdanee ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi mʼakyi a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔdɔ me sene nʼawofoɔ, ne yere, ne mma, ne nuanom ne nʼankasa ho, anyɛ saa a, ɔrentumi nyɛ me suani. Obiara a ɔdi mʼakyi na ɔntumi nnyina amanehunu ano no, rentumi nyɛ me suani.
“Mo mu hwan na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔsi aban a ɔrentena ase nsese nhwɛ sɛ ɔwɔ sika a ɔde bɛwie? Anyɛ saa na ɔhyɛ ɛdan no ase na wantumi anwie a, wɔn a wɔhu no nyinaa bɛsere no, aka sɛ, ‘Onipa yi fitii aseɛ sɛ ɔresi dan, nanso wantumi anwie’.
“Anaasɛ ɔhene bɛn na ɔkuta asraafoɔ ɔpedu na ɔrekɔhyia ɔsahene foforɔ a ɔkuta asraafoɔ ɔpeduonu a, ɔrenkari ne ho nhwɛ ansa na wakɔ akono? Na sɛ ɔhwɛ na ɔrentumi nso a, ansa koraa na ɔsahene foforɔ no bɛbɛn no no, ɔtu abɔfoɔ kɔhu no sɛ, ɔmma wɔnsiesie wɔn ntam na asomdwoeɛ mmra.
“Ɛno nti, obiara a wampa ne ho akyi no rentumi nyɛ me suani.
“Nkyene yɛ dɛ. Na sɛ ɛyera ne dɛ a, ɛkwan bɛn so na wɔbɛfa ama ayɛ dɛ bio? Ɛho nni mfasoɔ mma biribiara. Wɔbɛto agu. Deɛ ɔwɔ aso a ɔbetie no, ɔntie.”
Luka 15Odwan A Ɔyeraeɛ No
1Da bi togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ pii baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛtiee no, 2Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no hunuu yei no, wɔnwiinwii kaa sɛ, “Saa ɔbarima yi gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sane ne wɔn to nsa didi.” 3Saa asɛm a wɔkaeɛ no maa ɔbuu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, 4“Mo mu hwan na sɛ ɔwɔ nnwan ɔha na wɔn mu baako yera a, ɔrennya aduɔkron nkron no hɔ nkɔkyinkyini serɛ so nhwehwɛ deɛ wayera no kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhu no? 5Na sɛ ɔhu no a, ɔde no abɔ ne kɔn ho, de anigyeɛ de no aba. 6Na sɛ ɔduru fie a, wafrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne nʼafipamfoɔ nyinaa aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, Momma yɛnnye yɛn ani, ɛfiri sɛ, mahu me dwan a ɔyeraeɛ no.
7“Saa ara nso na sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ baako sakra nʼadwene a, ɔsorofoɔ nyinaa ani gye sene sɛ ateneneefoɔ aduɔkron nkron wɔ hɔ a adwensakra ho nhia wɔn no.
8“Anaasɛ ɔbaa bɛn na sɛ ne sika mpɔ du mu baako yera a, ɔrensɔ kanea, mprapra ne dan mu, nhwehwɛ kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhu 9Na sɛ ɔhunu a, ɔremfrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne nʼafipamfoɔ nyinaa nka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momma yɛn ani nnye, ɛfiri sɛ, mahu me sika mpɔ a ɛyeraeɛ no’ 10Saa ara nso na sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ baako sakra nʼadwene a, Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ ani gye ara ne no.”
Ɔyera Ba
11Yesu san buu wɔn ɔyera ho bɛ bi sɛ, “Ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ mmammarima baanu. 12Wɔn mu akumaa no ka kyerɛɛ ne papa no sɛ, ‘Me papa, fa me kyɛfa a mewɔ wɔ wʼagyapadeɛ mu no ma me!’ Ɔbarima no kyɛɛ nʼagyapadeɛ mu de ne ba no kyɛfa maa no.
13“Nna tiawa bi akyi no, ne ba kumaa yi boaboaa nʼahodeɛ nyinaa ano tuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri asase bi so kɔbɔɔ ahohwi bra, hweree nʼahodeɛ nyinaa. 14Ɛno akyi no, ɔkɔm kɛseɛ bi baa asase no so maa ne ho kyeree no. 15Ɛbaa saa no, ɔde ne ho kɔdanee kurommani bi a, ɔma ɔkɔhwɛɛ ne mprako so. 16Ɔwɔ hɔ no, ɔkɔm dee no maa ne kɔn dɔɔ sɛ anka ɔbɛnya aduane a mprako no di no bi mpo adi, nanso, wannya.
17“Nʼani baa ne ho so no, ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Apaafoɔ a wɔwɔ me papa fie didi, mee ma ebi ka ma wɔto gu. Adɛn na mete ha na ɔkɔm reku me yi! 18Mɛsɔre makɔ me papa nkyɛn na maka makyerɛ no sɛ, “Papa, mayɛ ɔsoro ne wo bɔne, 19na memfata sɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio; fa me yɛ wʼapaafoɔ no mu baako.” ’
20“Ɔsiim sɛ ɔresane aba ne papa nkyɛn. Ɔnam kwan so akyirikyiri reba no, ne papa no hunuu no, enti ɔde ayamhyehyeɛ yɛɛ ntɛm kɔhyiaa no, bam no, yɛɛ no atuu.
21“Aberanteɛ yi ka kyerɛɛ ne papa no sɛ, ‘Papa, mayɛ ɔsoro ne wo bɔne, na memfata sɛ wofrɛ me wo ba bio.’
22“Nʼano ansi koraa na ne papa no frɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Monka mo ho nkɔfa ntoma pa mmɛfira no na monhyɛ no pɛtea ne mpaboa a ɛyɛ fɛ. 23Afei, monkɔkum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no mfa nyɛ aduane, na yɛnnidi, nnom, nnye yɛn ani, 24ɛfiri sɛ, na mesusu sɛ meba yi awu, sɛ nso na ɔte ase; ɔyeraeɛ, nanso wasane aba.’ Wɔfitii aseɛ gyee wɔn ani.
25“Ne ba panin a na ɔfiri afuom reba no duruu afikyire no, ɔtee nnwontoɔ ne ahurisidie wɔ fie hɔ. 26Ɛno nti ɔfrɛɛ asomfoɔ no mu baako bisaa no deɛ ɛrekɔ so wɔ fie hɔ. 27Ɔsomfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Wo nua no asane aba a biribiara anyɛ no enti, wo papa akum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no ama no.’
28“Ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, ne bo fuiɛ enti ɔyɛɛ nʼadwene sɛ ɔrenkɔ fie hɔ. Ne papa tee saa asɛm yi no, ɔfirii adi baa ne nkyɛn bɛkorɔkorɔɔ no. 29Ne ba no de awerɛhoɔ buaa no sɛ, ‘Papa, masom wo mfeɛ dodoɔ yi nyinaa a deɛ wobɛka biara metie, nanso wommaa me odwan ba mpo da sɛ menkum na me ne me nnamfonom mfa nnye yɛn ani. 30Nanso, wo ba a ɔkɔbɔɔ ahohwie no baeɛ yi deɛ, woakum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no ama no.’
31“Ne papa buaa no sɛ, ‘Me ba, me ne wo na ɛte ha. Biribiara a mewɔ nso yɛ wo dea. 32Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛgye yɛn ani, ɛfiri sɛ, na mesusu sɛ wo nua yi awu, sɛ nso na ɔte ase; ɔyeraeɛ, nanso wasane aba.’ ”Odwan A Ɔyeraeɛ No
Da bi togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ pii baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛtiee no, Farisifoɔ ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no hunuu yei no, wɔnwiinwii kaa sɛ, “Saa ɔbarima yi gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sane ne wɔn to nsa didi.” Saa asɛm a wɔkaeɛ no maa ɔbuu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, “Mo mu hwan na sɛ ɔwɔ nnwan ɔha na wɔn mu baako yera a, ɔrennya aduɔkron nkron no hɔ nkɔkyinkyini serɛ so nhwehwɛ deɛ wayera no kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhu no? Na sɛ ɔhu no a, ɔde no abɔ ne kɔn ho, de anigyeɛ de no aba. Na sɛ ɔduru fie a, wafrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne nʼafipamfoɔ nyinaa aka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, Momma yɛnnye yɛn ani, ɛfiri sɛ, mahu me dwan a ɔyeraeɛ no.
“Saa ara nso na sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ baako sakra nʼadwene a, ɔsorofoɔ nyinaa ani gye sene sɛ ateneneefoɔ aduɔkron nkron wɔ hɔ a adwensakra ho nhia wɔn no.
“Anaasɛ ɔbaa bɛn na sɛ ne sika mpɔ du mu baako yera a, ɔrensɔ kanea, mprapra ne dan mu, nhwehwɛ kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhu Na sɛ ɔhunu a, ɔremfrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne nʼafipamfoɔ nyinaa nka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momma yɛn ani nnye, ɛfiri sɛ, mahu me sika mpɔ a ɛyeraeɛ no’ Saa ara nso na sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ baako sakra nʼadwene a, Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ ani gye ara ne no.”
Ɔyera Ba
Yesu san buu wɔn ɔyera ho bɛ bi sɛ, “Ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ mmammarima baanu. Wɔn mu akumaa no ka kyerɛɛ ne papa no sɛ, ‘Me papa, fa me kyɛfa a mewɔ wɔ wʼagyapadeɛ mu no ma me!’ Ɔbarima no kyɛɛ nʼagyapadeɛ mu de ne ba no kyɛfa maa no.
“Nna tiawa bi akyi no, ne ba kumaa yi boaboaa nʼahodeɛ nyinaa ano tuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri asase bi so kɔbɔɔ ahohwi bra, hweree nʼahodeɛ nyinaa. Ɛno akyi no, ɔkɔm kɛseɛ bi baa asase no so maa ne ho kyeree no. Ɛbaa saa no, ɔde ne ho kɔdanee kurommani bi a, ɔma ɔkɔhwɛɛ ne mprako so. Ɔwɔ hɔ no, ɔkɔm dee no maa ne kɔn dɔɔ sɛ anka ɔbɛnya aduane a mprako no di no bi mpo adi, nanso, wannya.
“Nʼani baa ne ho so no, ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Apaafoɔ a wɔwɔ me papa fie didi, mee ma ebi ka ma wɔto gu. Adɛn na mete ha na ɔkɔm reku me yi! Mɛsɔre makɔ me papa nkyɛn na maka makyerɛ no sɛ, “Papa, mayɛ ɔsoro ne wo bɔne, na memfata sɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio; fa me yɛ wʼapaafoɔ no mu baako.” ’
“Ɔsiim sɛ ɔresane aba ne papa nkyɛn. Ɔnam kwan so akyirikyiri reba no, ne papa no hunuu no, enti ɔde ayamhyehyeɛ yɛɛ ntɛm kɔhyiaa no, bam no, yɛɛ no atuu.
“Aberanteɛ yi ka kyerɛɛ ne papa no sɛ, ‘Papa, mayɛ ɔsoro ne wo bɔne, na memfata sɛ wofrɛ me wo ba bio.’
“Nʼano ansi koraa na ne papa no frɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Monka mo ho nkɔfa ntoma pa mmɛfira no na monhyɛ no pɛtea ne mpaboa a ɛyɛ fɛ. Afei, monkɔkum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no mfa nyɛ aduane, na yɛnnidi, nnom, nnye yɛn ani, ɛfiri sɛ, na mesusu sɛ meba yi awu, sɛ nso na ɔte ase; ɔyeraeɛ, nanso wasane aba.’ Wɔfitii aseɛ gyee wɔn ani.
“Ne ba panin a na ɔfiri afuom reba no duruu afikyire no, ɔtee nnwontoɔ ne ahurisidie wɔ fie hɔ. Ɛno nti ɔfrɛɛ asomfoɔ no mu baako bisaa no deɛ ɛrekɔ so wɔ fie hɔ. Ɔsomfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Wo nua no asane aba a biribiara anyɛ no enti, wo papa akum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no ama no.’
“Ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, ne bo fuiɛ enti ɔyɛɛ nʼadwene sɛ ɔrenkɔ fie hɔ. Ne papa tee saa asɛm yi no, ɔfirii adi baa ne nkyɛn bɛkorɔkorɔɔ no. Ne ba no de awerɛhoɔ buaa no sɛ, ‘Papa, masom wo mfeɛ dodoɔ yi nyinaa a deɛ wobɛka biara metie, nanso wommaa me odwan ba mpo da sɛ menkum na me ne me nnamfonom mfa nnye yɛn ani. Nanso, wo ba a ɔkɔbɔɔ ahohwie no baeɛ yi deɛ, woakum nantwie ba a wadɔre sradeɛ no ama no.’
“Ne papa buaa no sɛ, ‘Me ba, me ne wo na ɛte ha. Biribiara a mewɔ nso yɛ wo dea. Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛgye yɛn ani, ɛfiri sɛ, na mesusu sɛ wo nua yi awu, sɛ nso na ɔte ase; ɔyeraeɛ, nanso wasane aba.’ ”
Luka 16Efie Sohwɛfoɔ Okontomponi No
1Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Ɔdefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ efie sohwɛfoɔ bi. Ɔdefoɔ yi tetee sɛ ne fiesohwɛfoɔ no resɛe ne nnoɔma.
2“Ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, ɔfrɛɛ ne fiesohwɛfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Ɛdeɛn na metete fa wo ho yi? Bɛbu wʼadwuma ho nkonta kyerɛ me na merentumi ne wo nyɔ adwuma bio.’
3“Efie sohwɛfoɔ no kaa wɔ ne tirim sɛ, ‘Menyɛ deɛn ni? Ɛnnɛ a wɔrepam me afiri fie ha yi, ɛhe na mɛfa? Menni ahoɔden a mede bɛdɔ, ɛnna mefɛre nso sɛ mɛsrɛsrɛ adeɛ. 4Menim deɛ mɛyɔ a ɛbɛma wɔn a wɔdede me wura aka no bɛhu me mmɔbɔ.’
5“Enti, ɔfrɛfrɛɛ wɔn a wɔdede ne wura aka no mmaako mmaako. Ɔbisaa deɛ ɔdi kan no sɛ, ‘Ɛka ahe na wode me wura?’ 6Ɔbuaa sɛ, ‘Mede ngo nhina aduonu ka.’ Enti, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Yɛ ntɛm tena ase na twam na twerɛ sɛ, wode ngo nhina du ka.’
7“Ɛno akyi no, ɔfrɛɛ ɔfoforɔ bi nso bisaa no sɛ, ‘Na wo nso, ɛka ahe na wode me wura?’ Ɔno nso buaa sɛ, ‘Mede aburoo nkotokuo ɔha ka.’ Enti, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Tena ase na twam na twerɛ sɛ, wode nkotokuo aduonum ka!’
8“Ɔdefoɔ no hunuu deɛ efie sohwɛfoɔ no yɛeɛ no akyi, nanso ɔnam fɛwdie so kamfoo no wɔ ne nnaadaa ne nʼanifereɛ no ho. Saa ara nso na wiase yi mma susu sɛ wɔnim nyansa sene wɔn a wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn akyidifoɔ no. 9Menka mfa nhyɛ mo nkuran sɛ momfa nsisie kwan so mfa nnamfo anaa? Mogye di sɛ yei bɛma mo akɔ daa homebea hɔ anaa? Dabida. 10Deɛ ɔdi nokorɛ wɔ kakraa bi ho no bɛdi nokorɛ wɔ pii ho; na deɛ ɔnni nokorɛ wɔ kakraa bi ho no, rentumi nni nokorɛ wɔ pii ho. 11Sɛ moantumi anni nokorɛ wɔ wiase nnoɔma ho a, hwan na ɔde ɔsoro nnepa bɛhyɛ mo nsa? 12Sɛ moanni nokorɛ wɔ obi adeɛ bi a wɔde ahyɛ mo nsa no ho a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔde deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ mo dea no bɛma mo?
13“Ɔsomfoɔ biara rentumi nsom awuranom baanu, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔyɛ saa a, ɔbɛdɔ ɔbaako na watan ɔbaako anaasɛ, ɔbɛsom ɔbaako yie na wabu ɔbaako animtia. Morentumi nsom Onyankopɔn ne ahonyadeɛ.”
14Farisifoɔ sikaniberefoɔ no tee deɛ Yesu kaeɛ no, wɔdii ne ho fɛw.
15Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Moyɛ nnipa a mobu mo ho ateneneefoɔ wɔ nnipa anim, nanso Onyankopɔn nim mo koma mu. Na deɛ ɛsom bo wɔ nnipa ani so no yɛ akyideɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim. 16Ansa na Yohane Osubɔni bɛba no, na Mose mmara ne adiyifoɔ no nsɛm no na modi so. Na Yohane Osubɔni baeɛ no, ɔbɛkaa Onyankopɔn Ahennie ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ mo, nti, nnipa da so pere sɛ wɔbɛkɔ saa Ahennie no mu. 17Ɛnyɛ den sɛ ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam sene sɛ mmara no mu nsensaneɛ ketewa baako mpo bɛyera.
18“Obiara a ɔgyaa ne yere awadeɛ na ɔware ɔfoforɔ no bɔ adwaman; na deɛ ɔware ɔbaa biara a ne kunu agyaa no no nso, bɔ adwaman.”
Ɔdefoɔ Bi Ne Lasaro
19Yesu toaa so kaa sɛ, “Ɔdefoɔ bi tenaa ase a na daa ɔfira ntoma pa na ɔgye nʼani yie nso. 20Na ɔbarima hiani bi a akuro atutu no a wɔfrɛ no Lasaro no nso da nʼaboboano. 21Ɔbarima yi kɔn dɔeɛ sɛ anka ɔbɛnya aduane a ɔdefoɔ no adi ama aka no bi adi. Saa berɛ korɔ no ara mu na akraman ba baabi a na ohiani no da hɔ no bɛtaferetafere nʼakuro no mu. 22Ohiani no wuiɛ maa abɔfoɔ bɛfaa no kɔtenaa Abraham nkyɛn. Ɔdefoɔ no nso wuiɛ ma wɔsiee no. 23Ɔdefoɔ no wɔ asaman a ne ho yera no no, ɔmaa nʼani so hunuu Lasaro sɛ ɔte Abraham nkyɛn.
24“Ɔdefoɔ no teaam sɛ, ‘Agya Abraham, mesrɛ wo, hu me mmɔbɔ na soma Lasaro na ɔmfa ne nsateaa ano nkɔbɔ nsuo mu mfa mmɛsɔ me tɛkrɛma so, na me ho yera me.’
25“Abraham buaa no sɛ, ‘Me ba, kae sɛ wote wiase no, wodii dɛ na Lasaro dii yea, nanso afei na ɔredi dɛ ɛnna wo nso woredi yea. 26Ɛnyɛ yei nko, ɛbɔn kɛseɛ da yɛn ne mo ntam a ɛno nti, wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfiri ha ba mo nkyɛn hɔ ne wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfiri mo nkyɛn hɔ ba ha no nso rentumi mma.’
27“Ɔdefoɔ no sane ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ, ‘Agya, mesrɛ wo, soma Lasaro kɔ me papa fie, 28ɛfiri sɛ, mewɔ nnuammarimanom baanum. Ma ɔnkɔbɔ wɔn kɔkɔ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a wɔn mu biara remma saa ahoyera yi mu bi.’
29“Abraham buaa no sɛ, ‘Wɔwɔ nsɛm a Onyankopɔn nam Mose ne adiyifoɔ no so aka enti ma wɔntie na wɔnni so.’
30“Ɔdefoɔ yi kaa bio sɛ, ‘Agya Abraham, deɛ woreka yi wom deɛ, nanso sɛ obi fi asaman ha kɔbɔ wɔn kɔkɔ deɛ a, wɔbɛsakra wɔn adwene.’
31“Abraham buaa sɛ, ‘Sɛ wɔantie deɛ Onyankopɔn nam Mose ne adiyifoɔ no so aka no a, saa ara nso na sɛ obi firi asaman ha kɔkasa kyerɛ wɔn a, wɔrentie no ara no no.’ ”Efie Sohwɛfoɔ Okontomponi No
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Ɔdefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ efie sohwɛfoɔ bi. Ɔdefoɔ yi tetee sɛ ne fiesohwɛfoɔ no resɛe ne nnoɔma.
“Ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, ɔfrɛɛ ne fiesohwɛfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Ɛdeɛn na metete fa wo ho yi? Bɛbu wʼadwuma ho nkonta kyerɛ me na merentumi ne wo nyɔ adwuma bio.’
“Efie sohwɛfoɔ no kaa wɔ ne tirim sɛ, ‘Menyɛ deɛn ni? Ɛnnɛ a wɔrepam me afiri fie ha yi, ɛhe na mɛfa? Menni ahoɔden a mede bɛdɔ, ɛnna mefɛre nso sɛ mɛsrɛsrɛ adeɛ. Menim deɛ mɛyɔ a ɛbɛma wɔn a wɔdede me wura aka no bɛhu me mmɔbɔ.’
“Enti, ɔfrɛfrɛɛ wɔn a wɔdede ne wura aka no mmaako mmaako. Ɔbisaa deɛ ɔdi kan no sɛ, ‘Ɛka ahe na wode me wura?’ Ɔbuaa sɛ, ‘Mede ngo nhina aduonu ka.’ Enti, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Yɛ ntɛm tena ase na twam na twerɛ sɛ, wode ngo nhina du ka.’
“Ɛno akyi no, ɔfrɛɛ ɔfoforɔ bi nso bisaa no sɛ, ‘Na wo nso, ɛka ahe na wode me wura?’ Ɔno nso buaa sɛ, ‘Mede aburoo nkotokuo ɔha ka.’ Enti, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Tena ase na twam na twerɛ sɛ, wode nkotokuo aduonum ka!’
“Ɔdefoɔ no hunuu deɛ efie sohwɛfoɔ no yɛeɛ no akyi, nanso ɔnam fɛwdie so kamfoo no wɔ ne nnaadaa ne nʼanifereɛ no ho. Saa ara nso na wiase yi mma susu sɛ wɔnim nyansa sene wɔn a wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn akyidifoɔ no. Menka mfa nhyɛ mo nkuran sɛ momfa nsisie kwan so mfa nnamfo anaa? Mogye di sɛ yei bɛma mo akɔ daa homebea hɔ anaa? Dabida. Deɛ ɔdi nokorɛ wɔ kakraa bi ho no bɛdi nokorɛ wɔ pii ho; na deɛ ɔnni nokorɛ wɔ kakraa bi ho no, rentumi nni nokorɛ wɔ pii ho. Sɛ moantumi anni nokorɛ wɔ wiase nnoɔma ho a, hwan na ɔde ɔsoro nnepa bɛhyɛ mo nsa? Sɛ moanni nokorɛ wɔ obi adeɛ bi a wɔde ahyɛ mo nsa no ho a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔde deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ mo dea no bɛma mo?
“Ɔsomfoɔ biara rentumi nsom awuranom baanu, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔyɛ saa a, ɔbɛdɔ ɔbaako na watan ɔbaako anaasɛ, ɔbɛsom ɔbaako yie na wabu ɔbaako animtia. Morentumi nsom Onyankopɔn ne ahonyadeɛ.”
Farisifoɔ sikaniberefoɔ no tee deɛ Yesu kaeɛ no, wɔdii ne ho fɛw.
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Moyɛ nnipa a mobu mo ho ateneneefoɔ wɔ nnipa anim, nanso Onyankopɔn nim mo koma mu. Na deɛ ɛsom bo wɔ nnipa ani so no yɛ akyideɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim. Ansa na Yohane Osubɔni bɛba no, na Mose mmara ne adiyifoɔ no nsɛm no na modi so. Na Yohane Osubɔni baeɛ no, ɔbɛkaa Onyankopɔn Ahennie ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ mo, nti, nnipa da so pere sɛ wɔbɛkɔ saa Ahennie no mu. Ɛnyɛ den sɛ ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam sene sɛ mmara no mu nsensaneɛ ketewa baako mpo bɛyera.
“Obiara a ɔgyaa ne yere awadeɛ na ɔware ɔfoforɔ no bɔ adwaman; na deɛ ɔware ɔbaa biara a ne kunu agyaa no no nso, bɔ adwaman.”
Ɔdefoɔ Bi Ne Lasaro
Yesu toaa so kaa sɛ, “Ɔdefoɔ bi tenaa ase a na daa ɔfira ntoma pa na ɔgye nʼani yie nso. Na ɔbarima hiani bi a akuro atutu no a wɔfrɛ no Lasaro no nso da nʼaboboano. Ɔbarima yi kɔn dɔeɛ sɛ anka ɔbɛnya aduane a ɔdefoɔ no adi ama aka no bi adi. Saa berɛ korɔ no ara mu na akraman ba baabi a na ohiani no da hɔ no bɛtaferetafere nʼakuro no mu. Ohiani no wuiɛ maa abɔfoɔ bɛfaa no kɔtenaa Abraham nkyɛn. Ɔdefoɔ no nso wuiɛ ma wɔsiee no. Ɔdefoɔ no wɔ asaman a ne ho yera no no, ɔmaa nʼani so hunuu Lasaro sɛ ɔte Abraham nkyɛn.
“Ɔdefoɔ no teaam sɛ, ‘Agya Abraham, mesrɛ wo, hu me mmɔbɔ na soma Lasaro na ɔmfa ne nsateaa ano nkɔbɔ nsuo mu mfa mmɛsɔ me tɛkrɛma so, na me ho yera me.’
“Abraham buaa no sɛ, ‘Me ba, kae sɛ wote wiase no, wodii dɛ na Lasaro dii yea, nanso afei na ɔredi dɛ ɛnna wo nso woredi yea. Ɛnyɛ yei nko, ɛbɔn kɛseɛ da yɛn ne mo ntam a ɛno nti, wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfiri ha ba mo nkyɛn hɔ ne wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfiri mo nkyɛn hɔ ba ha no nso rentumi mma.’
“Ɔdefoɔ no sane ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ, ‘Agya, mesrɛ wo, soma Lasaro kɔ me papa fie, ɛfiri sɛ, mewɔ nnuammarimanom baanum. Ma ɔnkɔbɔ wɔn kɔkɔ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a wɔn mu biara remma saa ahoyera yi mu bi.’
“Abraham buaa no sɛ, ‘Wɔwɔ nsɛm a Onyankopɔn nam Mose ne adiyifoɔ no so aka enti ma wɔntie na wɔnni so.’
“Ɔdefoɔ yi kaa bio sɛ, ‘Agya Abraham, deɛ woreka yi wom deɛ, nanso sɛ obi fi asaman ha kɔbɔ wɔn kɔkɔ deɛ a, wɔbɛsakra wɔn adwene.’
“Abraham buaa sɛ, ‘Sɛ wɔantie deɛ Onyankopɔn nam Mose ne adiyifoɔ no so aka no a, saa ara nso na sɛ obi firi asaman ha kɔkasa kyerɛ wɔn a, wɔrentie no ara no no.’ ”
Luka 17Bɔne, Gyidie Ne Asɛdeɛ
1Da bi Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Ɛyɛ dɛn ara a sɔhwɛ a ɛde onipa kɔ bɔne mu no bɛba, nanso onipa a ɛnam ne so bɛba no, ɔnnue. 2Ɛyɛ ma saa onipa no sɛ wɔde ɛboɔ a ɛmu yɛ duro bi bɛsɛn ne kɔn mu ato no atwene po mu sene sɛ ɔbɛto nkumaa yi mu baako huntidua ama wayɛ bɔne. 3Enti, monhwɛ mo ho so yie. Sɛ wo nua fom wo a, ka nʼanim na sɛ ɔnu ne ho a, fa ne bɔne kyɛ no. 4Sɛ nso ɔfom wo mprɛ nson da koro na mprɛ dodoɔ a ɔfom wo no nyinaa, ɔde ahonu srɛ wo a, fa kyɛ no.”
5Da bi, asomafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, hyɛ yɛn gyidie mu den.”
6Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ mowɔ gyidie te sɛ onyina aba a, anka mobɛtumi aka akyerɛ akyee yi sɛ, ‘Tutu kɔgu po mu,’ na ɛbɛba mu saa. 7Mo mu hwan na ɔwɔ ɔsomfoɔ a ɔyɔ nʼafuom adwuma anaasɛ ɔhwɛ ne mmoa na ɔfiri afuom ba a, ɔbɛka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Wʼaduane si hɔ na kɔdidi?’ 8Na mmom ɔrenka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Noa aduane ma me na sɛ modidi wie a, wo nso woakɔdidi?’ 9Sɛ ɔsomfoɔ yi yɛ nʼasɛdeɛ yi a, ne wura no bɛda no ase anaa? 10Saa ara nso na sɛ mo nso moyɛ mo asɛdeɛ a, ɛsɛ sɛ moka sɛ, ‘Yɛyɛ asomfoɔ a ayeyie mfata yɛn, yɛn asɛdeɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɔ na yɛayɔ no.’ ”
Akwatafoɔ Du No Ayaresa
11Berɛ bi a Yesu rekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔfaa Samaria ne Galilea hyeɛ so. 12Ɔrebɛn akuraa bi ase no, akwatafoɔ du bi a na wɔgyinagyina kurotia no hunuu no 13teateaam sɛ, “Yesu, yɛn wura, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ.”
14Yesu hunuu wɔn no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Momfa mo ho nkɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfoɔ!” Berɛ a akwatafoɔ no rekɔ no, wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den.
15Wɔn mu baako hunuu sɛ ne ho ayɛ no den no, ɔsanee nʼakyi de ahurisie yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ sɛ, “Animuonyam nka Onyankopɔn, wama me ho ayɛ me den!” 16Ɔbɛkotoo Yesu anim daa no ase. Na saa ɔbarima yi yɛ Samariani.
17Yesu bisaa sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ nnipa du na wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den? Baakron a wɔaka no wɔ he? 18Adɛn nti na ɔmamfrani yi nko na wasan aba sɛ ɔrebɛyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ?”
19Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Sɔre kɔ, wo gyidie ama wo ho ayɛ wo den.”
20Da bi Farisifoɔ bi bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Berɛ bɛn na Onyankopɔn Ahennie no bɛba?” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Onyankopɔn Ahennie no nnam nsɛnkyerɛnne bi a mobɛhunu so na ɛbɛba, 21na obi rentumi nkyerɛ mo sɛ, ‘Ɛwɔ ha anaa ɛhɔ!’ Ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahennie no te mo mu.”
22Na ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Mmerɛ bi bɛba a mo ani bɛgyina sɛ mobɛhu me berɛ tiawa bi wɔ mo nkyɛn, nanso morenhu me. 23Sɛ nnipa ka kyerɛ mo sɛ mewɔ ha anaa baabi foforɔ a, monnni wɔn akyi. 24Sɛdeɛ anyinam pa gya wɔ wiem ma nnipa nyinaa hu no, saa ara nso na me ba a mɛsane aba no bɛyɛ. 25Nanso, ansa na yeinom nyinaa bɛba mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ mehunu amane na me nkurɔfoɔ nso po me.
26“Sɛdeɛ Noa berɛ so nnipa yɛɛ asoɔden no, saa ara nso na sɛ meba a, ɛbɛyɛ no no. 27Saa berɛ no, nnipa didi, nomee, warewaree kɔsii sɛ Noa kɔhyɛɛ ɛhyɛn no mu na nsuyire bɛfaa saa nnipa no nyinaa.
28“Saa ara nso na Lot berɛ so no, na ɛte. Nnipa didi, nomee, dii dwa, yɛɛ mfuo, sisii adan, 29kɔsii sɛ Lot firiii Sodom na egya ne sɔfere firi soro bɛhyee saa nnipa no nyinaa. 30Saa ara nso na da a mɛsane aba no, ɛbɛyɛ.
31“Saa da no, ɛnsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔwɔ adwuma mu, afuo mu anaa edwa so sane nʼakyi ba fie sɛ ɔrebɛsesa nʼahodeɛ. 32Monkae asɛm a ɛtoo Lot yere. 33Obiara a ɔdɔ ne kra no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa. Na deɛ ɔbɛhwere ne kra no, bɛnya. 34Da no, wɔbɛfa nnipa baanu a wɔda faako no mu baako agya ɔbaako. 35Saa ara nso na wɔbɛfa mmaa baanu a wɔrenoa aduane no mu baako agya ɔbaako. 36Mmarima baanu a wɔreyɔ adwuma wɔ afuom no nso, wɔbɛfa ɔbaako agya ɔbaako.”
37Asuafoɔ no bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, ɛhe na wɔde wɔn bɛkɔ?” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Baabi a efunu wɔ no, apete mpa hɔ!”Bɔne, Gyidie Ne Asɛdeɛ
Da bi Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Ɛyɛ dɛn ara a sɔhwɛ a ɛde onipa kɔ bɔne mu no bɛba, nanso onipa a ɛnam ne so bɛba no, ɔnnue. Ɛyɛ ma saa onipa no sɛ wɔde ɛboɔ a ɛmu yɛ duro bi bɛsɛn ne kɔn mu ato no atwene po mu sene sɛ ɔbɛto nkumaa yi mu baako huntidua ama wayɛ bɔne. Enti, monhwɛ mo ho so yie. Sɛ wo nua fom wo a, ka nʼanim na sɛ ɔnu ne ho a, fa ne bɔne kyɛ no. Sɛ nso ɔfom wo mprɛ nson da koro na mprɛ dodoɔ a ɔfom wo no nyinaa, ɔde ahonu srɛ wo a, fa kyɛ no.”
Da bi, asomafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, hyɛ yɛn gyidie mu den.”
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ mowɔ gyidie te sɛ onyina aba a, anka mobɛtumi aka akyerɛ akyee yi sɛ, ‘Tutu kɔgu po mu,’ na ɛbɛba mu saa. Mo mu hwan na ɔwɔ ɔsomfoɔ a ɔyɔ nʼafuom adwuma anaasɛ ɔhwɛ ne mmoa na ɔfiri afuom ba a, ɔbɛka akyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Wʼaduane si hɔ na kɔdidi?’ Na mmom ɔrenka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Noa aduane ma me na sɛ modidi wie a, wo nso woakɔdidi?’ Sɛ ɔsomfoɔ yi yɛ nʼasɛdeɛ yi a, ne wura no bɛda no ase anaa? Saa ara nso na sɛ mo nso moyɛ mo asɛdeɛ a, ɛsɛ sɛ moka sɛ, ‘Yɛyɛ asomfoɔ a ayeyie mfata yɛn, yɛn asɛdeɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɔ na yɛayɔ no.’ ”
Akwatafoɔ Du No Ayaresa
Berɛ bi a Yesu rekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔfaa Samaria ne Galilea hyeɛ so. Ɔrebɛn akuraa bi ase no, akwatafoɔ du bi a na wɔgyinagyina kurotia no hunuu no teateaam sɛ, “Yesu, yɛn wura, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ.”
Yesu hunuu wɔn no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Momfa mo ho nkɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfoɔ!” Berɛ a akwatafoɔ no rekɔ no, wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den.
Wɔn mu baako hunuu sɛ ne ho ayɛ no den no, ɔsanee nʼakyi de ahurisie yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ sɛ, “Animuonyam nka Onyankopɔn, wama me ho ayɛ me den!” Ɔbɛkotoo Yesu anim daa no ase. Na saa ɔbarima yi yɛ Samariani.
Yesu bisaa sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ nnipa du na wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den? Baakron a wɔaka no wɔ he? Adɛn nti na ɔmamfrani yi nko na wasan aba sɛ ɔrebɛyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ?”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Sɔre kɔ, wo gyidie ama wo ho ayɛ wo den.”
Da bi Farisifoɔ bi bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Berɛ bɛn na Onyankopɔn Ahennie no bɛba?” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Onyankopɔn Ahennie no nnam nsɛnkyerɛnne bi a mobɛhunu so na ɛbɛba, na obi rentumi nkyerɛ mo sɛ, ‘Ɛwɔ ha anaa ɛhɔ!’ Ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahennie no te mo mu.”
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Mmerɛ bi bɛba a mo ani bɛgyina sɛ mobɛhu me berɛ tiawa bi wɔ mo nkyɛn, nanso morenhu me. Sɛ nnipa ka kyerɛ mo sɛ mewɔ ha anaa baabi foforɔ a, monnni wɔn akyi. Sɛdeɛ anyinam pa gya wɔ wiem ma nnipa nyinaa hu no, saa ara nso na me ba a mɛsane aba no bɛyɛ. Nanso, ansa na yeinom nyinaa bɛba mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ mehunu amane na me nkurɔfoɔ nso po me.
“Sɛdeɛ Noa berɛ so nnipa yɛɛ asoɔden no, saa ara nso na sɛ meba a, ɛbɛyɛ no no. Saa berɛ no, nnipa didi, nomee, warewaree kɔsii sɛ Noa kɔhyɛɛ ɛhyɛn no mu na nsuyire bɛfaa saa nnipa no nyinaa.
“Saa ara nso na Lot berɛ so no, na ɛte. Nnipa didi, nomee, dii dwa, yɛɛ mfuo, sisii adan, kɔsii sɛ Lot firiii Sodom na egya ne sɔfere firi soro bɛhyee saa nnipa no nyinaa. Saa ara nso na da a mɛsane aba no, ɛbɛyɛ.
“Saa da no, ɛnsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔwɔ adwuma mu, afuo mu anaa edwa so sane nʼakyi ba fie sɛ ɔrebɛsesa nʼahodeɛ. Monkae asɛm a ɛtoo Lot yere. Obiara a ɔdɔ ne kra no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa. Na deɛ ɔbɛhwere ne kra no, bɛnya. Da no, wɔbɛfa nnipa baanu a wɔda faako no mu baako agya ɔbaako. Saa ara nso na wɔbɛfa mmaa baanu a wɔrenoa aduane no mu baako agya ɔbaako. Mmarima baanu a wɔreyɔ adwuma wɔ afuom no nso, wɔbɛfa ɔbaako agya ɔbaako.”
Asuafoɔ no bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, ɛhe na wɔde wɔn bɛkɔ?” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Baabi a efunu wɔ no, apete mpa hɔ!”
Luka 18Mpaebɔ Ho Bɛ
1Da bi Yesu nam abɛbuo so kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no hia a ɛhia sɛ wɔbɔ mpaeɛ daa a wɔmpa aba.
2Yesu kaa sɛ, “Ɔtɛmmufoɔ bi tenaa kuro bi mu a na ɔnsuro Onyankopɔn, mfɛre onipa biara. 3Na ɔbaa kunafoɔ bi te saa kuro yi mu a, ɔne obi wɔ asɛm. Daa na saa okunafoɔ yi kɔ ɔtɛmmufoɔ no nkyɛn kɔsrɛ no sɛ ɔnni nʼasɛm no mma no. 4Mfitiaseɛ no, ɔtɛmmufoɔ no ammua no. Nanso, akyire yi ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Ɛwom sɛ mensuro Onyankopɔn, mfɛre onipa biara deɛ, 5nanso ɛsiane sɛ daa ɔbaa yi ha me nti, mɛhwɛ adi asɛm no yie ama no sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, ɔremmɛha me bio!’ ”
6Awurade toaa so sɛ, “Moate asɛm a ɔtɛmmufoɔ yi a ɔntene no kaeɛ. 7Monnnye nnni sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛdi ama ne mma a daa wɔsu frɛ no awia ne anadwo no no anaa ɔbɛtwentwɛn ne nan ase anaa? 8Merema moate aseɛ sɛ, ɔbɛyɛ wɔn apɛdeɛ ama wɔn ntɛm. Sɛ Onipa Ba no san ba a, nnipa baahe na ɔbɛhu wɔn sɛ wɔwɔ ne mu gyidie?”
Farisini Ne Togyeni
9Yesu sane buu bɛ bi faa nnipa a wɔbu wɔn ho sɛ ateneneefoɔ na ɛno nti wɔbu afoforɔ animtia no ho sɛ, 10“Da bi nnipa baanu bi kɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ.
