Na wɔn mu baako yɛ Farisini a ɔbu ne ho, na ɔbaako no nso yɛ togyeni. 11Farisini yi kɔgyinaa baabi a obiara bɛhu no bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn, meda wo ase sɛ mente sɛ nnipa a aka no te sɛ apoobɔfoɔ nkontompofoɔ, adwamammɔfoɔ ne saa togyeni a ɔgyina hɔ yi. 12Nnawɔtwe biara mu, medi mmuada mprenu na deɛ menya biara nso, meyi mu nkyɛmu du mu baako de ma.’
13“Saa berɛ no na togyeni no gyina akyiri baabi a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔma nʼani so kyerɛ soro. Ɔde ne nsa guu ne bo bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn, hu me ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ mmɔbɔ!’ 14Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, deɛ togyeni no yɛeɛ no sɔɔ Onyankopɔn ani sene deɛ Farisini no yɛeɛ no. Obiara a ɔma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.”
Yesu Hyira Mmɔfra Nketewa
15Da bi, awofoɔ bi de wɔn mma nketewa brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nka wɔn, nhyira wɔn. Asuafoɔ no hunuu awofoɔ no no, wɔtramtram wɔn.
16Yesu frɛɛ mmɔfra no awofoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn na ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Momma mmɔfra nketewa no mmra me nkyɛn na monnsi wɔn kwan, na oyinom sei na Onyankopɔn Ahennie no yɛ wɔn dea. 17Merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, obiara a ɔnnye Onyankopɔn Ahennie no nni sɛ abɔfra ketewa no, renkɔ mu.”
Osikani Bi
18Da bi Yudani sikani bi bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ pa, ɛdeɛn na menyɔ na manya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ?”
19Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Adɛn nti na wofrɛ me onipa pa? Obiara nyɛ papa, gye Onyankopɔn.
20“Wonim Mose mmara no: mmɔ adwaman! Nni awu! Mmɔ korɔno! Nni adansekurumu! Di wʼagya ne wo na ni!”
21Osikani yi ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Madi saa mmara yi nyinaa so firi me mmɔfraase.”
22Yesu tee deɛ osikani no kaeɛ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Adeɛ baako pɛ na aka wo a ɛsɛ sɛ woyɔ. Kɔ na kɔtɔn wʼahodeɛ nyinaa na kyɛ sika no ma ahiafoɔ na wobɛnya agyapadeɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu, na afei, bra bɛdi mʼakyi.”
23Osikani yi tee saa asɛm yi no, anyɛ no dɛ koraa ɛfiri sɛ, na ɔwɔ ahodeɛ pii.
24Yesu hunuu sɛ ne werɛ ahoɔ no ɔkaa sɛ, “Ɛyɛ den ma ahonyafoɔ sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Onyakopɔn Ahennie no mu! 25Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ nantwie bɛwura paneɛ aniwa mu sene sɛ ɔhonyafoɔ bɛkɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu.”
26Na wɔn a wɔtee deɛ Yesu kaeɛ no bisaa sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ na hwan na wɔbɛgye no nkwa?”
27Yesu buaa sɛ, “Biribiara nni hɔ a Onyankopɔn ntumi nyɔ.”
28Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Yɛagya deɛ yɛwɔ nyinaa hɔ abɛdi wʼakyi.”
29Yesu buaa Petro sɛ, “Merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, obiara nni hɔ a, ɛsiane Onyankopɔn Ahennie no nti, wagya ne fie anaa ne nuanom anaa nʼawofoɔ anaa ne mma 30na ɔrennya mma ɛmmoro deɛ wahwere no so saa berɛ yi mu, na daakye nso, ɔrennya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ.”
Yesu San Hyɛ Ne Wuo Ho Nkɔm
31Yesu frɛɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no gyinaa nkyɛn baabi ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Yɛrekɔ Yerusalem, na biribiara a nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no aka afa Onipa Ba no ho no bɛba mu. 32Wɔbɛyi no ama Amanamanmufoɔ ama wɔadi ne ho fɛw, ayeya no, ate ntasuo agu ne so, 33aka no mpire, aku no na ne nnansa so no, wasɔre.”
34Asuafoɔ no ante deɛ Yesu kaaeɛ no biara ase, ɛfiri sɛ, na asɛm no boro wɔn adwene so.
Onifirafoɔ Bi Ayaresa
35Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ no rebɛn Yeriko no, wɔhunuu onifirafoɔ bi a ɔte kwankyɛn resrɛsrɛ adeɛ. 36Onifirafoɔ no tee sɛ nkurɔfokuo bi retwam no, ɔbisaa asɛm a asi. 37Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yesu Nasaretni no na ɔretwam!” 38Ɔtee saa no, ɔteateɛɛm sɛ, “Yesu, Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!”
39Wɔn a wɔdi anim no tramtram no sɛ ɔmmua nʼano, nanso wantie, na ɔkɔɔ so teateaam dendeeden sɛ, “Yesu Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!”
40Yesu duruu baabi a onifirafoɔ no te no, ɔmaa wɔde no brɛɛ no. Wɔde no duruu Yesu nkyɛn no, ɔbisaa no sɛ, 41“Ɛdeɛn na wopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma wo?” Onifirafoɔ no buaa sɛ, “Awurade, ma menhunu adeɛ.”
42Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Hunu adeɛ, wo gyidie ama wo ho ayɛ wo den.”
43Amonom hɔ ara, onifirafoɔ yi hunuu adeɛ, na ɔdii Yesu akyi, yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ. Na wɔn a wɔhunuu ayaresa no nyinaa nso yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.Mpaebɔ Ho Bɛ
Da bi Yesu nam abɛbuo so kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no hia a ɛhia sɛ wɔbɔ mpaeɛ daa a wɔmpa aba.
Yesu kaa sɛ, “Ɔtɛmmufoɔ bi tenaa kuro bi mu a na ɔnsuro Onyankopɔn, mfɛre onipa biara. Na ɔbaa kunafoɔ bi te saa kuro yi mu a, ɔne obi wɔ asɛm. Daa na saa okunafoɔ yi kɔ ɔtɛmmufoɔ no nkyɛn kɔsrɛ no sɛ ɔnni nʼasɛm no mma no. Mfitiaseɛ no, ɔtɛmmufoɔ no ammua no. Nanso, akyire yi ɔkaa sɛ, ‘Ɛwom sɛ mensuro Onyankopɔn, mfɛre onipa biara deɛ, nanso ɛsiane sɛ daa ɔbaa yi ha me nti, mɛhwɛ adi asɛm no yie ama no sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, ɔremmɛha me bio!’ ”
Awurade toaa so sɛ, “Moate asɛm a ɔtɛmmufoɔ yi a ɔntene no kaeɛ. Monnnye nnni sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛdi ama ne mma a daa wɔsu frɛ no awia ne anadwo no no anaa ɔbɛtwentwɛn ne nan ase anaa? Merema moate aseɛ sɛ, ɔbɛyɛ wɔn apɛdeɛ ama wɔn ntɛm. Sɛ Onipa Ba no san ba a, nnipa baahe na ɔbɛhu wɔn sɛ wɔwɔ ne mu gyidie?”
Farisini Ne Togyeni
Yesu sane buu bɛ bi faa nnipa a wɔbu wɔn ho sɛ ateneneefoɔ na ɛno nti wɔbu afoforɔ animtia no ho sɛ, “Da bi nnipa baanu bi kɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ. Na wɔn mu baako yɛ Farisini a ɔbu ne ho, na ɔbaako no nso yɛ togyeni. Farisini yi kɔgyinaa baabi a obiara bɛhu no bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn, meda wo ase sɛ mente sɛ nnipa a aka no te sɛ apoobɔfoɔ nkontompofoɔ, adwamammɔfoɔ ne saa togyeni a ɔgyina hɔ yi. Nnawɔtwe biara mu, medi mmuada mprenu na deɛ menya biara nso, meyi mu nkyɛmu du mu baako de ma.’
“Saa berɛ no na togyeni no gyina akyiri baabi a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔma nʼani so kyerɛ soro. Ɔde ne nsa guu ne bo bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn, hu me ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ mmɔbɔ!’ Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, deɛ togyeni no yɛeɛ no sɔɔ Onyankopɔn ani sene deɛ Farisini no yɛeɛ no. Obiara a ɔma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.”
Yesu Hyira Mmɔfra Nketewa
Da bi, awofoɔ bi de wɔn mma nketewa brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nka wɔn, nhyira wɔn. Asuafoɔ no hunuu awofoɔ no no, wɔtramtram wɔn.
Yesu frɛɛ mmɔfra no awofoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn na ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Momma mmɔfra nketewa no mmra me nkyɛn na monnsi wɔn kwan, na oyinom sei na Onyankopɔn Ahennie no yɛ wɔn dea. Merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, obiara a ɔnnye Onyankopɔn Ahennie no nni sɛ abɔfra ketewa no, renkɔ mu.”
Osikani Bi
Da bi Yudani sikani bi bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ pa, ɛdeɛn na menyɔ na manya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ?”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Adɛn nti na wofrɛ me onipa pa? Obiara nyɛ papa, gye Onyankopɔn.
“Wonim Mose mmara no: mmɔ adwaman! Nni awu! Mmɔ korɔno! Nni adansekurumu! Di wʼagya ne wo na ni!”
Osikani yi ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Madi saa mmara yi nyinaa so firi me mmɔfraase.”
Yesu tee deɛ osikani no kaeɛ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Adeɛ baako pɛ na aka wo a ɛsɛ sɛ woyɔ. Kɔ na kɔtɔn wʼahodeɛ nyinaa na kyɛ sika no ma ahiafoɔ na wobɛnya agyapadeɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu, na afei, bra bɛdi mʼakyi.”
Osikani yi tee saa asɛm yi no, anyɛ no dɛ koraa ɛfiri sɛ, na ɔwɔ ahodeɛ pii.
Yesu hunuu sɛ ne werɛ ahoɔ no ɔkaa sɛ, “Ɛyɛ den ma ahonyafoɔ sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Onyakopɔn Ahennie no mu! Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ nantwie bɛwura paneɛ aniwa mu sene sɛ ɔhonyafoɔ bɛkɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu.”
Na wɔn a wɔtee deɛ Yesu kaeɛ no bisaa sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ na hwan na wɔbɛgye no nkwa?”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Biribiara nni hɔ a Onyankopɔn ntumi nyɔ.”
Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Yɛagya deɛ yɛwɔ nyinaa hɔ abɛdi wʼakyi.”
Yesu buaa Petro sɛ, “Merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, obiara nni hɔ a, ɛsiane Onyankopɔn Ahennie no nti, wagya ne fie anaa ne nuanom anaa nʼawofoɔ anaa ne mma na ɔrennya mma ɛmmoro deɛ wahwere no so saa berɛ yi mu, na daakye nso, ɔrennya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ.”
Yesu San Hyɛ Ne Wuo Ho Nkɔm
Yesu frɛɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no gyinaa nkyɛn baabi ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Yɛrekɔ Yerusalem, na biribiara a nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no aka afa Onipa Ba no ho no bɛba mu. Wɔbɛyi no ama Amanamanmufoɔ ama wɔadi ne ho fɛw, ayeya no, ate ntasuo agu ne so, aka no mpire, aku no na ne nnansa so no, wasɔre.”
Asuafoɔ no ante deɛ Yesu kaaeɛ no biara ase, ɛfiri sɛ, na asɛm no boro wɔn adwene so.
Onifirafoɔ Bi Ayaresa
Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ no rebɛn Yeriko no, wɔhunuu onifirafoɔ bi a ɔte kwankyɛn resrɛsrɛ adeɛ. Onifirafoɔ no tee sɛ nkurɔfokuo bi retwam no, ɔbisaa asɛm a asi. Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yesu Nasaretni no na ɔretwam!” Ɔtee saa no, ɔteateɛɛm sɛ, “Yesu, Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!”
Wɔn a wɔdi anim no tramtram no sɛ ɔmmua nʼano, nanso wantie, na ɔkɔɔ so teateaam dendeeden sɛ, “Yesu Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!”
Yesu duruu baabi a onifirafoɔ no te no, ɔmaa wɔde no brɛɛ no. Wɔde no duruu Yesu nkyɛn no, ɔbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na wopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma wo?” Onifirafoɔ no buaa sɛ, “Awurade, ma menhunu adeɛ.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Hunu adeɛ, wo gyidie ama wo ho ayɛ wo den.”
Amonom hɔ ara, onifirafoɔ yi hunuu adeɛ, na ɔdii Yesu akyi, yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ. Na wɔn a wɔhunuu ayaresa no nyinaa nso yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
Luka 19Sakeo
1Da bi a na Yesu retwam wɔ Yeriko no, 2ɔhunuu ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Sakeo. Na Sakeo yɛ togyeni panin sane yɛ osikani nso. 3Berɛ a Yesu retwam no, Sakeo pɛɛ sɛ anka ɔhu no, nanso ɛsiane sɛ na ɔyɛ onipa tiawa na wɔn a wɔdi Yesu akyi no dɔɔso nti, wanhu no. 4Ɛsiane sɛ na Sakeo nim sɛ Yesu bɛfa nnyedua bi a na ɛsisi hɔ no ase nti, ɔyɛɛ ntɛm kɔforoo saa nnyedua no mu baako.
5Berɛ a Yesu duruu nnyedua no ase no, ɔmaa nʼani so hunuu no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Sakeo, yɛ ntɛm na si fam na wo fie na ɛnnɛ mɛtena.”
6Sakeo yɛɛ ntɛm sii fam de anigyeɛ gyee no fɛ so.
7Nnipa a wɔdi Yesu akyi no hunuu yei no, wɔnwiinwii kaa sɛ, “Ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ yi na wakɔ akɔsoɛ no.”
8Berɛ a nnipa no renwiinwii no, Sakeo bɛgyinaa Yesu nkyɛn kaa sɛ, “Awurade, ɛnnɛ, mede mʼahodeɛ mu fa kyɛ ahiafoɔ, na sɛ masisi obi wɔ biribi mu a, mɛtua mmɔho nan ama no.” 9Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛnnɛ na nkwagyeɛ aba efie yi mu, ɛfiri sɛ, oyi nso yɛ Abraham ba. 10Na mebaeɛ sɛ merebɛhwehwɛ wɔn a wɔayera na magye wɔn nkwa.”
Adwumayɔ Ho Akontabuo
11Berɛ a Yesu ne nnipa no rebɛn Yerusalem no, ɔsane buu wɔn bɛ foforɔ de kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn.
12Ɔkaa sɛ, “Ɔdehyeɛ bi a watu kwan akɔ akyirikyiri asase bi so sane kɔɔ ne kurom kɔhunuu nʼabusua mu mpanimfoɔ sɛ wɔnsi no hene. 13Ansa na ɔrebɛfiri nʼakwantuo no ase no, ɔfrɛɛ nʼadwumayɔfoɔ mu du maa wɔn mu biara sidi ɔpedu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momfa sika yi nyɔ adwuma kɔsi sɛ mɛba.’ 14Kurom hɔfoɔ no tee nʼahennie no ho asɛm no, wɔtuu nnipa kɔhunuu mpanimfoɔ no sɛ wɔmpɛ no.
15“Nanso, wɔsii no hene maa ɔsane kɔɔ baabi a na ɔyɔ adwuma no. Ɔduruiɛ no, ɔfrɛɛ nʼadwumayɔfoɔ du no sɛ, wɔmmɛbu sika a ɔde maa wɔn no ho nkonta nkyerɛ no.
16“Odwumayɔfoɔ a ɔdii kan baeɛ no bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu no, mede ayɔ adwuma anya ho mmɔho du.’
17“Owura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mo, akoa pa, ɛsiane sɛ woadi kakraa a mede hyɛɛ wo nsa no ho nokorɛ nti, mede nkuro du bɛhyɛ wʼase na woadi so.’
18“Odwumayɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no baeɛ bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu no, mede ayɔ adwuma anya ho mmɔho num.’
19“Owura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mede nkuro num bɛhyɛ wʼase na woadi so.’
20“Ɔfoforɔ nso bɛkaa sɛ, ‘Me wura wo sika sidi ɔpedu a wode maa me no, mede sieeɛ, ɛni. 21Na mesuro sɛ mfasoɔ a mɛnya no, wobɛsisi me agye, ɛfiri sɛ, wo tirim yɛ den. Nea ɛnyɛ wo de, wugye; deɛ wunnuae nso, wutwa’. 22Ne wura no buaa no se, ‘Akoa bɔne, wo anom asɛm so na megyina abu wo atɛn. Wunim sɛ me tirim yɛ den. Deɛ ɛnyɛ me dea no megye; deɛ mennuaeɛ no, metwa. 23Adɛn nti na woamfa me sika no ankɔto sikakorabea? Anka mebaeɛ yi mɛnya ho nsiho.’
24“Ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ a na wɔgyina hɔ no sɛ ‘Monnye sika no mfiri ne nsam mfa mma deɛ ɔde ne deɛ yɔɔ adwuma nyaa mmɔho du no.’
25“Asomfoɔ no kaa sɛ, ‘Yɛn wura, sɛ oyi deɛ ɔwɔ sika pii!’ 26Owura no kaa sɛ, ‘Deɛ moreka no yɛ nokorɛ. Nanso, merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ bebree no, wɔbɛma no bi aka ho, na deɛ ɔwɔ kakraa bi no, deɛ ɔwɔ mpo no, wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam. 27Na afei, momfa mʼatamfo a anka wɔmpɛ sɛ medi adeɛ no mmra mʼanim ha na monkum wɔn!’ ”
Yesu Kɔ Yerusalem
28Yesu kaa nsɛm yi wieɛɛ no, ɔdii nʼasuafoɔ no kan kɔɔ Yerusalem. 29Ɔrebɛn Belfage ne Betania a ɛbɛn Ngo Bepɔ no no, ɔsomaa nʼasuafoɔ no mu baanu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, 30“Monkɔ akuraa a ɛbɛn ha no ase na moduru hɔ a, mobɛhunu afunumu ba bi a obiara ntenaa ne so da sɛ wɔasa no. Monsane no mfa no mmrɛ me! 31Sɛ obi bisa sɛ, ‘Adɛn nti na moresane no’ a, monka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Ne ho hia Awurade.’ ”
32Asuafoɔ baanu a wɔkɔeɛ no kɔhunuu aboa no sɛ ɔsa hɔ sɛdeɛ Yesu kaeɛ no. 33Berɛ a wɔresane afunumu ba no no, ne wuranom bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti na moresane aboa no?”
34Wɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Ne ho hia Awurade.”
35Asuafoɔ no de afunumu ba no brɛɛ Yesu de wɔn ntoma sesɛɛ ne so maa ɔtenaa ne so. 36Yesu te afunumu ba no so rekɔ no, nnipa de wɔn ntoma sesɛɛ ɛkwan no so maa ɔfaa so. 37Ɔduruu Ngo Bepɔ no so baabi a wɔrebɛsiane akɔ Yerusalem no, nʼakyidifoɔ no nyinaa de osebɔ kamfoo Onyankopɔn, yii no ayɛ wɔ Yesu anwanwadeɛ ahodoɔ a wayɛ no ho sɛ, 38“Nhyira nka ɔhene a ɔreba Awurade din mu no! Asomdwoeɛ ne animuoayam nka Onyankopɔn wɔ ɔsorosoro dohoa!”
39Farisifoɔ no bi a na wɔfra nnipakuo no mu no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, kasa kyerɛ wʼakyidifoɔ no na wɔmmua wɔn ano!” 40Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ wɔmua wɔn ano koraa a, aboɔ mpo bɛkamfo me, ayi me ayɛ.”
Yesu Su Ma Yerusalem
41Yesu rebɛn Yerusalem a ɔhunuu kuro no no, ɔsu maa emu nnipa no sɛ, 42“Mo a anka asomdwoeɛ yɛ mo dea nanso moampɛ no, mobɛhwehwɛ asomdwoeɛ akyi kwan, nanso mo nsa renka da! 43Nna bi bɛba a mo atamfoɔ bɛba abɛtoa mo, aka mo ahyɛ, 44atɔre mo ne mo mma ase, asɛe mo kuro yi pasaa, ɛfiri sɛ, moapo adom a Onyankopɔn de adom mo no.”
Yesu Pamoo Adwadifoɔ Firii Asɔredan Mu
45Yesu duruu Yerusalem no, ɔkɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔpamoo nnipa a na wɔredi dwa wɔ hɔ no kaa sɛ, 46“Wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ‘Mʼasɔredan yɛ mpaebɔbea; nanso mode ayɛ akorɔmfoɔ ahyiaeɛ!’ ”
47Saa berɛ no nyinaa na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ, Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne ɔman no mu mpanimfoɔ rehwehwɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so anya no, akye no, aku no. 48Nanso, na wɔnhunu ɛkwan biara a wɔbɛfa so akye no, ɛfiri sɛ, berɛ nyinaa na nnipa akyere ne so retie no.Sakeo
Da bi a na Yesu retwam wɔ Yeriko no, ɔhunuu ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Sakeo. Na Sakeo yɛ togyeni panin sane yɛ osikani nso. Berɛ a Yesu retwam no, Sakeo pɛɛ sɛ anka ɔhu no, nanso ɛsiane sɛ na ɔyɛ onipa tiawa na wɔn a wɔdi Yesu akyi no dɔɔso nti, wanhu no. Ɛsiane sɛ na Sakeo nim sɛ Yesu bɛfa nnyedua bi a na ɛsisi hɔ no ase nti, ɔyɛɛ ntɛm kɔforoo saa nnyedua no mu baako.
Berɛ a Yesu duruu nnyedua no ase no, ɔmaa nʼani so hunuu no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Sakeo, yɛ ntɛm na si fam na wo fie na ɛnnɛ mɛtena.”
Sakeo yɛɛ ntɛm sii fam de anigyeɛ gyee no fɛ so.
Nnipa a wɔdi Yesu akyi no hunuu yei no, wɔnwiinwii kaa sɛ, “Ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ yi na wakɔ akɔsoɛ no.”
Berɛ a nnipa no renwiinwii no, Sakeo bɛgyinaa Yesu nkyɛn kaa sɛ, “Awurade, ɛnnɛ, mede mʼahodeɛ mu fa kyɛ ahiafoɔ, na sɛ masisi obi wɔ biribi mu a, mɛtua mmɔho nan ama no.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛnnɛ na nkwagyeɛ aba efie yi mu, ɛfiri sɛ, oyi nso yɛ Abraham ba. Na mebaeɛ sɛ merebɛhwehwɛ wɔn a wɔayera na magye wɔn nkwa.”
Adwumayɔ Ho Akontabuo
Berɛ a Yesu ne nnipa no rebɛn Yerusalem no, ɔsane buu wɔn bɛ foforɔ de kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn.
Ɔkaa sɛ, “Ɔdehyeɛ bi a watu kwan akɔ akyirikyiri asase bi so sane kɔɔ ne kurom kɔhunuu nʼabusua mu mpanimfoɔ sɛ wɔnsi no hene. Ansa na ɔrebɛfiri nʼakwantuo no ase no, ɔfrɛɛ nʼadwumayɔfoɔ mu du maa wɔn mu biara sidi ɔpedu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momfa sika yi nyɔ adwuma kɔsi sɛ mɛba.’ Kurom hɔfoɔ no tee nʼahennie no ho asɛm no, wɔtuu nnipa kɔhunuu mpanimfoɔ no sɛ wɔmpɛ no.
“Nanso, wɔsii no hene maa ɔsane kɔɔ baabi a na ɔyɔ adwuma no. Ɔduruiɛ no, ɔfrɛɛ nʼadwumayɔfoɔ du no sɛ, wɔmmɛbu sika a ɔde maa wɔn no ho nkonta nkyerɛ no.
“Odwumayɔfoɔ a ɔdii kan baeɛ no bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu no, mede ayɔ adwuma anya ho mmɔho du.’
“Owura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mo, akoa pa, ɛsiane sɛ woadi kakraa a mede hyɛɛ wo nsa no ho nokorɛ nti, mede nkuro du bɛhyɛ wʼase na woadi so.’
“Odwumayɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no baeɛ bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu no, mede ayɔ adwuma anya ho mmɔho num.’
“Owura no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Mede nkuro num bɛhyɛ wʼase na woadi so.’
“Ɔfoforɔ nso bɛkaa sɛ, ‘Me wura wo sika sidi ɔpedu a wode maa me no, mede sieeɛ, ɛni. Na mesuro sɛ mfasoɔ a mɛnya no, wobɛsisi me agye, ɛfiri sɛ, wo tirim yɛ den. Nea ɛnyɛ wo de, wugye; deɛ wunnuae nso, wutwa’. Ne wura no buaa no se, ‘Akoa bɔne, wo anom asɛm so na megyina abu wo atɛn. Wunim sɛ me tirim yɛ den. Deɛ ɛnyɛ me dea no megye; deɛ mennuaeɛ no, metwa. Adɛn nti na woamfa me sika no ankɔto sikakorabea? Anka mebaeɛ yi mɛnya ho nsiho.’
“Ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasomfoɔ a na wɔgyina hɔ no sɛ ‘Monnye sika no mfiri ne nsam mfa mma deɛ ɔde ne deɛ yɔɔ adwuma nyaa mmɔho du no.’
“Asomfoɔ no kaa sɛ, ‘Yɛn wura, sɛ oyi deɛ ɔwɔ sika pii!’ Owura no kaa sɛ, ‘Deɛ moreka no yɛ nokorɛ. Nanso, merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ bebree no, wɔbɛma no bi aka ho, na deɛ ɔwɔ kakraa bi no, deɛ ɔwɔ mpo no, wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam. Na afei, momfa mʼatamfo a anka wɔmpɛ sɛ medi adeɛ no mmra mʼanim ha na monkum wɔn!’ ”
Yesu Kɔ Yerusalem
Yesu kaa nsɛm yi wieɛɛ no, ɔdii nʼasuafoɔ no kan kɔɔ Yerusalem. Ɔrebɛn Belfage ne Betania a ɛbɛn Ngo Bepɔ no no, ɔsomaa nʼasuafoɔ no mu baanu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monkɔ akuraa a ɛbɛn ha no ase na moduru hɔ a, mobɛhunu afunumu ba bi a obiara ntenaa ne so da sɛ wɔasa no. Monsane no mfa no mmrɛ me! Sɛ obi bisa sɛ, ‘Adɛn nti na moresane no’ a, monka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Ne ho hia Awurade.’ ”
Asuafoɔ baanu a wɔkɔeɛ no kɔhunuu aboa no sɛ ɔsa hɔ sɛdeɛ Yesu kaeɛ no. Berɛ a wɔresane afunumu ba no no, ne wuranom bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti na moresane aboa no?”
Wɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Ne ho hia Awurade.”
Asuafoɔ no de afunumu ba no brɛɛ Yesu de wɔn ntoma sesɛɛ ne so maa ɔtenaa ne so. Yesu te afunumu ba no so rekɔ no, nnipa de wɔn ntoma sesɛɛ ɛkwan no so maa ɔfaa so. Ɔduruu Ngo Bepɔ no so baabi a wɔrebɛsiane akɔ Yerusalem no, nʼakyidifoɔ no nyinaa de osebɔ kamfoo Onyankopɔn, yii no ayɛ wɔ Yesu anwanwadeɛ ahodoɔ a wayɛ no ho sɛ, “Nhyira nka ɔhene a ɔreba Awurade din mu no! Asomdwoeɛ ne animuoayam nka Onyankopɔn wɔ ɔsorosoro dohoa!”
Farisifoɔ no bi a na wɔfra nnipakuo no mu no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, kasa kyerɛ wʼakyidifoɔ no na wɔmmua wɔn ano!” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ wɔmua wɔn ano koraa a, aboɔ mpo bɛkamfo me, ayi me ayɛ.”
Yesu Su Ma Yerusalem
Yesu rebɛn Yerusalem a ɔhunuu kuro no no, ɔsu maa emu nnipa no sɛ, “Mo a anka asomdwoeɛ yɛ mo dea nanso moampɛ no, mobɛhwehwɛ asomdwoeɛ akyi kwan, nanso mo nsa renka da! Nna bi bɛba a mo atamfoɔ bɛba abɛtoa mo, aka mo ahyɛ, atɔre mo ne mo mma ase, asɛe mo kuro yi pasaa, ɛfiri sɛ, moapo adom a Onyankopɔn de adom mo no.”
Yesu Pamoo Adwadifoɔ Firii Asɔredan Mu
Yesu duruu Yerusalem no, ɔkɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔpamoo nnipa a na wɔredi dwa wɔ hɔ no kaa sɛ, “Wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ‘Mʼasɔredan yɛ mpaebɔbea; nanso mode ayɛ akorɔmfoɔ ahyiaeɛ!’ ”
Saa berɛ no nyinaa na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ, Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne ɔman no mu mpanimfoɔ rehwehwɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so anya no, akye no, aku no. Nanso, na wɔnhunu ɛkwan biara a wɔbɛfa so akye no, ɛfiri sɛ, berɛ nyinaa na nnipa akyere ne so retie no.
Luka 20Yesu Tumi Ho Nsɛmmisa
1Da bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔredan mu no, asɔfoɔ mpanin, Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne ɔman no mu mpanin kɔbisaa no sɛ, 2“Tumi bɛn na wowɔ a wode yɛ saa nnoɔma yi; na hwan nso na ɔmaa wo saa tumi no?” 3Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Me nso mewɔ asɛm bi bisa mo. Monka nkyerɛ me. 4Tumi bɛn na Yohane de bɔɔ asu; ɛfiri Onyankopɔn anaa ɛfiri nnipa?”
5Wɔfaa ho adwene kaa sɛ, “Sɛ yɛka sɛ, ɛfiri Onyankopɔn a, ɔbɛbisa yɛn sɛ, ‘ɛnneɛ, adɛn nti na moannye no anni?’ 6Sɛ nso yɛka sɛ, ɛfiri onipa a, ɔman mu no nyinaa bɛsi yɛn aboɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔnim sɛ Yohane yɛ odiyifoɔ.” 7Ɛwiee aseɛ no, wɔbuaeɛ sɛ, “Yɛnnim.”
8Yesu nso ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ me nso meremma mo mo asɛmmisa no ho mmuaeɛ.”
Apaafoɔ Bi
9Yesu buu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, “Ɔbarima bi yɔɔ bobefuo de hyɛɛ apaafoɔ bi nsa sɛ wɔnhwɛ so mma no. Yei akyi ɔtuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri baabi, kɔtenaa hɔ kyɛree. 10Bobeteɛ berɛ duruiɛ no, ɔbarima yi somaa ne somfoɔ sɛ ɔnkɔgye aduaba no bi mmrɛ no. Nanso, apaafoɔ no boroo no, maa ɔsane kɔɔ nsapan. 11Ɔsomaa ɔsomfoɔ foforɔ maa ɔno nso wɔboroo no, bɔɔ no adapaa, maa ɔkɔɔ nsapan. 12Ɔsane somaa ɔsomfoɔ foforɔ na ɔno mpo deɛ, wɔpirapiraa no pamoo no.
13“Yei maa bobefuo wura no kaa sɛ, ‘Ɛdeɛn na menyɔ bio? Mɛsoma me ba a medɔ no no akɔ wɔn nkyɛn na ɔno deɛ ebia, wɔbɛfɛre no.’
14“Nanso, berɛ a apaafoɔ no hunuu no no, wɔkaa sɛ, ‘Ɔdedifoɔ no ni, momma yɛnku no na yɛmfa nʼagyapadeɛ no.’ 15Wɔtwee no firii afuo no mu kɔkum no. Mogye di sɛ ɛdeɛn na afuowura no bɛyɛ saa apaafoɔ yi? 16Ɔbɛba abɛkum saa apaafoɔ yi na ɔde afuo no ama afoforɔ.” Nnipa a wɔretie Yesu no kaa sɛ, “Ɛmpare yɛn!”
17Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn dinn bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ na deɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ‘Ɛboɔ a adansifoɔ apo no, ɛno ara na abɛyɛ tweatiboɔ’ no aseɛ ne sɛn? 18Obiara a ɔbɛhwe ɛboɔ no so no, ɔbɛbubu na deɛ ɛboɔ no bɛhwe ne so no, ɛbɛpɛkyɛ no.” 19Ɛsiane sɛ Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanin no hunuu sɛ Yesu buu bɛ no tiaa wɔn nti, wɔhwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so akye no saa berɛ no ara mu, nanso ɛsiane nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti, na wɔsuro.
Ɛtogyeɛ Ho Asɛmmisa
20Ɛsiane sɛ ɔpɛ ara na na nnipa no pɛ sɛ wɔkyere Yesu nti, wɔtetɛɛ no maa nnipa bi kɔɔ ne nkyɛn sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a wɔbɛnya nʼanom asɛm bi agyina so akye no na wɔde no akɔ aban mu. 21Saa nnipa yi bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yenim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ, wonyɛ nyiyimu na wokyerɛ nokorɛ kwan a wɔnam so kɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn. 22Enti, ɛyɛ sɛ yɛtua toɔ ma Kaesare aban anaasɛ ɛnyɛ?”
23Yesu hunuu wɔn adwemmɔne no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, 24“Momma me sika. Hwan mfoni ne din na ɛwɔ so yi?” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Ɛyɛ Kaesare dea.”
25Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare na momfa Onyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn.” 26Yesu mmuaeɛ a ɔmaa wɔn no yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa na wɔn adwemmɔne no nso kaa wɔn tirim.
Owusɔreɛ Ho Asɛmmisa
27Sadukifoɔ bi a wɔnnye owusɔreɛ nni baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, 28“Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, Mose mmara no kyerɛ yɛn sɛ, sɛ ɔbarima bi wɔ yere na ɔne no anwo na ɔwu a, ne nua tumi ware no ne no wo mma ma owufoɔ no. 29Anuanom baason bi tenaa ase. Ɔpanin a ɔwɔ mu no waree ɔbaa a ɔne no anwo na owuiɛ. 30Ne nua a ɔdi nʼakyi no, waree no nanso ɔne no anwo na ɔwuiɛ. 31Anuanom a wɔaka no nyinaa nso waree no a obiara ne no anwo na wɔwuwuiɛ. 32Akyire yi ɔbaa no nso wuiɛ. 33Yɛn asɛmmisa ne sɛ, ɛsiane sɛ ɔbaa yi waree anuanom yi nyinaa nti, owusɔreɛ da no, wɔn mu hwan na ɔbaa yi bɛyɛ ne yere?”
34Yesu buaa sɛ, “Asase yi so na nnipa dwene awadeɛ ho. 35Na wɔn a owusɔreɛ da no wɔbɛnya kwan akɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu deɛ, awadeɛ ho renhia wɔn. 36Na owuo nso nni hɔ mma wɔn bio, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ ɔsoro abɔfo. Ɛsiane sɛ wɔasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu no nti, wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn mma.
37“Afei, mo asɛmmisa a ɛfa owusɔreɛ ho no nso, Mose maa yɛhunuu no pefee sɛ, owusɔreɛ wɔ hɔ. Ɛfiri sɛ, nʼasɛm a ɔtwerɛ faa wura a na ɛredɛre no ho no ɔbɔɔ Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn din. 38Yei kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn yɛ ateasefoɔ Nyankopɔn na ɔnyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ, obiara a ɔde ne ho to Onyankopɔn so no, sɛ ɔwu mpo a, ɔbɛnya nkwa a enni awieiɛ.”
39Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no mu bi kaa sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, woabua no yie.”
40Na obiara antumi ammisa no asɛm biara bio.
Hwan Ba Ne Kristo No?
41Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti na wɔka sɛ Kristo no yɛ Dawid ba?” 42Ɛfiri sɛ Dawid ka wɔ ne Nnwom no mu sɛ, “Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me wura sɛ. ‘Tena me nifa so 43kɔsi sɛ mɛma woadi wʼatamfoɔ so nkonim.’ 44Sɛ Dawid frɛ Kristo no ‘Me wura’ a, ɛyɛ dɛn na Kristo no ayɛ ne ba ne ne Nyankopɔn?”
Atwerɛsɛm No Akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ No Suban
45Berɛ a nnipa no retie no no, Yesu danee nʼani ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, 46“Monhwɛ mo ho so yie wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no ho. Berɛ biara wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ ntade pa, hwehwɛ sɛ nnipa hu wɔn badwa mu a, wɔde obuo kyea wɔn, na sɛ wɔkɔ asɔredan mu nso a, wɔtena mpanin tenabea. Saa ara nso na sɛ wɔkɔ apontoɔ ase a, wɔtena mpanin tenabea. 47Wɔbɔ mpaeɛ atenten ma nnipa hunu sɛ wɔresom Onyankopɔn, nanso wɔsisi akunafoɔ. Yei nti wɔbɛnya asotwe a ɛmu yɛ duro.”Yesu Tumi Ho Nsɛmmisa
Da bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔredan mu no, asɔfoɔ mpanin, Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne ɔman no mu mpanin kɔbisaa no sɛ, “Tumi bɛn na wowɔ a wode yɛ saa nnoɔma yi; na hwan nso na ɔmaa wo saa tumi no?” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Me nso mewɔ asɛm bi bisa mo. Monka nkyerɛ me. Tumi bɛn na Yohane de bɔɔ asu; ɛfiri Onyankopɔn anaa ɛfiri nnipa?”
Wɔfaa ho adwene kaa sɛ, “Sɛ yɛka sɛ, ɛfiri Onyankopɔn a, ɔbɛbisa yɛn sɛ, ‘ɛnneɛ, adɛn nti na moannye no anni?’ Sɛ nso yɛka sɛ, ɛfiri onipa a, ɔman mu no nyinaa bɛsi yɛn aboɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔnim sɛ Yohane yɛ odiyifoɔ.” Ɛwiee aseɛ no, wɔbuaeɛ sɛ, “Yɛnnim.”
Yesu nso ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ me nso meremma mo mo asɛmmisa no ho mmuaeɛ.”
Apaafoɔ Bi
Yesu buu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, “Ɔbarima bi yɔɔ bobefuo de hyɛɛ apaafoɔ bi nsa sɛ wɔnhwɛ so mma no. Yei akyi ɔtuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri baabi, kɔtenaa hɔ kyɛree. Bobeteɛ berɛ duruiɛ no, ɔbarima yi somaa ne somfoɔ sɛ ɔnkɔgye aduaba no bi mmrɛ no. Nanso, apaafoɔ no boroo no, maa ɔsane kɔɔ nsapan. Ɔsomaa ɔsomfoɔ foforɔ maa ɔno nso wɔboroo no, bɔɔ no adapaa, maa ɔkɔɔ nsapan. Ɔsane somaa ɔsomfoɔ foforɔ na ɔno mpo deɛ, wɔpirapiraa no pamoo no.
“Yei maa bobefuo wura no kaa sɛ, ‘Ɛdeɛn na menyɔ bio? Mɛsoma me ba a medɔ no no akɔ wɔn nkyɛn na ɔno deɛ ebia, wɔbɛfɛre no.’
“Nanso, berɛ a apaafoɔ no hunuu no no, wɔkaa sɛ, ‘Ɔdedifoɔ no ni, momma yɛnku no na yɛmfa nʼagyapadeɛ no.’ Wɔtwee no firii afuo no mu kɔkum no. Mogye di sɛ ɛdeɛn na afuowura no bɛyɛ saa apaafoɔ yi? Ɔbɛba abɛkum saa apaafoɔ yi na ɔde afuo no ama afoforɔ.” Nnipa a wɔretie Yesu no kaa sɛ, “Ɛmpare yɛn!”
Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn dinn bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ na deɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ‘Ɛboɔ a adansifoɔ apo no, ɛno ara na abɛyɛ tweatiboɔ’ no aseɛ ne sɛn? Obiara a ɔbɛhwe ɛboɔ no so no, ɔbɛbubu na deɛ ɛboɔ no bɛhwe ne so no, ɛbɛpɛkyɛ no.” Ɛsiane sɛ Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanin no hunuu sɛ Yesu buu bɛ no tiaa wɔn nti, wɔhwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so akye no saa berɛ no ara mu, nanso ɛsiane nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti, na wɔsuro.
Ɛtogyeɛ Ho Asɛmmisa
Ɛsiane sɛ ɔpɛ ara na na nnipa no pɛ sɛ wɔkyere Yesu nti, wɔtetɛɛ no maa nnipa bi kɔɔ ne nkyɛn sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a wɔbɛnya nʼanom asɛm bi agyina so akye no na wɔde no akɔ aban mu. Saa nnipa yi bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yenim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ, wonyɛ nyiyimu na wokyerɛ nokorɛ kwan a wɔnam so kɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn. Enti, ɛyɛ sɛ yɛtua toɔ ma Kaesare aban anaasɛ ɛnyɛ?”
Yesu hunuu wɔn adwemmɔne no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Momma me sika. Hwan mfoni ne din na ɛwɔ so yi?” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Ɛyɛ Kaesare dea.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare na momfa Onyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn.” Yesu mmuaeɛ a ɔmaa wɔn no yɛɛ wɔn nwanwa na wɔn adwemmɔne no nso kaa wɔn tirim.
Owusɔreɛ Ho Asɛmmisa
Sadukifoɔ bi a wɔnnye owusɔreɛ nni baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, Mose mmara no kyerɛ yɛn sɛ, sɛ ɔbarima bi wɔ yere na ɔne no anwo na ɔwu a, ne nua tumi ware no ne no wo mma ma owufoɔ no. Anuanom baason bi tenaa ase. Ɔpanin a ɔwɔ mu no waree ɔbaa a ɔne no anwo na owuiɛ. Ne nua a ɔdi nʼakyi no, waree no nanso ɔne no anwo na ɔwuiɛ. Anuanom a wɔaka no nyinaa nso waree no a obiara ne no anwo na wɔwuwuiɛ. Akyire yi ɔbaa no nso wuiɛ. Yɛn asɛmmisa ne sɛ, ɛsiane sɛ ɔbaa yi waree anuanom yi nyinaa nti, owusɔreɛ da no, wɔn mu hwan na ɔbaa yi bɛyɛ ne yere?”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Asase yi so na nnipa dwene awadeɛ ho. Na wɔn a owusɔreɛ da no wɔbɛnya kwan akɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no mu deɛ, awadeɛ ho renhia wɔn. Na owuo nso nni hɔ mma wɔn bio, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ ɔsoro abɔfo. Ɛsiane sɛ wɔasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu no nti, wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn mma.
“Afei, mo asɛmmisa a ɛfa owusɔreɛ ho no nso, Mose maa yɛhunuu no pefee sɛ, owusɔreɛ wɔ hɔ. Ɛfiri sɛ, nʼasɛm a ɔtwerɛ faa wura a na ɛredɛre no ho no ɔbɔɔ Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn din. Yei kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn yɛ ateasefoɔ Nyankopɔn na ɔnyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ, obiara a ɔde ne ho to Onyankopɔn so no, sɛ ɔwu mpo a, ɔbɛnya nkwa a enni awieiɛ.”
Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no mu bi kaa sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, woabua no yie.”
Na obiara antumi ammisa no asɛm biara bio.
Hwan Ba Ne Kristo No?
Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti na wɔka sɛ Kristo no yɛ Dawid ba?” Ɛfiri sɛ Dawid ka wɔ ne Nnwom no mu sɛ, “Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me wura sɛ. ‘Tena me nifa so kɔsi sɛ mɛma woadi wʼatamfoɔ so nkonim.’ Sɛ Dawid frɛ Kristo no ‘Me wura’ a, ɛyɛ dɛn na Kristo no ayɛ ne ba ne ne Nyankopɔn?”
Atwerɛsɛm No Akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ No Suban
Berɛ a nnipa no retie no no, Yesu danee nʼani ka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yie wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no ho. Berɛ biara wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ ntade pa, hwehwɛ sɛ nnipa hu wɔn badwa mu a, wɔde obuo kyea wɔn, na sɛ wɔkɔ asɔredan mu nso a, wɔtena mpanin tenabea. Saa ara nso na sɛ wɔkɔ apontoɔ ase a, wɔtena mpanin tenabea. Wɔbɔ mpaeɛ atenten ma nnipa hunu sɛ wɔresom Onyankopɔn, nanso wɔsisi akunafoɔ. Yei nti wɔbɛnya asotwe a ɛmu yɛ duro.”
Luka 21Okunafoɔ Bi Afɔrebɔ
1Yesu te asɔredan mu hɔ no, ɔhunuu asikafoɔ bi a wɔde wɔn afɔrebɔdeɛ akɛseakɛse regu afɔdeɛ adaka no mu. 2Ɔhunuu okunafoɔ hiani bi nso sɛ ɔde sika kakraa bi too afɔdeɛ adaka no mu. 3Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ asɔredan mu hɔ no sɛ, “Nokorɛ mu, afɔdeɛ a okunafo hiani yi bɛbɔeɛ no som bo sene afɔdeɛ akɛseakɛse a asikafoɔ no bɛbɔeɛ no nyinaa 4Wɔn nyinaa de deɛ wɔanya ama aboro so no bi na ɛbɛbɔɔ afɔdeɛ, na oyi deɛ, ɔfiri ne hia mu de ne sika a ɔwɔ nyinaa na abɛgu mu yi.”
Asɔredansɛeɛ Ho Nkɔmhyɛ
5Yesu akyidifoɔ no bi kamfoo aboɔ fɛɛfɛ a wɔde sii asɔredan no ne adwinnie ahodoɔ a wɔadi agu ɛdan no ho no. Nanso, Yesu kaa sɛ, 6“Berɛ bi bɛba a, wɔbɛdwiri nnoɔma a morekamfo yi nyinaa agu a hwee renka.”
Nsɛm A Ɛbɛsisi Ansa Na Awieeɛ Abɛn
7Wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, berɛ bɛn na asɛm a woreka yi bɛsi, na ɛho nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛyɛ sɛn?”
8Yesu buaa sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yie na obi annaadaa mo, ɛfiri sɛ, nnipa pii bɛsɔre aka sɛ, ‘Mene Kristo no’ na berɛ no abɛn, nanso monnnye wɔn nnni! 9Sɛ mote akokoakoko ne sɛ wɔsɔre tia aman a, monnsuro ɛfiri sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ saa nnoɔma yi di kan ba nanso na ɛnkyerɛ sɛ awieeɛ no abɛn.”
10Ɔkaa bio sɛ, “Aman bɛsɔre aman so na ahennie asɔre ahennie so. 11Asasewosoɔ a ɛyɛ hu bɛba, ɔkɔm bɛba na nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu bɛfiri wiem asisi.
12“Nanso, ansa na yeinom nyinaa bɛsisi no, me din nti, wɔbɛtaa mo akyekye mo, de mo akɔ hyiadan mu ne afiase ne ahemfo ne atumfoɔ anim. 13Yei bɛma moanya kwan adi me ho adanseɛ. 14Nanso, monnnwene nsɛm a mobɛka de ayi mo ho ano no ho; 15Ɛfiri sɛ, mɛma mo nsɛm ne nyansa a mode bɛyi mo ho ano a mo atamfoɔ rentumi nnyina mo anim.
16“Mo awofoɔ, mo nuanom, mo abusuafoɔ ne mo nnamfonom bɛyi mo ama na wɔbɛkum mo mu bi, 17Na me nti, nnipa bɛtan mo. 18Nanso, mo tirinwi baako pɛ mpo renyera. 19Na sɛ motumi gyina pintinn a, mobɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ.”
Yerusalem sɛeɛ
20“Sɛ mohunu sɛ asraafoɔ atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ ne sɛeɛ abɛn. 21Saa berɛ no wɔn a wɔte Yudea nnwane nkɔ mmepɔ no so; wɔn a wɔwɔ kuro no mu no nnwane mfiri mu, na wɔn nso a wɔwɔ nkuraase ne mfuom no ntena hɔ ara. 22Saa berɛ yi mu na Onyankopɔn asotwe a adiyifoɔ no hyɛɛ ho nkɔm wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no mu no bɛba mu. 23Wɔn a wɔafa afuro ne wɔn a wɔma mma nufuɔ no nnue. Amanehunu a ɛnni kabea bɛba ɔman no so na Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ nso aba nnipa no so. 24Ebinom bɛtotɔ wɔ sekan ano na wɔafa ebinom nso nnomum de wɔn akɔ amanaman so na amanaman bɛsɛe Yerusalem, adi so akɔsi berɛ a Onyankopɔn ahyehyɛ sɛ amanaman nni wɔn so no bɛtwam.”
Onipa Ba No Ba a Ɔbɛsan Aba
25“Nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛba owia, ɔsrane ne nsoromma mu na ɛpo asorɔkye bɛbobom, aworo so ama ne nnyegyeɛ denden no de ahoyera aba aman nyinaa so. 26Ɛsiane nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu a ɛbɛba asase so no nti, nnipa pii bɛtotɔ bera na abɔdeɛ a ɛwɔ wiem nso awoso ahoɔden so. 27Saa berɛ no na wɔbɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔde tumi ne animuonyam a ɛso nam omununkum mu reba. 28Sɛ saa asɛm yi firi aseɛ sisi a, momfa gyidie nnyina pintinn, ɛfiri sɛ, na mo nkwagyeberɛ abɛn.”
Akutuo Dua Bi Ho Bɛ
29Yesu buu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, “Monhwɛ nnuaba ne nnua afoforɔ bi, 30sɛ ɛyiyi nhaban foforɔ a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ osutɔberɛ adu. 31Saa ara nso na sɛ mohunu nsɛnkyerɛnne a moreka ho asɛm yi a, monhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn.
32“Merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, saa nsɛm yi nyinaa bɛba mu ansa na saa berɛ yi sofoɔ awuwu. 33Ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam, nanso me nsɛm deɛ, ɛrentwam da.
34“Monhwɛ mo ho so yie! Mommma adiditrasoɔ ne asaboro ne asetena mu dadwene nni mo so, anyɛ saa a, me ba a mɛba bio no bɛfiri mo aworaw. 35Ɛfiri sɛ, me ba a mɛba no bɛfiri nnipa a wɔte asase so nyinaa aworaw. 36Monwɛn. Berɛ biara mommɔ mpaeɛ na moanya ahoɔden de agyina saa nnoɔma yi nyinaa ano na mesane ba bio a, moatumi agyina mʼanim.”
37Da biara na Yesu kɔ asɔredan mu hɔ kɔkyerɛkyerɛ ma nnipa pii sɔre anɔpahema kɔtie no. 38Na sɛ ɛduru anwummerɛ biara a, Yesu kɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so kɔhome.Okunafoɔ Bi Afɔrebɔ
Yesu te asɔredan mu hɔ no, ɔhunuu asikafoɔ bi a wɔde wɔn afɔrebɔdeɛ akɛseakɛse regu afɔdeɛ adaka no mu. Ɔhunuu okunafoɔ hiani bi nso sɛ ɔde sika kakraa bi too afɔdeɛ adaka no mu. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ asɔredan mu hɔ no sɛ, “Nokorɛ mu, afɔdeɛ a okunafo hiani yi bɛbɔeɛ no som bo sene afɔdeɛ akɛseakɛse a asikafoɔ no bɛbɔeɛ no nyinaa Wɔn nyinaa de deɛ wɔanya ama aboro so no bi na ɛbɛbɔɔ afɔdeɛ, na oyi deɛ, ɔfiri ne hia mu de ne sika a ɔwɔ nyinaa na abɛgu mu yi.”
Asɔredansɛeɛ Ho Nkɔmhyɛ
Yesu akyidifoɔ no bi kamfoo aboɔ fɛɛfɛ a wɔde sii asɔredan no ne adwinnie ahodoɔ a wɔadi agu ɛdan no ho no. Nanso, Yesu kaa sɛ, “Berɛ bi bɛba a, wɔbɛdwiri nnoɔma a morekamfo yi nyinaa agu a hwee renka.”
Nsɛm A Ɛbɛsisi Ansa Na Awieeɛ Abɛn
Wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, berɛ bɛn na asɛm a woreka yi bɛsi, na ɛho nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛyɛ sɛn?”
Yesu buaa sɛ, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yie na obi annaadaa mo, ɛfiri sɛ, nnipa pii bɛsɔre aka sɛ, ‘Mene Kristo no’ na berɛ no abɛn, nanso monnnye wɔn nnni! Sɛ mote akokoakoko ne sɛ wɔsɔre tia aman a, monnsuro ɛfiri sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ saa nnoɔma yi di kan ba nanso na ɛnkyerɛ sɛ awieeɛ no abɛn.”
Ɔkaa bio sɛ, “Aman bɛsɔre aman so na ahennie asɔre ahennie so. Asasewosoɔ a ɛyɛ hu bɛba, ɔkɔm bɛba na nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu bɛfiri wiem asisi.
“Nanso, ansa na yeinom nyinaa bɛsisi no, me din nti, wɔbɛtaa mo akyekye mo, de mo akɔ hyiadan mu ne afiase ne ahemfo ne atumfoɔ anim. Yei bɛma moanya kwan adi me ho adanseɛ. Nanso, monnnwene nsɛm a mobɛka de ayi mo ho ano no ho; Ɛfiri sɛ, mɛma mo nsɛm ne nyansa a mode bɛyi mo ho ano a mo atamfoɔ rentumi nnyina mo anim.
“Mo awofoɔ, mo nuanom, mo abusuafoɔ ne mo nnamfonom bɛyi mo ama na wɔbɛkum mo mu bi, Na me nti, nnipa bɛtan mo. Nanso, mo tirinwi baako pɛ mpo renyera. Na sɛ motumi gyina pintinn a, mobɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ.”
Yerusalem sɛeɛ
“Sɛ mohunu sɛ asraafoɔ atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ ne sɛeɛ abɛn. Saa berɛ no wɔn a wɔte Yudea nnwane nkɔ mmepɔ no so; wɔn a wɔwɔ kuro no mu no nnwane mfiri mu, na wɔn nso a wɔwɔ nkuraase ne mfuom no ntena hɔ ara. Saa berɛ yi mu na Onyankopɔn asotwe a adiyifoɔ no hyɛɛ ho nkɔm wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no mu no bɛba mu. Wɔn a wɔafa afuro ne wɔn a wɔma mma nufuɔ no nnue. Amanehunu a ɛnni kabea bɛba ɔman no so na Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ nso aba nnipa no so. Ebinom bɛtotɔ wɔ sekan ano na wɔafa ebinom nso nnomum de wɔn akɔ amanaman so na amanaman bɛsɛe Yerusalem, adi so akɔsi berɛ a Onyankopɔn ahyehyɛ sɛ amanaman nni wɔn so no bɛtwam.”
Onipa Ba No Ba a Ɔbɛsan Aba
“Nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛba owia, ɔsrane ne nsoromma mu na ɛpo asorɔkye bɛbobom, aworo so ama ne nnyegyeɛ denden no de ahoyera aba aman nyinaa so. Ɛsiane nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu a ɛbɛba asase so no nti, nnipa pii bɛtotɔ bera na abɔdeɛ a ɛwɔ wiem nso awoso ahoɔden so. Saa berɛ no na wɔbɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔde tumi ne animuonyam a ɛso nam omununkum mu reba. Sɛ saa asɛm yi firi aseɛ sisi a, momfa gyidie nnyina pintinn, ɛfiri sɛ, na mo nkwagyeberɛ abɛn.”
Akutuo Dua Bi Ho Bɛ
Yesu buu wɔn bɛ bi sɛ, “Monhwɛ nnuaba ne nnua afoforɔ bi, sɛ ɛyiyi nhaban foforɔ a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ osutɔberɛ adu. Saa ara nso na sɛ mohunu nsɛnkyerɛnne a moreka ho asɛm yi a, monhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no abɛn.
“Merema mo ate aseɛ sɛ, saa nsɛm yi nyinaa bɛba mu ansa na saa berɛ yi sofoɔ awuwu. Ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwam, nanso me nsɛm deɛ, ɛrentwam da.
“Monhwɛ mo ho so yie! Mommma adiditrasoɔ ne asaboro ne asetena mu dadwene nni mo so, anyɛ saa a, me ba a mɛba bio no bɛfiri mo aworaw. Ɛfiri sɛ, me ba a mɛba no bɛfiri nnipa a wɔte asase so nyinaa aworaw. Monwɛn. Berɛ biara mommɔ mpaeɛ na moanya ahoɔden de agyina saa nnoɔma yi nyinaa ano na mesane ba bio a, moatumi agyina mʼanim.”
Da biara na Yesu kɔ asɔredan mu hɔ kɔkyerɛkyerɛ ma nnipa pii sɔre anɔpahema kɔtie no. Na sɛ ɛduru anwummerɛ biara a, Yesu kɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so kɔhome.
Luka 22Yesu Ho Pɔbɔ
1Afei, na Yudafoɔ afahyɛ a wɔdi brodo a mmɔka mfra mu a wɔfrɛ no Twam Afahyɛ no abɛn. 2Saa berɛ no na asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so akye Yesu, aku no, nanso ɛsiane nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti, na wɔsuro.
3Satan kɔwuraa Yuda a wɔfrɛ no Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako no mu. 4Yuda kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Asɔredan no mu awɛmfoɔ mpanin nkyɛn ne wɔn kɔsusuu ɛkwan ko a ɔbɛfa so ayi Yesu ama wɔn no ho. 5Wɔn ani gyeeeɛ, penee so sɛ wɔbɛma no sika. 6Ɛfiri saa berɛ no, Yuda hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a ɔbɛfa so ama wɔakyere Yesu berɛ a, nnipa dodoɔ biara nni ne ho.
Twam Afahyɛ Ho Ahosiesie
7Afei, da a wɔkum twam dwan de di brodo a mmɔka nni mu no duruiɛ no, 8Yesu somaa Petro ne Yohane sɛ, “Monkɔyɛ Twam Afahyɛ aduane a yɛbɛdi no.”
9Wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔyɛ aduane no?”
10Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ moduru kuro no mu a, mobɛhunu obi a wakɔ asuo reba. Monni nʼakyi nkɔ efie a ɔbɛkɔ mu no mu 11na mommisa efiewura no sɛ, ‘Yɛn kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ se ɛhe na woasiesie ama ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ wɔmmɛdi Twam Afahyɛ aduane no?’ 12Ɔde mo bɛkɔ abansoro asa kɛseɛ bi a wɔasiesie mu fɛfɛɛfɛ so. Ɛhɔ na monkɔto pono no.”
13Wɔkɔɔ kuro no mu no, wɔhunuu sɛdeɛ Yesu kaeɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛ maa wɔyɛɛ twam aduane no wɔ hɔ.
Adidi A Ɛtwa Toɔ
14Berɛ no duruiɛ no, Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ no kɔtenatenaa adidipono no ho.
15Wɔtete hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mepɛɛ sɛ me ne mo bɛtena ase, ato nsa adi saa Twam aduane yi, ansa na mahunu amane no akyɛ. 16Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, saa adidie yi akyi no, merenni Twam aduane yi bio kɔsi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no bɛba.”
17Afei Yesu faa kuruwa, daa Onyankopɔn ase na ɔde maa nʼasuafoɔ no kaa sɛ, “Monnye na obiara nnom bi. 18Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, merennom bobesa yi bi bio kɔsi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no bɛba.”
19Afei, ɔfaa brodo daa Onyankopɔn ase, bubuu mu de maa nʼasuafoɔ no kaa sɛ, “Yei ne me nipadua a mede rema mo. Monnye nni. Da biara a mobɛdi saa brodo yi bi no, momfa nkae me.”
20Saa ara nso na adidie no akyi no, ɔfaa kuruwa kaa sɛ, “Kuruwa yi ne me mogya a merehwie agu ama mo sɛ apam foforɔ a wɔnam so bɛgye mo nkwa. 21Nanso, mo a mo ne me te adidiiɛ ha yi mu baako na ɔbeyi me ama. 22Ɛtwa sɛ mewu, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn ahyehyɛ no, nanso deɛ ɔbɛyi me ama no deɛ, ɔnnue.”
23Asuafoɔ no bisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho, pɛɛ sɛ wɔhunu wɔn mu deɛ ɔbɛyi no ama no.
Yesu Kasa Tia Ahomasoɔ
24Asuafoɔ no gyee wɔn ho akyinnyeɛ pɛɛ sɛ wɔhunu wɔn mu deɛ ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie a ɛbɛba no mu.
25Yesu teeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Wiase deɛ, atumfoɔ hyɛ wɔn a wɔdi wɔn so no so ma wɔn nso a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no nso bu wɔn sɛ wɔn ‘adɛɛfoɔ.’ 26Nanso, mo deɛ, deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ mo so panin no nyɛ sɛ mo mu akumaa na deɛ ɔdi mo so no nso nyɛ mo mu somfoɔ. 27Merebisa mo sɛ, nnipa baanu yi mu hwan na ɔdi ne yɔnko so, deɛ ɔte adidipono ho anaa deɛ ɔsom deɛ ɔte adidipono no ho no? Nanso, me deɛ, mewɔ mo mu sɛ mo somfoɔ. 28Me ne mo na afa ɔhaw ne amaneɛ mu a, moda so ne me nam. 29Mʼagya de Ahennie no ama me. Saa ara nso na mede rema mo. 30Na mo ne me ato nsa adidi, na moatumi abu Israel mmusuakuo dumienu no atɛn.”
Pa A Wɔpa Yesu
31Afei, Awurade kaa sɛ, “Simon, Simon! Monhwɛ yie na ɔbonsam pɛ sɛ ɔsɔ mo hwɛ. 32Nanso, wo Simon deɛ, masrɛ ama wo, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, wobɛkɔ so agye me adi. Sɛ wonu wo ho sane ba me nkyɛn a, hyɛ wo nuanom no gyidie mu den.”
33Petro buaa no sɛ, “Awurade, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ me ne wo bɛda afiase na sɛ ɛyɛ owu mpo nso a, me ne wo bɛwu.”
34Yesu nso buaa no sɛ, “Petro, mereka akyerɛ wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa.”
35Afei, Yesu bisaa nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Berɛ a mesomaa mo a na monkuta sikabɔtɔ anaa akwantubɔtɔ na monhyɛ mpaboa no, biribi ho hiaa mo anaa?” Asuafoɔ no buaa no sɛ, “Dabi, biribiara ho anhia yɛn.”
36Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Afei deɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ sika no, ɔmfa; deɛ ɔwɔ akwantubɔtɔ no nso, ɔmfa. Deɛ ɔnni nkrantɛ no ntɔn ne ntoma mfa nkɔtɔ bi. 37Na berɛ aduru sɛ, nkɔm a wɔhyɛ faa me ho sɛ, ‘Wɔbɛkan no afra nnebɔneyɛfoɔ mu’ no bɛba mu. Ɛsɛ sɛ nkɔm biara a wɔahyɛ afa me ho no ba mu.”
38Asuafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, yɛwɔ nkrantɛ mmienu wɔ ha.” Yesu buaɛ sɛ, “Ɛyɛ, ɛno ara dɔɔso.”
Ngo Bepɔ So Mpaebɔ
39Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ no firii kuro no mu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so sɛdeɛ ɔtaa yɔ no, na nʼasuafoɔ no ka ne ho. 40Wɔduruu hɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Mommɔ mpaeɛ na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”
41Afei, ɔtwee ne ho firii asuafoɔ no ho kɔɔ nkyɛn baabi kɔkotoeɛ, bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, 42“Agya, sɛ ɛyɛ wo pɛ a, ma saa amanehunu a ɛreba me so yi ntwa me ho nkɔ, nanso ɛnyɛ deɛ mepɛ, na deɛ wopɛ na ɛnyɛ” 43Ɔgu so rebɔ mpaeɛ no, ɔbɔfoɔ firi soro bɛhyɛɛ no den.
44Ɛsiane sɛ na Yesu ho yera no wɔ Honhom mu no nti, ɔmaa ne mpaebɔ mu yɛɛ den maa ne ho fifire yɛɛ sɛ mogya ntowantowa sosɔ guu fam. 45Mpaebɔ no akyi no, ɔkɔɔ asuafoɔ no nkyɛn kɔtoo wɔn sɛ awerɛhoɔ ne ɔbrɛ nti, wɔadeda.
46Ɔkɔtoo wɔn sɛ wɔadeda no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Hwɛ! Moadeda? Monsɔre na mommɔ mpaeɛ na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”
Wɔkyere Yesu
47Yesu gu so rekasa no, nnipadɔm bi a Yuda Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako di wɔn anim, baa ne so. Yuda Iskariot twe bɛn Yesu yɛɛ no atuu.
48Yesu bisaa no sɛ, “Yuda, ɔdɔ nsɛnkyerɛnne yi so na wonam reyi me ama?”
49Berɛ a asuafoɔ a wɔwɔ ne ho no hunuu deɛ ɛreba no, wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Awurade, yɛntwitwa wɔn nkrantɛ anaa?” 50Asuafoɔ no mu baako twaa Ɔsɔfopanin no somfoɔ no aso nifa.
51Yesu ampɛ deɛ osuani no yɔeɛ no nti, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monnyae deɛ mopɛ sɛ moyɔ no.” Ɔfaa ɔsomfoɔ no aso no de taree hɔ bio. 52Yesu bisaa asɔfoɔ mpanin ne asɔredan sohwɛfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne asomfoɔ a wɔbaa ne so no sɛ, “Meyɛ odwotwafoɔ na mode nkrantɛ ne nkontimmaa aba me so? 53Berɛ a na me ne mo wɔ asɔredan mu no, moankye me; afei na mo berɛ aso a ɔbonsam nam ne tumi so reyɔ adwuma ampa.”
Petro Pa Yesu
54Afei, wɔkyeree Yesu de no kɔɔ Ɔsɔfopanin fie. Berɛ a wɔde no rekɔ no, Petro gyee ne ho kaa akyi. 55Petro duruu Ɔsɔfopanin no fie hɔ no, na asraafoɔ no asɔ egya wɔ adihɔ hɔ a wɔreto; ɔno nso kɔtoo bi.
56Abaayewa bi hunuu Petro sɛ ɔreto egya no bi no, ɔhwɛɛ no dinn kaa sɛ, “Saa ɔbarima yi yɛ Yesu akyidifoɔ no mu baako.”
57Petro sanee sɛ, “Awuraa, mennim saa ɔbarima yi baabiara.”
58Ankyɛ koraa na obi foforɔ nso hunuu no kaa sɛ, “Woyɛ nʼakyidifoɔ no mu baako.” Petro buaa no sɛ, “Dabi, menka wɔn ho.”
59Ɛbɛyɛ dɔnhwere akyi no, obi foforɔ nso san hunuu no ka sii so dua sɛ, “Akyinnyeɛ biara nni ho sɛ saa damfo yi ka Yesu asuafoɔ no ho, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔno nso yɛ Galileani, na ne kasa koraa da no adi.”
60Petro sanee ne mprɛnsa so sɛ, “Owura, asɛm a woreka yi nyɛ nokorɛ.” Nʼano ansi koraa na akokɔ bɔneeɛ.
61Saa berɛ no ara mu na Yesu twaa nʼani hwɛɛ Petro anim. Ɛhɔ ara na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛnnɛ, akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa” no, 62Petro de awerɛhoɔ firii adi kɔsuiɛ.
Yesu Ho Fɛwdie
63Mmarima a na wɔrewɛn Yesu no dii ne ho fɛw, kyekyeree nʼani, bobɔɔ no, 64sane bisaa no sɛ, “Odiyifoɔ, hwan na ɔbɔɔ wo? Kyerɛ yɛn” 65Wɔkɔɔ so yeyaa no kaa abususɛm ahodoɔ guu ne so.
Yesu Gyina Badwafoɔ Anim
66Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, Yudafoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no hyiaeɛ maa wɔde Yesu baa wɔn anim 67bisaa no sɛ, “Sɛ wone Kristo no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn.” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ meka sɛ mene Kristo no a, morennye nni, 68na sɛ mebisa mo nso a, moremmua me. 69Na ɛfiri saa berɛ yi mobɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔte Onyame Tumfoɔ no nifa so.”
70Ɔkaa saa no, wɔn nyinaa bisaa no bio sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ na wone Onyankopɔn Ba no anaa?” Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Deɛ moreka no yɛ nokorɛ.”
71Yei maa wɔkaa sɛ, “Adanseɛ bɛn na ɛhia yɛn bio? Yɛate afiri ɔno ankasa anom.”Yesu Ho Pɔbɔ
Afei, na Yudafoɔ afahyɛ a wɔdi brodo a mmɔka mfra mu a wɔfrɛ no Twam Afahyɛ no abɛn. Saa berɛ no na asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a wɔbɛfa so akye Yesu, aku no, nanso ɛsiane nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti, na wɔsuro.
Satan kɔwuraa Yuda a wɔfrɛ no Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako no mu. Yuda kɔɔ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Asɔredan no mu awɛmfoɔ mpanin nkyɛn ne wɔn kɔsusuu ɛkwan ko a ɔbɛfa so ayi Yesu ama wɔn no ho. Wɔn ani gyeeeɛ, penee so sɛ wɔbɛma no sika. Ɛfiri saa berɛ no, Yuda hwehwɛɛ ɛkwan a ɔbɛfa so ama wɔakyere Yesu berɛ a, nnipa dodoɔ biara nni ne ho.
Twam Afahyɛ Ho Ahosiesie
Afei, da a wɔkum twam dwan de di brodo a mmɔka nni mu no duruiɛ no, Yesu somaa Petro ne Yohane sɛ, “Monkɔyɛ Twam Afahyɛ aduane a yɛbɛdi no.”
Wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔyɛ aduane no?”
Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ moduru kuro no mu a, mobɛhunu obi a wakɔ asuo reba. Monni nʼakyi nkɔ efie a ɔbɛkɔ mu no mu na mommisa efiewura no sɛ, ‘Yɛn kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ se ɛhe na woasiesie ama ɔne nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ wɔmmɛdi Twam Afahyɛ aduane no?’ Ɔde mo bɛkɔ abansoro asa kɛseɛ bi a wɔasiesie mu fɛfɛɛfɛ so. Ɛhɔ na monkɔto pono no.”
Wɔkɔɔ kuro no mu no, wɔhunuu sɛdeɛ Yesu kaeɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛ maa wɔyɛɛ twam aduane no wɔ hɔ.
Adidi A Ɛtwa Toɔ
Berɛ no duruiɛ no, Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ no kɔtenatenaa adidipono no ho.
Wɔtete hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mepɛɛ sɛ me ne mo bɛtena ase, ato nsa adi saa Twam aduane yi, ansa na mahunu amane no akyɛ. Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, saa adidie yi akyi no, merenni Twam aduane yi bio kɔsi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no bɛba.”
Afei Yesu faa kuruwa, daa Onyankopɔn ase na ɔde maa nʼasuafoɔ no kaa sɛ, “Monnye na obiara nnom bi. Mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, merennom bobesa yi bi bio kɔsi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahennie no bɛba.”
Afei, ɔfaa brodo daa Onyankopɔn ase, bubuu mu de maa nʼasuafoɔ no kaa sɛ, “Yei ne me nipadua a mede rema mo. Monnye nni. Da biara a mobɛdi saa brodo yi bi no, momfa nkae me.”
Saa ara nso na adidie no akyi no, ɔfaa kuruwa kaa sɛ, “Kuruwa yi ne me mogya a merehwie agu ama mo sɛ apam foforɔ a wɔnam so bɛgye mo nkwa. Nanso, mo a mo ne me te adidiiɛ ha yi mu baako na ɔbeyi me ama. Ɛtwa sɛ mewu, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn ahyehyɛ no, nanso deɛ ɔbɛyi me ama no deɛ, ɔnnue.”
Asuafoɔ no bisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho, pɛɛ sɛ wɔhunu wɔn mu deɛ ɔbɛyi no ama no.
Yesu Kasa Tia Ahomasoɔ
Asuafoɔ no gyee wɔn ho akyinnyeɛ pɛɛ sɛ wɔhunu wɔn mu deɛ ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahennie a ɛbɛba no mu.
Yesu teeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Wiase deɛ, atumfoɔ hyɛ wɔn a wɔdi wɔn so no so ma wɔn nso a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no nso bu wɔn sɛ wɔn ‘adɛɛfoɔ.’ Nanso, mo deɛ, deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ mo so panin no nyɛ sɛ mo mu akumaa na deɛ ɔdi mo so no nso nyɛ mo mu somfoɔ. Merebisa mo sɛ, nnipa baanu yi mu hwan na ɔdi ne yɔnko so, deɛ ɔte adidipono ho anaa deɛ ɔsom deɛ ɔte adidipono no ho no? Nanso, me deɛ, mewɔ mo mu sɛ mo somfoɔ. Me ne mo na afa ɔhaw ne amaneɛ mu a, moda so ne me nam. Mʼagya de Ahennie no ama me. Saa ara nso na mede rema mo. Na mo ne me ato nsa adidi, na moatumi abu Israel mmusuakuo dumienu no atɛn.”
Pa A Wɔpa Yesu
Afei, Awurade kaa sɛ, “Simon, Simon! Monhwɛ yie na ɔbonsam pɛ sɛ ɔsɔ mo hwɛ. Nanso, wo Simon deɛ, masrɛ ama wo, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ a, wobɛkɔ so agye me adi. Sɛ wonu wo ho sane ba me nkyɛn a, hyɛ wo nuanom no gyidie mu den.”
Petro buaa no sɛ, “Awurade, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ me ne wo bɛda afiase na sɛ ɛyɛ owu mpo nso a, me ne wo bɛwu.”
Yesu nso buaa no sɛ, “Petro, mereka akyerɛ wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa.”
Afei, Yesu bisaa nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Berɛ a mesomaa mo a na monkuta sikabɔtɔ anaa akwantubɔtɔ na monhyɛ mpaboa no, biribi ho hiaa mo anaa?” Asuafoɔ no buaa no sɛ, “Dabi, biribiara ho anhia yɛn.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Afei deɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ sika no, ɔmfa; deɛ ɔwɔ akwantubɔtɔ no nso, ɔmfa. Deɛ ɔnni nkrantɛ no ntɔn ne ntoma mfa nkɔtɔ bi. Na berɛ aduru sɛ, nkɔm a wɔhyɛ faa me ho sɛ, ‘Wɔbɛkan no afra nnebɔneyɛfoɔ mu’ no bɛba mu. Ɛsɛ sɛ nkɔm biara a wɔahyɛ afa me ho no ba mu.”
Asuafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Awurade, yɛwɔ nkrantɛ mmienu wɔ ha.” Yesu buaɛ sɛ, “Ɛyɛ, ɛno ara dɔɔso.”
Ngo Bepɔ So Mpaebɔ
Yesu ne nʼasuafoɔ no firii kuro no mu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so sɛdeɛ ɔtaa yɔ no, na nʼasuafoɔ no ka ne ho. Wɔduruu hɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ nʼasuafoɔ no sɛ, “Mommɔ mpaeɛ na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”
Afei, ɔtwee ne ho firii asuafoɔ no ho kɔɔ nkyɛn baabi kɔkotoeɛ, bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ, “Agya, sɛ ɛyɛ wo pɛ a, ma saa amanehunu a ɛreba me so yi ntwa me ho nkɔ, nanso ɛnyɛ deɛ mepɛ, na deɛ wopɛ na ɛnyɛ” Ɔgu so rebɔ mpaeɛ no, ɔbɔfoɔ firi soro bɛhyɛɛ no den.
Ɛsiane sɛ na Yesu ho yera no wɔ Honhom mu no nti, ɔmaa ne mpaebɔ mu yɛɛ den maa ne ho fifire yɛɛ sɛ mogya ntowantowa sosɔ guu fam. Mpaebɔ no akyi no, ɔkɔɔ asuafoɔ no nkyɛn kɔtoo wɔn sɛ awerɛhoɔ ne ɔbrɛ nti, wɔadeda.
Ɔkɔtoo wɔn sɛ wɔadeda no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Hwɛ! Moadeda? Monsɔre na mommɔ mpaeɛ na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”
Wɔkyere Yesu
Yesu gu so rekasa no, nnipadɔm bi a Yuda Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafoɔ dumienu no mu baako di wɔn anim, baa ne so. Yuda Iskariot twe bɛn Yesu yɛɛ no atuu.
Yesu bisaa no sɛ, “Yuda, ɔdɔ nsɛnkyerɛnne yi so na wonam reyi me ama?”
Berɛ a asuafoɔ a wɔwɔ ne ho no hunuu deɛ ɛreba no, wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Awurade, yɛntwitwa wɔn nkrantɛ anaa?” Asuafoɔ no mu baako twaa Ɔsɔfopanin no somfoɔ no aso nifa.
Yesu ampɛ deɛ osuani no yɔeɛ no nti, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monnyae deɛ mopɛ sɛ moyɔ no.” Ɔfaa ɔsomfoɔ no aso no de taree hɔ bio. Yesu bisaa asɔfoɔ mpanin ne asɔredan sohwɛfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne asomfoɔ a wɔbaa ne so no sɛ, “Meyɛ odwotwafoɔ na mode nkrantɛ ne nkontimmaa aba me so? Berɛ a na me ne mo wɔ asɔredan mu no, moankye me; afei na mo berɛ aso a ɔbonsam nam ne tumi so reyɔ adwuma ampa.”
Petro Pa Yesu
Afei, wɔkyeree Yesu de no kɔɔ Ɔsɔfopanin fie. Berɛ a wɔde no rekɔ no, Petro gyee ne ho kaa akyi. Petro duruu Ɔsɔfopanin no fie hɔ no, na asraafoɔ no asɔ egya wɔ adihɔ hɔ a wɔreto; ɔno nso kɔtoo bi.
Abaayewa bi hunuu Petro sɛ ɔreto egya no bi no, ɔhwɛɛ no dinn kaa sɛ, “Saa ɔbarima yi yɛ Yesu akyidifoɔ no mu baako.”
Petro sanee sɛ, “Awuraa, mennim saa ɔbarima yi baabiara.”
Ankyɛ koraa na obi foforɔ nso hunuu no kaa sɛ, “Woyɛ nʼakyidifoɔ no mu baako.” Petro buaa no sɛ, “Dabi, menka wɔn ho.”
Ɛbɛyɛ dɔnhwere akyi no, obi foforɔ nso san hunuu no ka sii so dua sɛ, “Akyinnyeɛ biara nni ho sɛ saa damfo yi ka Yesu asuafoɔ no ho, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔno nso yɛ Galileani, na ne kasa koraa da no adi.”
Petro sanee ne mprɛnsa so sɛ, “Owura, asɛm a woreka yi nyɛ nokorɛ.” Nʼano ansi koraa na akokɔ bɔneeɛ.
Saa berɛ no ara mu na Yesu twaa nʼani hwɛɛ Petro anim. Ɛhɔ ara na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Ɛnnɛ, akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa” no, Petro de awerɛhoɔ firii adi kɔsuiɛ.
Yesu Ho Fɛwdie
Mmarima a na wɔrewɛn Yesu no dii ne ho fɛw, kyekyeree nʼani, bobɔɔ no, sane bisaa no sɛ, “Odiyifoɔ, hwan na ɔbɔɔ wo? Kyerɛ yɛn” Wɔkɔɔ so yeyaa no kaa abususɛm ahodoɔ guu ne so.
Yesu Gyina Badwafoɔ Anim
Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, Yudafoɔ mpanin ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no hyiaeɛ maa wɔde Yesu baa wɔn anim bisaa no sɛ, “Sɛ wone Kristo no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn.” Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ, “Sɛ meka sɛ mene Kristo no a, morennye nni, na sɛ mebisa mo nso a, moremmua me. Na ɛfiri saa berɛ yi mobɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔte Onyame Tumfoɔ no nifa so.”
Ɔkaa saa no, wɔn nyinaa bisaa no bio sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ na wone Onyankopɔn Ba no anaa?” Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Deɛ moreka no yɛ nokorɛ.”
Yei maa wɔkaa sɛ, “Adanseɛ bɛn na ɛhia yɛn bio? Yɛate afiri ɔno ankasa anom.”
Luka 23Wɔde Yesu Kɔ Pilato Anim
1Afei, badwafoɔ no sɔre de Yesu kɔɔ Pilato anim. 2Wɔfirii aseɛ totoo nʼano sɛ, “Saa onipa yi tu nkurɔfoɔ aso. Ɔmpene so sɛ ɔmanfoɔ tua toɔ ma Kaesare aban, na ɔfrɛ ne ho sɛ ɔhene Kristo no.”
3Yei maa Pilato bisaa no sɛ, “Wone Yudafo hene no anaa?” Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Ɛno ara na woaka no.”
4Pilato ka kyerɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne nnipadɔm no sɛ. “Menhunu asɛm biara a mɛgyina so abu onipa yi fɔ.”
5Nanso, wɔn bo antɔ wɔn yam kɔɔ so kaa sɛ, “Ɔyɛ ɔmammɔfoɔ Baabiara a ɔkɔ no, ɔnam ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so de hwanyan nnipa no tia aban. Ɔde ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yi firi Galilea bɛfaa Yudeaman mu nyinaa abɛduru Yerusalem ha.”
6Pilato tee asɛm yi no, ɔbisaa sɛ; “Onipa yi yɛ Galileani anaa?”
Wɔde Yesu Kɔ Herode Anim
7Berɛ a wɔka kyerɛɛ Pilato sɛ Yesu yɛ Galileani no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, sɛ ɛte saa deɛ a, wɔmfa no nkɔ Ɔhene Herode anim, ɛfiri sɛ, Galilea hyɛ nʼase. Saa berɛ no ara nso na Ɔhene Herode wɔ Yerusalem. 8Ɛsiane sɛ wate Yesu ho asɛm na ɔsusu nso sɛ, sɛ ɔba nʼanim a, ɔbɛyɛ anwanwadeɛ akyerɛ no no nti, berɛ a ɔhunuu no no, nʼani gyee yie, ɛfiri sɛ, na ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔbɛhu no no, akyɛ.
9Wɔbisabisaa Yesu nsɛm bebree, nanso ɛmu biara nni hɔ a ɔyii ano. 10Asɔfoɔ mpanin no ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no kɔɔ so ara kaa nsɛm a ɛnnim guu ne so.
11Herode ne nʼasomfoɔ no bɔɔ Yesu adapaa, dii ne ho fɛw. Afei, Herode hyehyɛɛ no sɛ ɔhene sane de no kɔmaa Pilato. 12Da no ara, Herode ne Pilato a anka wɔyɛ aka no, bɔɔ mu.
Pilato Di Ma Yesu
13Wɔde Yesu kɔmaa Pilato no, ɔfrɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin ne nnipadɔm no, 14ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mode onipa yi brɛɛ me sɛ, ɔyɛ obi a ɔnam ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so hwanyan nnipa, tia aban. Mahwehwɛ nsɛm a moka guu ne so no mu wɔ mo anim, nanso menhunu afɔbusɛm biara a mɛgyina so mabu no fɔ. 15Saa ara nso na Herode annya asɛm bi annyina so ammu no fɔ a ɛno nti, wasane de no abrɛ yɛn yi. Ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara a ɛsɛ sɛ megyina so bu no kumfɔ. 16Mɛbɔ no mmaa na magyaa no.”
17Twam Afahyɛ biara, Pilato gyaa odeduani baako ma wɔn. 18Pilato kasa no akyi no, nnipadɔm no nyinaa bɔ gyee so sɛ, “Ku no, na gyaa Baraba ma yɛn.” 19Baraba yi yɛ obi a ɔhwanyan ɔman na ɔsane dii awu nti, wɔde no too afiase.
20Pilato kɔɔ so di maa Yesu pɛɛ sɛ ɔgyaa no. 21Nanso, wɔsane bɔ gyee so bio se, “Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”
22Ɔbisaa wɔn ne mprɛnsa so sɛ, “Adɛn? Ɛdeɛn bɔne na wayɛ? Menhunu afɔbusɛm biara a mɛgyina so abu no kumfɔ. Mɛbɔ no mmaa na magyaa no.”
23Nanso, wɔbɔ gyee so ara maa wɔn nne bu faa Pilato deɛ no so sɛ, ɔmmɔ no asɛnnua mu.
24Enti, Pilato penee wɔn abisadeɛ no so maa wɔn 25Wɔgyaee Baraba a ɛsiane sɛ ɔhwanyanee ɔman sane dii awu no nti, ɔde no too afiase no maa wɔn. Na ɔde Yesu maa wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ no.
Yesu Asɛnnuambɔ
26Afei, wɔde Yesu rekɔ akɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu no, wɔhyiaa Kireneni bi a wɔfrɛ no Simon sɛ ɔfiri afuom reba Yerusalem. Wɔkyeree no, hyɛɛ no ma ɔsoaa Yesu asɛnnua no wɔ ne kɔn ho, dii nʼakyi. 27Nnipadɔm a mmaa a wɔresu retwa agyaadwoɔ fra wɔn mu no, tu dii nʼakyi.
28Yesu danee ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Yerusalem mma, monnsu me na monsu mo ho ne mo mma. 29Na wɔka sɛ ‘Berɛ bi bɛba a, ɛbɛyɛ berɛ pa ama abonini.’ 30Saa berɛ no na wɔbɛka akyerɛ mmepɔ sɛ, ‘Dwiri gu yɛn so,’ ne nkokoɔ nso sɛ, ‘Kata yɛn so!’ 31Na sɛ wɔde yei yɛ me a meyɛ dumono no a, ɛdeɛn na wɔde bɛyɛ mo a moyɛ duwuiɛ?” 32Berɛ a wɔde Yesu rekɔ no, wɔde nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu bi kaa ne ho sɛ wɔnkɔku wɔn.
33Wɔduruu faako a wɔfrɛ hɔ Golgota no, wɔbɔɔ ɔne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu no asɛnnua mu a ɔbaako wɔ ne nifa na ɔbaako nso wɔ ne benkum.
34Yesu kaa sɛ, “Agya, fa kyɛ wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔnnim deɛ wɔreyɛ.” Afei, asraafoɔ no kyekyɛɛ ne ntadeɛ mu bɔɔ so ntonto faeɛ. 35Saa berɛ no na nnipadɔm no gyinagyina hɔ rehwɛ no. Yudafoɔ mpanimfoɔ no dii ne ho fɛw sɛ. “Ɔgyee ebinom nkwa; sɛ ɔse ɔno ne Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ɔnnye ne ho nkwa na yɛnhwɛ.”
36Asraafoɔ no nso dii ne ho fɛw de nsa a ɛkeka bi brɛɛ no 37kaa sɛ, “Sɛ wone Yudafoɔ hene no a, gye wo ho nkwa.”
38Wɔtwerɛɛ saa asɛm yi “YUDAFOƆ HENE NO NI!” bɔɔ nʼatifi wɔ asɛnnua no so.
39Nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu a na wɔn nso wɔabɔ wɔn asɛnnua mu no mu baako dii Yesu ho fɛw sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ wone Kristo no? Gye wo ho na gye yɛn nso.”
40Nanso, ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ a ɔka ho no, kaa nʼanim sɛ, “Wonsuro Onyankopɔn? Hunu sɛ yɛn nyinaa wɔ afɔbuo korɔ no ara mu. 41Yɛn deɛ, saa asotwe yi fata yɛn; yɛn bɔne so akatua na yɛanya yi, na oyi deɛ, ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara.” 42Ɔsan kaa sɛ, “Yesu, woduru wʼAhennie mu a, kae me.”
43Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Merehyɛ wo bɔ sɛ, ɛnnɛ, wobɛka me ho wɔ Paradise.”
Yesu Wuo
44Ɛduruu owigyinaeɛ no, asase no so nyinaa duruu sum kabii kɔsii nnɔnmiɛnsa. 45Owia duruu sum na ntoma a ɛtwa asɔredan no mu nso mu tee mmienu.
46Yesu teaam denden sɛ, “Agya, wo nsam na mede me honhom mehyɛ!” Ɔkaa yei no, ɔgyaa mu.
47Asraafoɔ panin a na ɔgyina hɔ no hunuu deɛ asi no, ɔyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ sɛ, “Ampa ara, saa onipa yi yɛ ɔteneneeni.”
48Nnipa a wɔbaa hɔ bɛhwɛɛ Yesu asɛnnuambɔ no hunuu sɛ wawu no, wɔde awerɛhoɔ firii hɔ kɔeɛ. 49Saa berɛ no na Yesu nnamfo ne mmaa bi a wɔdii nʼakyi firi Galilea baeɛ no gyinagyina akyirikyiri baabi rehwɛ deɛ ɛrekɔ so no nyinaa.
Wɔsie Yesu
50Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea a ɛwɔ Yudaman mu. Saa ɔbarima yi, na ɔyɛ onipa pa a ɔtene wɔ Onyankopɔn anim a na ɔretwɛn Onyankopɔn Ahennie a ɛbɛba no. 51Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyɛ Yudafoɔ badwafoɔ no mu baako deɛ, nanso wampene gyinaeɛ a wɔsisiiɛ ne deɛ wɔyɔeɛ no so. 52Ɔkɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ Yesu amu no. 53Ɔmaa wɔyii Yesu amu no maa no, na ɔde nwera kyekyeree no de no kɔtoo ɔboda bi a obiara nnaa mu da no mu. 54Wɔsiee Yesu Efiada a na Yudafoɔ resiesie wɔn ho atwɛn Homeda no.
55Wɔsiee amu no wieeɛ no, mmaa a wɔdi Yesu akyi firi Galilea no ne Yosef kɔhwɛɛ faako a wɔde no toeɛ ne sɛdeɛ wɔsiee no faeɛ. 56Saa mmaa yi sanee wɔn akyi kɔɔ fie kɔhwehwɛɛ nnuhwam ne ngo a wɔde bɛsiesie Yesu amu no, nanso ɛsiane sɛ na Homeda no aduru nti, wɔtenaa ase komm sɛdeɛ Yudafoɔ mmara kyerɛ no.Wɔde Yesu Kɔ Pilato Anim
Afei, badwafoɔ no sɔre de Yesu kɔɔ Pilato anim. Wɔfirii aseɛ totoo nʼano sɛ, “Saa onipa yi tu nkurɔfoɔ aso. Ɔmpene so sɛ ɔmanfoɔ tua toɔ ma Kaesare aban, na ɔfrɛ ne ho sɛ ɔhene Kristo no.”
Yei maa Pilato bisaa no sɛ, “Wone Yudafo hene no anaa?” Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Ɛno ara na woaka no.”
Pilato ka kyerɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne nnipadɔm no sɛ. “Menhunu asɛm biara a mɛgyina so abu onipa yi fɔ.”
Nanso, wɔn bo antɔ wɔn yam kɔɔ so kaa sɛ, “Ɔyɛ ɔmammɔfoɔ Baabiara a ɔkɔ no, ɔnam ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so de hwanyan nnipa no tia aban. Ɔde ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yi firi Galilea bɛfaa Yudeaman mu nyinaa abɛduru Yerusalem ha.”
Pilato tee asɛm yi no, ɔbisaa sɛ; “Onipa yi yɛ Galileani anaa?”
Wɔde Yesu Kɔ Herode Anim
Berɛ a wɔka kyerɛɛ Pilato sɛ Yesu yɛ Galileani no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, sɛ ɛte saa deɛ a, wɔmfa no nkɔ Ɔhene Herode anim, ɛfiri sɛ, Galilea hyɛ nʼase. Saa berɛ no ara nso na Ɔhene Herode wɔ Yerusalem. Ɛsiane sɛ wate Yesu ho asɛm na ɔsusu nso sɛ, sɛ ɔba nʼanim a, ɔbɛyɛ anwanwadeɛ akyerɛ no no nti, berɛ a ɔhunuu no no, nʼani gyee yie, ɛfiri sɛ, na ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔbɛhu no no, akyɛ.
Wɔbisabisaa Yesu nsɛm bebree, nanso ɛmu biara nni hɔ a ɔyii ano. Asɔfoɔ mpanin no ne Atwerɛsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no kɔɔ so ara kaa nsɛm a ɛnnim guu ne so.
Herode ne nʼasomfoɔ no bɔɔ Yesu adapaa, dii ne ho fɛw. Afei, Herode hyehyɛɛ no sɛ ɔhene sane de no kɔmaa Pilato. Da no ara, Herode ne Pilato a anka wɔyɛ aka no, bɔɔ mu.
Pilato Di Ma Yesu
Wɔde Yesu kɔmaa Pilato no, ɔfrɛɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne Yudafoɔ mpanin ne nnipadɔm no, ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mode onipa yi brɛɛ me sɛ, ɔyɛ obi a ɔnam ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so hwanyan nnipa, tia aban. Mahwehwɛ nsɛm a moka guu ne so no mu wɔ mo anim, nanso menhunu afɔbusɛm biara a mɛgyina so mabu no fɔ. Saa ara nso na Herode annya asɛm bi annyina so ammu no fɔ a ɛno nti, wasane de no abrɛ yɛn yi. Ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara a ɛsɛ sɛ megyina so bu no kumfɔ. Mɛbɔ no mmaa na magyaa no.”
Twam Afahyɛ biara, Pilato gyaa odeduani baako ma wɔn. Pilato kasa no akyi no, nnipadɔm no nyinaa bɔ gyee so sɛ, “Ku no, na gyaa Baraba ma yɛn.” Baraba yi yɛ obi a ɔhwanyan ɔman na ɔsane dii awu nti, wɔde no too afiase.
Pilato kɔɔ so di maa Yesu pɛɛ sɛ ɔgyaa no. Nanso, wɔsane bɔ gyee so bio se, “Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”
Ɔbisaa wɔn ne mprɛnsa so sɛ, “Adɛn? Ɛdeɛn bɔne na wayɛ? Menhunu afɔbusɛm biara a mɛgyina so abu no kumfɔ. Mɛbɔ no mmaa na magyaa no.”
Nanso, wɔbɔ gyee so ara maa wɔn nne bu faa Pilato deɛ no so sɛ, ɔmmɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Enti, Pilato penee wɔn abisadeɛ no so maa wɔn Wɔgyaee Baraba a ɛsiane sɛ ɔhwanyanee ɔman sane dii awu no nti, ɔde no too afiase no maa wɔn. Na ɔde Yesu maa wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ no.
Yesu Asɛnnuambɔ
Afei, wɔde Yesu rekɔ akɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu no, wɔhyiaa Kireneni bi a wɔfrɛ no Simon sɛ ɔfiri afuom reba Yerusalem. Wɔkyeree no, hyɛɛ no ma ɔsoaa Yesu asɛnnua no wɔ ne kɔn ho, dii nʼakyi. Nnipadɔm a mmaa a wɔresu retwa agyaadwoɔ fra wɔn mu no, tu dii nʼakyi.
Yesu danee ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Yerusalem mma, monnsu me na monsu mo ho ne mo mma. Na wɔka sɛ ‘Berɛ bi bɛba a, ɛbɛyɛ berɛ pa ama abonini.’ Saa berɛ no na wɔbɛka akyerɛ mmepɔ sɛ, ‘Dwiri gu yɛn so,’ ne nkokoɔ nso sɛ, ‘Kata yɛn so!’ Na sɛ wɔde yei yɛ me a meyɛ dumono no a, ɛdeɛn na wɔde bɛyɛ mo a moyɛ duwuiɛ?” Berɛ a wɔde Yesu rekɔ no, wɔde nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu bi kaa ne ho sɛ wɔnkɔku wɔn.
Wɔduruu faako a wɔfrɛ hɔ Golgota no, wɔbɔɔ ɔne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu no asɛnnua mu a ɔbaako wɔ ne nifa na ɔbaako nso wɔ ne benkum.
Yesu kaa sɛ, “Agya, fa kyɛ wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔnnim deɛ wɔreyɛ.” Afei, asraafoɔ no kyekyɛɛ ne ntadeɛ mu bɔɔ so ntonto faeɛ. Saa berɛ no na nnipadɔm no gyinagyina hɔ rehwɛ no. Yudafoɔ mpanimfoɔ no dii ne ho fɛw sɛ. “Ɔgyee ebinom nkwa; sɛ ɔse ɔno ne Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ɔnnye ne ho nkwa na yɛnhwɛ.”
Asraafoɔ no nso dii ne ho fɛw de nsa a ɛkeka bi brɛɛ no kaa sɛ, “Sɛ wone Yudafoɔ hene no a, gye wo ho nkwa.”
Wɔtwerɛɛ saa asɛm yi “YUDAFOƆ HENE NO NI!” bɔɔ nʼatifi wɔ asɛnnua no so.
Nnebɔneyɛfoɔ baanu a na wɔn nso wɔabɔ wɔn asɛnnua mu no mu baako dii Yesu ho fɛw sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ wone Kristo no? Gye wo ho na gye yɛn nso.”
Nanso, ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ a ɔka ho no, kaa nʼanim sɛ, “Wonsuro Onyankopɔn? Hunu sɛ yɛn nyinaa wɔ afɔbuo korɔ no ara mu. Yɛn deɛ, saa asotwe yi fata yɛn; yɛn bɔne so akatua na yɛanya yi, na oyi deɛ, ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara.” Ɔsan kaa sɛ, “Yesu, woduru wʼAhennie mu a, kae me.”
Yesu buaa no sɛ, “Merehyɛ wo bɔ sɛ, ɛnnɛ, wobɛka me ho wɔ Paradise.”
Yesu Wuo
Ɛduruu owigyinaeɛ no, asase no so nyinaa duruu sum kabii kɔsii nnɔnmiɛnsa. Owia duruu sum na ntoma a ɛtwa asɔredan no mu nso mu tee mmienu.
Yesu teaam denden sɛ, “Agya, wo nsam na mede me honhom mehyɛ!” Ɔkaa yei no, ɔgyaa mu.
Asraafoɔ panin a na ɔgyina hɔ no hunuu deɛ asi no, ɔyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ sɛ, “Ampa ara, saa onipa yi yɛ ɔteneneeni.”
Nnipa a wɔbaa hɔ bɛhwɛɛ Yesu asɛnnuambɔ no hunuu sɛ wawu no, wɔde awerɛhoɔ firii hɔ kɔeɛ. Saa berɛ no na Yesu nnamfo ne mmaa bi a wɔdii nʼakyi firi Galilea baeɛ no gyinagyina akyirikyiri baabi rehwɛ deɛ ɛrekɔ so no nyinaa.
Wɔsie Yesu
Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea a ɛwɔ Yudaman mu. Saa ɔbarima yi, na ɔyɛ onipa pa a ɔtene wɔ Onyankopɔn anim a na ɔretwɛn Onyankopɔn Ahennie a ɛbɛba no. Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyɛ Yudafoɔ badwafoɔ no mu baako deɛ, nanso wampene gyinaeɛ a wɔsisiiɛ ne deɛ wɔyɔeɛ no so. Ɔkɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ Yesu amu no. Ɔmaa wɔyii Yesu amu no maa no, na ɔde nwera kyekyeree no de no kɔtoo ɔboda bi a obiara nnaa mu da no mu. Wɔsiee Yesu Efiada a na Yudafoɔ resiesie wɔn ho atwɛn Homeda no.
Wɔsiee amu no wieeɛ no, mmaa a wɔdi Yesu akyi firi Galilea no ne Yosef kɔhwɛɛ faako a wɔde no toeɛ ne sɛdeɛ wɔsiee no faeɛ. Saa mmaa yi sanee wɔn akyi kɔɔ fie kɔhwehwɛɛ nnuhwam ne ngo a wɔde bɛsiesie Yesu amu no, nanso ɛsiane sɛ na Homeda no aduru nti, wɔtenaa ase komm sɛdeɛ Yudafoɔ mmara kyerɛ no.
Luka 24Owusɔreɛ
1Kwasiada anɔpahema, mmaa no de nnuhwam ne ngo no kɔɔ ɔboda no so. 2Wɔduruu hɔ no, wɔhunuu sɛ wɔapire ɛboɔ a wɔde hinii ɔboda no ano no afiri hɔ. 3Na wɔkɔɔ ɔboda no mu no, na Yesu amu no nna hɔ.
4Wɔde ahodwirie gyina hɔ no, amonom hɔ ara, mmarima baanu bi a wɔhyehyɛ ntadeɛ fitafitaa a ani hyerɛn bɛgyinagyinaa wɔn nkyɛn. 5Mmaa yi koma tuiɛ na wɔkotokotoo wɔn na mmarima no bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti na morehwehwɛ ɔteasefoɔ wɔ awufoɔ mu? 6Ɔnni ha. Wasɔre! Monnkae asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ mo berɛ a na ɔwɔ Galilea no sɛ, 7‘Ɛtwa sɛ wɔde Kristo no hyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa na wɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu na ne nnansa so wasɔre bio no?’ ”
8Mmaa no kaee asɛm no no, 9wɔde ahoɔherɛ firii ɔboda no so bɛkaa deɛ wɔhunuiɛ no nyinaa kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ dubaako no ne wɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa. 10Mmaa a wɔkɔɔ ɔboda no so a wɔbɛkaa saa asɛm yi no ne Maria Magdalene ne Yohana ne Yakobo maame Maria ne afoforɔ bi. 11Wɔn nsɛm a wɔbɛkaeɛ no yɛɛ wɔn sɛ anansesɛm bi nti, wɔannye anni.
12Ɛwom sɛ nnipa no annye asɛm no anni deɛ, nanso Petro deɛ, ɔtuu mmirika kɔɔ ɔboda no so, koto hwɛɛ mu, hunuu sɛ nwera a wɔde kyekyeree Yesu ho no gu hɔ. Ɔsane baa fie a na ɔnte deɛ ohunuiɛ no ase.
Emaus Kwan So
13Da no ara asuafoɔ no mu baanu siim sɛ wɔrekɔ akuraa bi a wɔfrɛ no Emaus a ɛfiri Yerusalem rekɔ hɔ no bɛyɛ sɛ akwansin nson. 14Wɔrekɔ no nyinaa na asɛm a asi no ho nkɔmmɔ ara na wɔredi. 15Wɔgu so redi nkɔmmɔ na wɔregye wɔn ho akyinnyeɛ no, Yesu bɛkaa wɔn ho ne wɔn bɔɔ anan kɔeɛ. 16Wɔhunuu sɛ obi ka wɔn ho deɛ, nanso wɔantumi anhu sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu.
17Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Nkɔmmɔ bɛn na moredi a mo werɛ aho mo ho yi?” 18Na wɔn mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Kleopa bisaa no sɛ, “Wo nko ara ne ɔhɔhoɔ a wowɔ Yerusalem a wontee nsɛm a asisi hɔ nnansa yi no?”
19Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Nsɛm bɛn?” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Nsɛm a ɛfa Nasaretni Yesu a ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ a ɔwɔ tumi wɔ nneyɔeɛ ne ɔkasa mu wɔ Onyankopɔn ne nnipa nyinaa anim no ho, 20ne sɛdeɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne yɛn mpanimfoɔ kyeree no de no kɔɔ aban mu sɛ wɔmmu no kumfɔ a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no ho. 21Yɛn deɛ, na yɛn ani da so sɛ ɔno na ɔrebɛgye Israel, na bio nnansa ni a saa asɛm yi siiɛ. 22Na mmaa bi nso a wɔyɛ Yesu akyidifoɔ sɛ yɛn ara ama yɛn ho adwiri yɛn. Wɔtuaa nhema kɔɔ ɔboda no so, 23nanso wɔanhu nʼamu no. Wɔsane bɛka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ, wɔahunu ɔsoro abɔfoɔ ma wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, Yesu te ase. 24Yɛn mu binom tuu mmirika kɔhwɛeɛ na ampa ara, na Yesu amu no nni hɔ sɛdeɛ mmaa no kaeɛ no ara pɛ.”
25Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Adweneherɛfoɔ a monni gyidie; ɛyɛ mo den sɛ mobɛgye deɛ adiyifoɔ no aka no nyinaa adi. 26Wɔanhyɛ ho nkɔm sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no bɛhunu amane ansa na wakɔ nʼanimuonyam mu anaa?” 27Na ɔfirii Mose ne adiyifoɔ no so kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nsɛm a ɛfa ne ho wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no mu no nyinaa ase.
28Wɔduruu Emaus kurotia no, Yesu pɛɛ sɛ anka ɔtoa nʼakwantuo no so. 29Nanso, wɔsrɛɛ no, sanee no sɛ ɔnna wɔn nkyɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, na adeɛ reyɛ asa nti, ɔsanee ne wɔn kɔɔ fie. 30Berɛ a wɔte adidiiɛ no, Yesu bɔɔ mpaeɛ, daa Onyankopɔn ase, faa brodo bubuu mu de maa wɔn. 31Amonom, wɔn ani so tetee wɔn maa afei wɔhunuu sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu. Ɛhɔ ara, ɔtu yeraeɛ.
32Na afei, wɔsesesesee wɔn ho wɔn ho, sɛdeɛ Atwerɛsɛm no mu nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn berɛ a na wɔnam kwan so no si fa kaa wɔn koma no.
33Ntɛm ara, wɔsane wɔn akyi baa Yerusalem bɛtoo asuafoɔ dubaako no ne wɔn a na wɔka wɔn ho no sɛ wɔahyia. 34Wɔduruu hɔ no, wɔbɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ sɛ, “Ampa ara, Awurade asɔre afiri awufoɔ mu. Wayi ne ho adi akyerɛ Simon.”
35Baanu a wɔfiri Emaus baeɛ no nso bɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ, sɛdeɛ Yesu bɛtoo wɔn Emaus kwan so na wɔantumi anhunu sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno kɔsii berɛ a ɔbubuu brodo mu de maa wɔn no ansa.
Yesu Yi Ne Ho Adi Bio
36Wɔgu so rebɔ amanneɛ no, prɛko pɛ, Yesu bɛpuee hɔ, kyeaa wɔn sɛ, “Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!” 37Wɔn nyinaa bobɔɔ binim, suroeɛ ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔsusu sɛ wɔahunu ɔsaman. 38Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn na mo koma atutu na monnye nni nso sɛ ɛyɛ me a? 39Monhwɛ me nsam ne me nan. Ɛyɛ me a! Momfa mo nsa nka me nhwɛ; ɛfiri sɛ, ɔsaman nni honam ne nnompe sɛdeɛ mohunu sɛ mewɔ bi yi.”
40Ɔkasa wieeɛ no, ɔde ne nsa ne ne nan kyerɛɛ wɔn. 41Anigyetrasoɔ ne ahodwirie nti, amma wɔannye anni sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno. Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Mowɔ biribi wɔ ha a mobɛdi anaa?”
42Wɔmaa no otidie sini bi a wɔatoto 43ma ɔgye wee wɔ wɔn anim hɔ ara.
44Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Yei ne me nsɛm a meka kyerɛɛ mo berɛ a na me ne mo wɔ hɔ no sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ biribiara a wɔatwerɛ afa me ho wɔ Mose Mmara ne Adiyifoɔ nwoma ne Nnwom mu no ba mu.”
45Afei, ɔbuee wɔn adwene mu maa wɔtee Atwerɛsɛm a ɛfa ne ho no ase. 46Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no hunu amane na ɔwu na ne nnansa so, wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu. 47Na wɔbɛfiri aseɛ wɔ Yerusalem de ne din akɔka adwensakra ne bɔnefakyɛ ho nsɛm akyerɛ amansan. 48Mone yeinom nyinaa ho adansefoɔ.
49“Mɛsoma Honhom Kronkron no na aba mo so sɛdeɛ mʼagya hyɛɛ ho bɔ no. Na monnkɔ baabiara; montena ha nkɔsi sɛ Honhom Kronkron no de tumi a ɛfiri soro no bɛba abɛhyɛ mo ma.”
Yesu Sorokɔ
50Yesu ne asuafoɔ no bɔɔ anan kɔduruu Betania kurotia na ɔmaa ne nsa so hyiraa wɔn. 51Ɔgu so rehyira wɔn no wɔmaa no so kɔɔ soro. 52Na wɔsɔree no de anigyeɛ sane kɔɔ Yerusalem. 53Na daa wɔwɔ asɔredan no mu hɔ yi Onyankopɔn ayɛ.Owusɔreɛ
Kwasiada anɔpahema, mmaa no de nnuhwam ne ngo no kɔɔ ɔboda no so. Wɔduruu hɔ no, wɔhunuu sɛ wɔapire ɛboɔ a wɔde hinii ɔboda no ano no afiri hɔ. Na wɔkɔɔ ɔboda no mu no, na Yesu amu no nna hɔ.
Wɔde ahodwirie gyina hɔ no, amonom hɔ ara, mmarima baanu bi a wɔhyehyɛ ntadeɛ fitafitaa a ani hyerɛn bɛgyinagyinaa wɔn nkyɛn. Mmaa yi koma tuiɛ na wɔkotokotoo wɔn na mmarima no bisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn nti na morehwehwɛ ɔteasefoɔ wɔ awufoɔ mu? Ɔnni ha. Wasɔre! Monnkae asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ mo berɛ a na ɔwɔ Galilea no sɛ, ‘Ɛtwa sɛ wɔde Kristo no hyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa na wɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu na ne nnansa so wasɔre bio no?’ ”
Mmaa no kaee asɛm no no, wɔde ahoɔherɛ firii ɔboda no so bɛkaa deɛ wɔhunuiɛ no nyinaa kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ dubaako no ne wɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa. Mmaa a wɔkɔɔ ɔboda no so a wɔbɛkaa saa asɛm yi no ne Maria Magdalene ne Yohana ne Yakobo maame Maria ne afoforɔ bi. Wɔn nsɛm a wɔbɛkaeɛ no yɛɛ wɔn sɛ anansesɛm bi nti, wɔannye anni.
Ɛwom sɛ nnipa no annye asɛm no anni deɛ, nanso Petro deɛ, ɔtuu mmirika kɔɔ ɔboda no so, koto hwɛɛ mu, hunuu sɛ nwera a wɔde kyekyeree Yesu ho no gu hɔ. Ɔsane baa fie a na ɔnte deɛ ohunuiɛ no ase.
Emaus Kwan So
Da no ara asuafoɔ no mu baanu siim sɛ wɔrekɔ akuraa bi a wɔfrɛ no Emaus a ɛfiri Yerusalem rekɔ hɔ no bɛyɛ sɛ akwansin nson. Wɔrekɔ no nyinaa na asɛm a asi no ho nkɔmmɔ ara na wɔredi. Wɔgu so redi nkɔmmɔ na wɔregye wɔn ho akyinnyeɛ no, Yesu bɛkaa wɔn ho ne wɔn bɔɔ anan kɔeɛ. Wɔhunuu sɛ obi ka wɔn ho deɛ, nanso wɔantumi anhu sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu.
Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Nkɔmmɔ bɛn na moredi a mo werɛ aho mo ho yi?” Na wɔn mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Kleopa bisaa no sɛ, “Wo nko ara ne ɔhɔhoɔ a wowɔ Yerusalem a wontee nsɛm a asisi hɔ nnansa yi no?”
Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Nsɛm bɛn?” Wɔbuaa no sɛ, “Nsɛm a ɛfa Nasaretni Yesu a ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ a ɔwɔ tumi wɔ nneyɔeɛ ne ɔkasa mu wɔ Onyankopɔn ne nnipa nyinaa anim no ho, ne sɛdeɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin ne yɛn mpanimfoɔ kyeree no de no kɔɔ aban mu sɛ wɔmmu no kumfɔ a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no ho. Yɛn deɛ, na yɛn ani da so sɛ ɔno na ɔrebɛgye Israel, na bio nnansa ni a saa asɛm yi siiɛ. Na mmaa bi nso a wɔyɛ Yesu akyidifoɔ sɛ yɛn ara ama yɛn ho adwiri yɛn. Wɔtuaa nhema kɔɔ ɔboda no so, nanso wɔanhu nʼamu no. Wɔsane bɛka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ, wɔahunu ɔsoro abɔfoɔ ma wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, Yesu te ase. Yɛn mu binom tuu mmirika kɔhwɛeɛ na ampa ara, na Yesu amu no nni hɔ sɛdeɛ mmaa no kaeɛ no ara pɛ.”
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Adweneherɛfoɔ a monni gyidie; ɛyɛ mo den sɛ mobɛgye deɛ adiyifoɔ no aka no nyinaa adi. Wɔanhyɛ ho nkɔm sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no bɛhunu amane ansa na wakɔ nʼanimuonyam mu anaa?” Na ɔfirii Mose ne adiyifoɔ no so kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nsɛm a ɛfa ne ho wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no mu no nyinaa ase.
Wɔduruu Emaus kurotia no, Yesu pɛɛ sɛ anka ɔtoa nʼakwantuo no so. Nanso, wɔsrɛɛ no, sanee no sɛ ɔnna wɔn nkyɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, na adeɛ reyɛ asa nti, ɔsanee ne wɔn kɔɔ fie. Berɛ a wɔte adidiiɛ no, Yesu bɔɔ mpaeɛ, daa Onyankopɔn ase, faa brodo bubuu mu de maa wɔn. Amonom, wɔn ani so tetee wɔn maa afei wɔhunuu sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu. Ɛhɔ ara, ɔtu yeraeɛ.
Na afei, wɔsesesesee wɔn ho wɔn ho, sɛdeɛ Atwerɛsɛm no mu nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn berɛ a na wɔnam kwan so no si fa kaa wɔn koma no.
Ntɛm ara, wɔsane wɔn akyi baa Yerusalem bɛtoo asuafoɔ dubaako no ne wɔn a na wɔka wɔn ho no sɛ wɔahyia. Wɔduruu hɔ no, wɔbɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ sɛ, “Ampa ara, Awurade asɔre afiri awufoɔ mu. Wayi ne ho adi akyerɛ Simon.”
Baanu a wɔfiri Emaus baeɛ no nso bɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ, sɛdeɛ Yesu bɛtoo wɔn Emaus kwan so na wɔantumi anhunu sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno kɔsii berɛ a ɔbubuu brodo mu de maa wɔn no ansa.
Yesu Yi Ne Ho Adi Bio
Wɔgu so rebɔ amanneɛ no, prɛko pɛ, Yesu bɛpuee hɔ, kyeaa wɔn sɛ, “Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!” Wɔn nyinaa bobɔɔ binim, suroeɛ ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔsusu sɛ wɔahunu ɔsaman. Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Adɛn na mo koma atutu na monnye nni nso sɛ ɛyɛ me a? Monhwɛ me nsam ne me nan. Ɛyɛ me a! Momfa mo nsa nka me nhwɛ; ɛfiri sɛ, ɔsaman nni honam ne nnompe sɛdeɛ mohunu sɛ mewɔ bi yi.”
Ɔkasa wieeɛ no, ɔde ne nsa ne ne nan kyerɛɛ wɔn. Anigyetrasoɔ ne ahodwirie nti, amma wɔannye anni sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno. Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Mowɔ biribi wɔ ha a mobɛdi anaa?”
Wɔmaa no otidie sini bi a wɔatoto ma ɔgye wee wɔ wɔn anim hɔ ara.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Yei ne me nsɛm a meka kyerɛɛ mo berɛ a na me ne mo wɔ hɔ no sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ biribiara a wɔatwerɛ afa me ho wɔ Mose Mmara ne Adiyifoɔ nwoma ne Nnwom mu no ba mu.”
Afei, ɔbuee wɔn adwene mu maa wɔtee Atwerɛsɛm a ɛfa ne ho no ase. Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Wɔatwerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no hunu amane na ɔwu na ne nnansa so, wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu. Na wɔbɛfiri aseɛ wɔ Yerusalem de ne din akɔka adwensakra ne bɔnefakyɛ ho nsɛm akyerɛ amansan. Mone yeinom nyinaa ho adansefoɔ.
“Mɛsoma Honhom Kronkron no na aba mo so sɛdeɛ mʼagya hyɛɛ ho bɔ no. Na monnkɔ baabiara; montena ha nkɔsi sɛ Honhom Kronkron no de tumi a ɛfiri soro no bɛba abɛhyɛ mo ma.”
Yesu Sorokɔ
Yesu ne asuafoɔ no bɔɔ anan kɔduruu Betania kurotia na ɔmaa ne nsa so hyiraa wɔn. Ɔgu so rehyira wɔn no wɔmaa no so kɔɔ soro. Na wɔsɔree no de anigyeɛ sane kɔɔ Yerusalem. Na daa wɔwɔ asɔredan no mu hɔ yi Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
Yohane NhyɛnmuNhyɛnmu
Yohane a ɔtwerɛɛ nsɛmpa no mu deɛ ɛtɔ so nan no yɛ Yudani a ne papa din de Sebedeo. Na Yohane yɛ ɔfareni. Saa Yohane korɔ yi ara na ɔtwerɛɛ Yohane nwoma a ɛdi kan, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa ne Adiyisɛm no. Na ɔyɛ Yesu asuafoɔ no mu baako a na ɔbɛn no pɛɛ wɔ ne mfeɛ mmiɛnsa adwumayɔ no mu. Yei nti, na ɔnim Yesu yie; ɔhunuu nʼanwanwadwuma. Afei, na ɔnim tia a na Yesu tia Yudafoɔ mpanin no. Na ɔnim na ɔtwerɛ faa Yesu ho sɛ ɔyɛ onipa ne Onyankopɔn. Na deɛ ɛka ho ne sɛ, Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba korɔ ne wiase Agyenkwa sɛdeɛ ɔno ankasa aka no.
Emu Nsɛm
1. Nnianimu, 1.1-51
2. Yesu adwumayɔ, nsɛnkyerɛnne nson no 2.1–12.50
3. Yesu ntetemu nsɛm 13.1–17.26
4. Wɔkyere Yesu, di nʼasɛm, bɔ no asɛnnua mu 18.1–19.37
5. Yesu sie ne ne Wusɔreɛ 19.38–20.31
6. Nsɛm a ɛtwa toɔ 21.1-25Nhyɛnmu
Yohane a ɔtwerɛɛ nsɛmpa no mu deɛ ɛtɔ so nan no yɛ Yudani a ne papa din de Sebedeo. Na Yohane yɛ ɔfareni. Saa Yohane korɔ yi ara na ɔtwerɛɛ Yohane nwoma a ɛdi kan, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa ne Adiyisɛm no. Na ɔyɛ Yesu asuafoɔ no mu baako a na ɔbɛn no pɛɛ wɔ ne mfeɛ mmiɛnsa adwumayɔ no mu. Yei nti, na ɔnim Yesu yie; ɔhunuu nʼanwanwadwuma. Afei, na ɔnim tia a na Yesu tia Yudafoɔ mpanin no. Na ɔnim na ɔtwerɛ faa Yesu ho sɛ ɔyɛ onipa ne Onyankopɔn. Na deɛ ɛka ho ne sɛ, Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba korɔ ne wiase Agyenkwa sɛdeɛ ɔno ankasa aka no.

Yohane 1Hann A Ɛwɔ Sum Mu
1Ansa na wɔrebɛbɔ wiase no, na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ dada. Na Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ. Na Asɛm no yɛ Onyankopɔn. 2Mfitiaseɛ no, na Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ. 3Ɛnam ne so na wɔbɔɔ adeɛ nyinaa. Wɔankwati no anyɔ biribiara. 4Ne mu na nkwa wɔ; na saa nkwa no na ɛma nnipa hann. 5Hann no hyerɛn wɔ esum mu a esum no ntumi nni hann no so.
6Onyankopɔn somaa ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Yohane. 7Ɔbɛdii hann no ho adanseɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma nnipa afa ne so agye hann no adi. 8Ɛnyɛ ɔno ankasa ne hann no, na mmom, ɔbaa sɛ ɔrebɛdi hann no ho adanseɛ. 9Saa hann yi ne nokorɛ hann a ɛba wiase ma ɛhyerɛn nnipa nyinaa so no.
10Saa berɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ wiase. Ɛwom sɛ Onyankopɔn nam ne so na ɔbɔɔ wiase deɛ, nanso ɔbaa wiase no wiase anhu no. 11Ɔbaa nʼankasa ne man mu, nanso ne manfoɔ annye no anto mu.
12Na wɔn a wɔgyee no, na wɔgyee ne din diiɛ no, ɔmaa wɔn tumi ma wɔbɛyɛɛ Onyankopɔn mma, 13wɔ honhom fam a ɛmfiri onipa anaa ɔhonam fam, na mmom ɛfiri Onyankopɔn ankasa.
14Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ onipa ne yɛn bɛtenaeɛ ma yɛhunuu nʼanimuonyam sɛ ɔba korɔ a ɔfiri Agya no nkyɛn a adom ne nokorɛ ayɛ no ma. 15Yohane kaa ne ho asɛm sɛ, “Oyi ne deɛ mekaa ne ho asɛm sɛ, ‘Deɛ ɔdi mʼakyi reba no yɛ kɛse sene me, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔwɔ hɔ ansa na wɔwoo me no.’ 16Ɔfiri ne mmɔborɔhunu a ɛtoɔ ntwa da no mu hyira yɛn nyinaa daa daa. 17Onyankopɔn nam Mose so de mmara maa yɛn, nanso ɛnam Yesu so na yɛnyaa adom ne nokorɛ. 18Obiara nhunuu Onyankopɔn da, gye ne Ba korɔ no a ɔte sɛ Onyankopɔn no, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔne Agya no na ɛwɔ hɔ, na wada Agya no ho nsɛm nyinaa adi akyerɛ yɛn.”
Yohane Adansedie
19Yudafoɔ mpanin a wɔwɔ Yerusalem somaa asɔfoɔ ne Lewifoɔ kɔɔ Yohane nkyɛn kɔbisaa no sɛ, “Wone Agyenkwa no anaa?”
20Yohane antwentɛn asɛm no mmuaeɛ so. Ɔpaee mu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn prɛko pɛ sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ mene Agyenkwa no.”
21Wɔbisaa no sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ, na wone hwan, Elia anaa?” Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Dabi.” Wɔbisaa no bio sɛ, “Wone Odiyifoɔ no?” Ɔsan buaa wɔn sɛ, “Dabi”.
22Wɔsan bisaa no sɛ, “Ɛnneɛ, na wone hwan? Ka kyerɛ yɛn na yɛnkɔbɔ wɔn a wɔsomaa yɛn no amanneɛ. Asɛm bɛn na wowɔ ka fa wo ho?”
23Yohane buaa wɔn sɛ, “Mene nne a ɛfiri serɛ so a ɛreteam, sɛdeɛ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia hyɛɛ nkɔm sɛ, ‘Monsiesie mo ho mma Awurade ba a ɔbɛba no no.’ ”
24Afei, wɔn a Farisifoɔ no somaa wɔn no bisaa Yohane bio sɛ, 25“Sɛ ɛnyɛ wone Agyenkwa no anaa Elia anaa Odiyifoɔ no a, adɛn nti na wobɔ asu?”
26Yohane nso buaa sɛ, “Me deɛ, nsuo na mede bɔ asu, nanso obi wɔ mo mfinimfini ha a monnim no, 27a ne mpaboa mpo memfata sɛ meworɔ; ɔno na ɔbɛdi mʼakyi aba.” 28Saa asɛm yi sii Betania a ɛwɔ Asubɔnten Yordan agya, faako a na Yohane rebɔ asu no.
Yesu, Onyankopɔn Dwammaa No
29Adeɛ kyeeɛ a Yohane huu Yesu sɛ ɔreba ne nkyɛn no, ɔteaam kaa sɛ, “Oyi ne Onyankopɔn Dwammaa a ɔnam ne so de wiase bɔne nyinaa kyɛ no! 30Oyi ne deɛ mekaa ne ho asɛm sɛ, ‘Deɛ ɔdi mʼakyi reba no yɛ kɛse sene me, ɛfiri sɛ, na ɔwɔ hɔ ansa na wɔrewo me.’ 31Me deɛ, na menni no, nanso mede nsuo bɛbɔɔ asu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɔ na mɛda odwammaa no adi akyerɛ Israel.”
32Na Yohane dii adanseɛ sɛ, “Mehunuu Honhom no sɛ asiane aba ne so sɛ aborɔnoma a ɔresiane firi soro. 33Naanka menni no, nanso na Onyankopɔn a ɔsomaa me sɛ memfa nsuo mmɔ asu no aka akyerɛ me sɛ, ‘Onipa a wobɛhunu sɛ Honhom no bɛsiane abɛsi ne so no, ɔno ne obi a ɔde Honhom Kronkron no bɛbɔ asu.’ 34Mahunu yeinom nyinaa sɛ aba mu na medi ho adanseɛ sɛ oyi ne Onyankopɔn Ba no.”
Yesu Asuafoɔ A Wɔdi Kan
35Adeɛ kyeeɛ a Yohane ne nʼasuafoɔ no mu baanu gyina baabi no, wɔhunuu sɛ Yesu retwam. 36Yohane hwɛɛ no, kaa sɛ, “Oyi ne Onyankopɔn Dwammaa no!”
37Asuafoɔ baanu no tee deɛ ɔkaeɛ no, wɔkɔdii Yesu akyi.
38Yesu twaa nʼani hunu sɛ wɔdi nʼakyi no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, “Ɛdeɛn na morehwehwɛ?” Wɔn nso bisaa no sɛ, “Rabi, a ne nkyerɛase ne Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ɛhe na wote?”
39Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ, “Mommra mmɛhwɛ.” Enti, wɔne no kɔ kɔhwɛɛ faako a ɔte no ne no tenaa hɔ firi awia nnɔnan kɔsii anwummerɛ. 40Nnipa baanu a wɔtee Yohane asɛm no nti ɛmaa wɔkɔdii Yesu akyi no mu baako ne Simon Petro nua Andrea.
41Adeɛ a ɛdi kan a Andrea yɔeɛ ne sɛ, ɔkɔhwehwɛɛ ne nua Petro ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yɛahunu Agyenkwa no.” 42Ɔde Petro kɔɔ Yesu nkyɛn. Yesu hwɛɛ Petro dinn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Wone Simon, Yohane ba no. Nanso, ɛfiri nnɛ rekɔ wɔbɛfrɛ wo Kefa.” Ɛno ara ne Petro a nʼasekyerɛ ne Ɔbotan no.
Yesu Frɛ Filipo Ne Natanael
43Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, Yesu yɛɛ nʼadwene sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Galilea. Ɔhunuu Filipo ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Di mʼakyi.” 44Filipo nso na ɔfiri Betsaida a ɛhɔ na Petro ne Andrea nso firi.
45Filipo firi hɔ kɔɔ Natanael nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yɛahunu Agyenkwa no a Mose ne adiyifoɔ no hyɛɛ ne ho nkɔm no no. Wɔfrɛ no Yesu. Ɔyɛ Yosef a ɔfiri Nasaret no ba.” 46Natanael bisaa Filipo sɛ, “Ade pa bi bɛtumi afiri Nasaret da?” Filipo nso ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Bra na bɛhwɛ.” 47Berɛ a Yesu hunuu Natanael sɛ ɔreba no, ɔkaa sɛ, “Israelni nokwafoɔ ni ampa.”
48Natanael bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Woyɛɛ dɛn hunuu sɛdeɛ mete?” Yesu nso buaa no sɛ, “Berɛ a wowɔ brɔdɔma dua no ase hɔ no na mehunu wo ansa na Filipo rebɛfrɛ wo.”
49Natanael kaa sɛ, “Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, wone Onyankopɔn Ba, Israelhene no!”
50Yesu bisaa no sɛ, “Ɛsiane sɛ meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ mehunuu wo wɔ brɔdɔma dua no ase nti na wogye di anaa? Wobɛhunu anwanwadeɛ a ɛsene yei. 51Mereka nokorɛ akyerɛ wo sɛ, wobɛhunu sɛ ɔsoro abue na Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ redi aforosiane ba Onipa Ba no nkyɛn.”Hann A Ɛwɔ Sum Mu
Ansa na wɔrebɛbɔ wiase no, na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ dada. Na Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ. Na Asɛm no yɛ Onyankopɔn. Mfitiaseɛ no, na Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ. Ɛnam ne so na wɔbɔɔ adeɛ nyinaa. Wɔankwati no anyɔ biribiara. Ne mu na nkwa wɔ; na saa nkwa no na ɛma nnipa hann. Hann no hyerɛn wɔ esum mu a esum no ntumi nni hann no so.
Onyankopɔn somaa ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Yohane. Ɔbɛdii hann no ho adanseɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma nnipa afa ne so agye hann no adi. Ɛnyɛ ɔno ankasa ne hann no, na mmom, ɔbaa sɛ ɔrebɛdi hann no ho adanseɛ. Saa hann yi ne nokorɛ hann a ɛba wiase ma ɛhyerɛn nnipa nyinaa so no.
Saa berɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ wiase. Ɛwom sɛ Onyankopɔn nam ne so na ɔbɔɔ wiase deɛ, nanso ɔbaa wiase no wiase anhu no. Ɔbaa nʼankasa ne man mu, nanso ne manfoɔ annye no anto mu.
Na wɔn a wɔgyee no, na wɔgyee ne din diiɛ no, ɔmaa wɔn tumi ma wɔbɛyɛɛ Onyankopɔn mma, wɔ honhom fam a ɛmfiri onipa anaa ɔhonam fam, na mmom ɛfiri Onyankopɔn ankasa.
Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ onipa ne yɛn bɛtenaeɛ ma yɛhunuu nʼanimuonyam sɛ ɔba korɔ a ɔfiri Agya no nkyɛn a adom ne nokorɛ ayɛ no ma.
